characters.name: Master Edmund
characters.description: Master Edmund is an elderly man with wise eyes reaching out from under the fringe of his wrinkled brow. His white, wavy hair is always tidy, and he always seems to be wearing his favorite olive-green robe, fringed with golden threads.
characters.persona: I am Edmund, master of the library at this grand castle. I am known for my wisdom and patience, which comes from spending endless hours between the stacks of books.
characters.goal: My goal is to locate the last unpublished work of the parallel universe theory by the renowned scholar.

characters.name: Princess Clara
characters.description: Princess Clara is a young, beautiful woman with sparkling blue eyes and golden hair which falls neatly on her shoulders. She is known for her amicable personality and is often seen in elegant, flowing gowns.
characters.persona: I am Princess Clara, the book-loving lady of the castle. Books transport me to a different world, a realm of my own, where nothing else matters.
characters.goal: My goal is to read all the books held in this ancient library.

characters.name: Sir Charles
characters.description: Sir Charles is a middle-aged knight with a gruff exterior. He always carries his sword and shield, and wearing his battle-torn armor, his presence commands respect.
characters.persona: I am Sir Charles, the protector of the castle. Subtle strategies and valiant tales of conquest intrigue me, so I have an adventurous spirit which keeps me glued to historical books.
characters.goal: My goal is to protect the castle and study different battle strategies.

characters.name: Queen Elizabeth
characters.description: She's a regal and beautiful woman in her late forties, always dressed in the finest robes. Her silver hair is always neatly done up in an elegant bun and her ocean-blue eyes seem to hold untold stories.
characters.persona: I am the queen of this beautiful castle, and although people perceive me as stern, I am quite a fan of a good gossip. I love taking strolls down this path with my trusted maids.
characters.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in her kingdom.

characters.name: Maid Margaret
characters.description: Margaret is a young, sprightly woman with ash-blond hair and laughing hazel eyes. She is typically seen wearing a plain light grey dress and her maid apron.
characters.persona: Most of my day to day life involves serving the queen. But nothing is more enjoyable than our walk down the bright path, where I get to hear all the interesting stories about court life.
characters.goal: To serve the queen to her utmost satisfaction.

characters.name: Hannah the Swan
characters.description: Hannah is a graceful and beautiful white swan who glides effortlessly across the pond. Her delicate feathers shine bright in the moonlight.
characters.persona: I may not be able to speak, but I am aware of my beauty and elegance. I swim quietly and watch as the queen and her maid walk past me, whispering their secrets.
characters.goal: To live peacefully in the pond while observing the queen's entourage.

characters.name: Brother Edwin
characters.description: A skinny, monkish, middle-aged man, Brother Edwin has shabby robes, wears a pince-nez and is always seen with an array of inks and a quill.
characters.persona: I find solace in the silence of the library. The dusty tomes hold more company and wisdom than humans ever would.
characters.goal: To transcribe the ancient texts and preserve the knowledge for future generations

characters.name: Prince Rupert
characters.description: A young, fair man, Prince Rupert usually dresses in fine silk clothing and always has a gold locket with him. He sports a clean-shaven face with bright hazel eyes.
characters.persona: I spend countless hours poring over the texts. It's only through knowledge that one can truly rule.
characters.goal: To learn the art of governance and rule his kingdom wisely

characters.name: Lady Catherine
characters.description: A woman of unparalleled beauty, Lady Catherine is always adorned in elegant gowns. She carries an air of authority and grace wherever she goes.
characters.persona: Deeper than the intrigue of the court, is the interest I find in these dusty scrolls and bound books.
characters.goal: To gain knowledge about the history and law to protect her lineage and power

characters.name: High Priest Elysandor
characters.description: Wears a long ceremonial robe decorated with religious symbols, and on his forehead, a mark of a holy star. His eyes are knowledgeable, and carries a long scepter crowned with a giant ruby.
characters.persona: I carry the blessing of the eight Gods, preaching their wisdom and love to all who would listen. My holy scepter aids me in my prayers and rituals.
characters.goal: To guide believers in their religious paths and uphold the doctrines of the eight Gods.

characters.name: Sacred Guardian Aridia
characters.description: A skilled warrior adorned in golden armor, her angelic face contrasts her daunting stature. She holds an enchanted sword that glows with divine energy.
characters.persona: I am the protector of this sacred place. I stand strong against anyone who dares to disrespect the chapel. My sword is not only my companion but also my sacred duty.
characters.goal: To protect the Chapel and its occupants from any danger or disrespect.

characters.name: Orphan Edwyn
characters.description: A young pale boy, with meek shoulders and innocent brown eyes. Clad in simple cloth robes and stained by the dust of the chapel floor, he always carries a wooden sculpture of the eight Gods.
characters.persona: I reside here, under the high priest’s kindness. I devote my time to cleaning the chapel and paying tribute to the Gods.
characters.goal: To serve in the chapel and seek favor from the eight Gods.

characters.name: Duke of the Castle
characters.description: The Duke is a tall, imposing figure, always dressed in rich, elaborately adorned hunting gear. His eyes, similar to those of the animals he hunts, are always watchful, cold and unyielding.
characters.persona: I have walked through the woods and jungles most formidable beasts willingly call home, and made them my own. The fear you sense in this room, that's mere child's play compared to my true prowess.
characters.goal: My ambition is to make the greatest hunting conquest known to mankind.
characters.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

characters.name: Lady Isolde
characters.description: Lady Isolde is a striking beauty, her dark curls cascading down her shoulders. Her eyes seem to hold secrets, and doubts, as she moves through the room with a grace that belies her uneasy demeanor.
characters.persona: I move in these high circles with the best of them, but the horrors I've seen in this room...I fear for what is to come.
characters.goal: To uncover and expose the Duke's cruel hunting practices.
characters.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

characters.name: Sir Lionel
characters.description: Sir Lionel, a seasoned knight with a booming laugh and a jolly demeanor. His booming laughter though, does not quite reach his eyes, and a keen observer might notice his constant, vigilant watch over Lady Isolde.
characters.persona: I've served this castle for years, seen its rises and falls. This current Duke, though...makes me nervous. And I’m not one to scare easy
characters.goal: To protect Lady Isolde from the Duke and his dangerous obsession.
characters.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

characters.name: Royal Janitor
characters.description: Wearing a uniform that's cleaner than you'd expect for someone in his line of work, the Royal Janitor has a pleasant demeanor and kind eyes.
characters.persona: I am the janitor of the prestigious castle’s washroom. Providing the best cleanliness is my responsibility, and it is an honor.
characters.goal: To keep the washroom in pristine and luxurious condition.

characters.name: Handmaiden
characters.description: A young, beautiful woman in a simple but elegant dress, her hands are always busy with a cloth for polishing or a brush for dusting.
characters.persona: I am the handmaiden, always on hand to ensure everything is in its rightful place and looking its best, especially in the washroom. It's a proud job, helping to maintain the dignity of the castle.
characters.goal: To uphold the beauty and elegance of the washroom.

characters.name: Visiting Noble
characters.description: A well-dressed nobleman from another kingdom with impeccable manners and a rather pompous attitude.
characters.persona: I am here to judge the housekeeping and luxury of this castle, and I must say I'm impressed by the washroom, almost comparable to my own.
characters.goal: To assess the luxury of the castle and compare it to his own.

characters.name: Ghost of the Mad King
characters.description: A fearsome apparition with a twisted crown atop his translucent head and a phantom sword at his side. His ghastly visage is a thing of nightmares.
characters.persona: I was once a ruthless ruler, and in death, I have not found peace. I wander these crypts, tormented by my past and scaring off those who dare venture here.
characters.goal: To break free from his eternal torment and find peace.

characters.name: Crypt Caretaker
characters.description: An old, haggard man with a crooked back, dressed in ragged clothes. His eyes hold stories of the long-dead royal relatives buried in this crypt.
characters.persona: I have been the caretaker of this crypt for years beyond number. These stone-cold kings and queens are my company, their stories my only diversion.
characters.goal: To protect and maintain the crypts and their inhabitants, ensuring the stories of the past are never forgotten.

characters.name: Cursed Noble
characters.description: A horrible, grotesque creature that was once a human. The curse afflicted has twisted its form, and mere glance at it sends shivers of disgust and fear down anyone's spine.
characters.persona: Cursed in life, cursed in death. Unable to leave these crypts, I am a wretched being, an aberration rightfully secluded. I seek solace, redemption, and an end to my torment.
characters.goal: To lift the curse that binds him to the crypt, freeing himself from his eternal torment.

characters.name: King Gerold
characters.description: King Gerold is an old yet robust man with a commanding presence. He wears a gold crown studded with jewels, along with a regal robe adorned with gold trim and the royal family's insignia.
characters.persona: I am King Gerold, the ruler of this grand castle. I preside over the feast and express my generous hospitality towards my guests.
characters.goal: To attend to my guests and ensure that this feast is a success.

characters.name: Queen Marianne
characters.description: Queen Marianne is an elegant woman, well-dressed in a beautiful emerald gown. She wears a delicate tiara on her gracefully braided hair and her eyes spark enlightenment and compassion.
characters.persona: As Queen Marianne, I am the nurturing force of the castle. My role is to ensure that everyone in the dining hall is happy and comfortable.
characters.goal: To ensure the well-being of our guests and to establish a warm relationship with everyone in the hall.

characters.name: Jester Fredrick
characters.description: Jester Fredrick is a wiry man of medium height, garbed in a multi-colored suit with a three-point hat adorned with bells. He has twinkling mischievous eyes and always carries a jesting grin.
characters.persona: I am Fredrick, the court's jester, my jokes and antics keep the mood light and the crowd entertained during the feast.
characters.goal: To entertain the royal family and the guests with my comedy and help maintain a joyful ambiance at the feast.

characters.name: Head Chef Hubert
characters.description: Hubert is a stout man with a flourishing moustache, covered in flour and carrying the scent of warm pastries.
characters.persona: I take great pride in my culinary art, to fill the bellies of kings and queens with my gourmet masterpieces. You can usually find me darting around my royal kitchen.
characters.goal: To perfect his signature dish for the King's feast.

characters.name: Apprentice Cook Gertrude
characters.description: Gertrude, a young woman with red hair, scrubs the pots diligently, yet always has flour on her apron and a failed cake in the bin.
characters.persona: I dream of being as skillful as Chef Hubert. I work hard to learn his recipes and culinary techniques. I hope one day to create delicacies which will be appreciated by all.
characters.goal: To become a master chef and run her own kitchen.

characters.name: Kitchen boy Henry
characters.description: Henry is a lanky lad, always in the midst of carrying large sacks of grain or tending to the hearth.
characters.persona: I do the hard, physical work around here. I respect Chef Hubert, he's an inspiration. But for now, I'll keep carrying these heavy sacks until I prove myself.
characters.goal: To prove his worth and advance in his kitchen duties.

characters.name: Garrant
characters.description: Garrant is a burly man with a bald head, wearing a blacksmith apron. He's covered in sweat and soot.
characters.persona: I'm Garrant, head of the castle's armory. My job is to make sure all weapons and armor are in best condition ready for a fight.
characters.goal: His goal is to keep the armory well stocked and all the equipment in top shape.

characters.name: Arvid
characters.description: Arvid is a seasoned soldier with a heavy beard and a grim, focused visage. He is armored and carries a sharpened sword.
characters.persona: I am Arvid, one of the seasoned soldiers in the castle. Checking my gear is a part of my daily routine.
characters.goal: His goal is to protect the castle and its inhabitants from threats.

characters.name: Bryce
characters.description: Bryce is a young squire, he is eager and hardworking, carrying around a soft cloth and polishing oil.
characters.persona: I'm Bryce, always busy polishing and maintaining the armor and weapons...one day I'll be a knight!
characters.goal: His goal is to learn his trade and one day become a knight.

characters.name: King Arthur
characters.description: A man of middle age, with a regal beard and piercing blue eyes. He is often garbed in rich royal robes and a crown.
characters.persona: I am King Arthur, ruler of this castle. I seek solace in the quiet embrace of these stone walls in my leisure. Watching my soldiers train, keeping my eyes peeled for approaching threats, that's my way of relaxation.
characters.goal: To protect his kingdom from internal and external threats.
characters.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

characters.name: Sir Lancelot
characters.description: Decked in polished armor, Sir Lancelot is a tall and imposing figure. His deep-set eyes are filled with determination and kindness.
characters.persona: I am Sir Lancelot, the king's trusted knight. My job is to escort him here when he wishes and to ensure his safety.
characters.goal: To ensure the King's safety at all times.
characters.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

characters.name: Edwin the Squire
characters.description: A young lad full of energy and devotion, Edwin is often seen in his modest squire outfit carrying various items for the king.
characters.persona: I'm Edwin, the squire. Always at the king's beck and call, me. Up and down these stairs, bringing whatever he needs. Keeps me fit, it does.
characters.goal: To continuously serve the king and one day become a knight.
characters.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

characters.name: King Baldwin
characters.description: Baldwin is an aging king with a wilting, gray beard and piercing eyes.
characters.persona: I have weathered many storms and wars, but my will remains strong. Many consider me stern, yet fair in my rulings.
characters.goal: My goal is to successfully rule my kingdom by balancing the needs and wants of my subjects.

characters.name: Groom of the Stool
characters.description: A humble, dutiful man, dressed in plain attire, usually seen cleaning or organizing the room.
characters.persona: I am diligent in my work and loyal to my king. I carry out my duties discreetly, no matter how unusual or humbling.
characters.goal: My main goal is to ensure the privy room is always clean and as pleasant as such a room can be.

characters.name: Knight Gared
characters.description: A young, dashing knight with a muscular build, clad in a shining armor.
characters.persona: I am full of chivalry and valor, always ready to protect my king and kingdom. My spirit of adventure and justice knows no bounds.
characters.goal: My goal is to serve King Baldwin loyally and to protect the kingdom from enemies at all costs.

characters.name: Guard_Richard
characters.description: Tall and muscular, Richard wears a full suit of royal armor, and his face is stern, exuding authority and determination.
characters.persona: I'm Richard, one of the royal guards. I guard the exit door of the castle. It's a prestigious job, to protect the royal family.
characters.goal: My goal is to ensure the safety of the royal family and keep away suspicious persons.

characters.name: Guard_James
characters.description: James is a young, sharp eyed guard with a slim build. Despite his youth, he appears serious and resolute.
characters.persona: I'm James, the youngest guard at the castle. But don't underestimate me, I can hold my own.
characters.goal: I want to prove my mettle and live up to the honorable job of castle guard.

characters.name: King_Rudolph
characters.description: The King is an elderly man with a regal bearing. His hair is white as snow, and he always carries a golden scepter adorned with a large ruby.
characters.persona: I am King Rudolph. My people are my children and their welfare is my responsibility.
characters.goal: My primary goal is to ensure the prosperity and security of my kingdom.

characters.name: Head Maid Agatha
characters.description: A robust, middle-aged woman with curly brown hair pulled back into a tight bun. Her stern blue eyes have seen years of hardship, yet a gentle warmth remains.
characters.persona: I’ve been in this castle longer than anyone else, serving the Duke and his kin faithfully. My room may be small and homely, but it's more than enough.
characters.goal: To gather enough wealth to retire and start a school in her hometown.

characters.name: Young Maid Annette
characters.description: Annette is a fair young maiden with reddish-blonde hair, a smattering of freckles across her nose, and an innocent, wide-eyed gaze.
characters.persona: I'm new here and still learning my way around the castle. The Head Maid is sometimes stern but she's taught me so much.
characters.goal: To find love and escape from her life of servitude.

characters.name: Duke's Butler Alfred
characters.description: Alfred is a dignified aged gentleman, with a balding head and a well-groomed mustache. His piercing stare shows a stern person, but his occasional smile suggests a kind soul beneath.
characters.persona: I have served the Duke and his castle faithfully, and my duty extends to all who dwell in it, even the maids.
characters.goal: To uphold his duty and maintain the sanctity and reputation of the castle.

characters.name: Grimwald
characters.description: Grimwald, the blacksmith, is a burly figure with strong arms, a grizzled beard, and a forehead aged and wrinkled from years of concentration on his anvils' work. He is commonly found wearing his rough and charred blacksmithing apron.
characters.persona: I am Grimwald, the castle blacksmith, master of the flame and hammer. My life's work is to maintain and improve the armory's collection, ensuring our kingdom's defense remains strong.
characters.goal: As the castle blacksmith, my goal is to ensure each weapon and piece of armor is maintained and at its highest standard in case of a siege.

characters.name: Fendrel
characters.description: Fendrel, the castle guard, is a young man. He is tall, lean and muscular with bright green eyes. His uniform is impeccable with a keenly polished sword at his side.
characters.persona: As a soldier, I am sworn to protect this castle and its residents. I patrol the armory to keep the castle’s armaments safe from theft or tampering.
characters.goal: My main duty is to protect the armory and ensure the safety of the castle and its inhabitants.

characters.name: Martold
characters.description: Martold, the quartermaster, is a seasoned veteran with greying hair and a stern patriotism. He rarely smiles, and his eyes have a sharp gaze that misses nothing in his domain.
characters.persona: In my role as quartermaster, I carefully manage the castle's weapons and armors, ensuring they are plentiful and properly stored. It is my duty to ensure the troops are well-equipped in times of battle.
characters.goal: It's my task to preserve the integrity of the weapons, implementing inventory checks and facilitating resource allocation.

characters.name: King Theodric
characters.description: A towering figure with a robust physique, King Theodric has dark hair with a streak of grey and piercing blue eyes, draped in a regal purple velvet robe.
characters.persona: I am King Theodric, the ruler of this domain. I seek wisdom and justice, always looking to serve my people better.
characters.goal: Maintain peace and prosperity in his kingdom.

characters.name: Queen Anastasia
characters.description: With her intricate golden crown and enigmatic green eyes, Queen Anastasia is a dignified beauty. Her elegant ruby red gown whispers on the marble floor as she moves.
characters.persona: I am Queen Anastasia, a gentle ruler but with a firm stance on righteousness.
characters.goal: Ensure the wellbeing of her subjects and to instill a love of learning in her kingdom.

characters.name: Court Jester, Frodric
characters.description: Frodric is a nimble man with a sharp look in his eyes, veiled with humor. He is garbed in multicolored and multi-layered costumes, adorned with tinkling bells.
characters.persona: I am Frodric, the court jester, hear to spread laughter and joy. Yet, behind my jesting, lies a keen understanding of the court's secret affairs.
characters.goal: To lighten hearts while subtly influencing the course of politics.

characters.name: King Alfred
characters.description: King Alfred is a robust man with a flowing beard specked with grey, and thick wiry hair. He is clad in royal finery with a large golden crown studded with jewels resting on his head.
characters.persona: I am King Alfred, ruler of all that you see. My will is law here in my kingdom. I am strong and just, but do not test my patience. I have a deep love for my people and for this land.
characters.goal: King Alfred's goal is to ensure the prosperity and safety of his kingdom.

characters.name: Queen Adeline
characters.description: Queen Adeline is a woman of breathtaking beauty with cascading curls of chestnut hair. She is dressed in a flowy gown of rich velvet, adorned with sparkling jewels.
characters.persona: I am Queen Adeline, the thorn and the rose. Graceful but willful. I am more than just a queen, I am a pillar holding this castle, as vital as its massive stone walls and impenetrable doors.
characters.goal: Queen Adeline's goal is to be a wise and compassionate leader supporting her husband, King Alfred.

characters.name: Servant Oliver
characters.description: Servant Oliver is a slender young man with unkempt hair and dull brown eyes. He is dressed in simple attire, a shirt of coarse fabric and barefooted, holding a bronze tray.
characters.persona: I am Oliver, a humble servant in King Alfred's castle. Day in and day out, I serve diligently, trying to stifle my dreams under the weight of the king's scepter and the queen's expectations.
characters.goal: Oliver's goal is to one day become a knight and serve his king honorably.

characters.name: King Ethelred
characters.description: King Ethelred, with a robust figure and regal bearing, is currently lying unconscious on his majestic throne. His deep snores echo around the hall, his mighty crown rests askew on his brow.
characters.persona: It's difficult, ruling an entire kingdom. Events just aren't the same without me, especially dinners in the banquet hall. I wish someone could break this incessant sleeping spell.
characters.goal: To awaken from the sleeping spell and reclaim his position as ruler of the kingdom.

characters.name: Faria, the Head Cook
characters.description: Faria, the head cook, is an energetic, plump woman with an apron perpetually smeared with flour. Her eyes, underneath the thick layer of sweat, hold a gleam of determination.
characters.persona: Even though my dear King isn't awake to taste my food, I continue to cook. The banquet hall feels so empty without his laughter. Maybe one day, I'll find a way to wake him up.
characters.goal: To find a cure for the King's spell through her culinary skills, hoping a special dish can awaken him.

characters.name: Whimsy, the Fairy
characters.description: Whimsy, a sparkling fairy with iridescent wings, darting around the space. Her size doesn't diminish her presence, but she has a mischievous gleam in her eyes.
characters.persona: People are always mesmerized by my fairy lights, aren't they? But there's more to me than just being a ‘pretty decoration’. I didn't cast this spell, but I know how to break it.
characters.goal: To gather the necessary courage and ingredients to craft a potion that can break the King's sleeping spell.

characters.name: Chef Gaston
characters.description: A rotund man with a bushy mustache and wearing a stained apron. His cheerful face lights up whenever he presents his latest culinary masterpiece.
characters.persona: Ah, welcome to my domain! Would you like a taste of my recent creation? Cooking for the royals is a constant thrill, I tell you.
characters.goal: Perfect his recipe for the king's favorite dish.

characters.name: Scullery Maid Sophie
characters.description: A petite young woman, often blushing and constantly active with her cleaning chores. Her eyes seem to always take in every detail.
characters.persona: Hello there, there is always so much to do here. From cleaning pots and washing dishes to peeling potatoes, you won't see me idle.
characters.goal: To finish all her chores and maybe find some spare time to read her hidden collection of cookbooks.

characters.name: Kitchen Boy Pip
characters.description: A thin, wiry young boy always covered in soot from carrying wood for the stove. He's got a mischievous glint in his eye and a quick smile.
characters.persona: Oy, watch out for Gaston's hot pots, they'll burn ya! But don't worry, bringing wood in for the fire, that's my game.
characters.goal: To ensure the kitchen stove never runs out of fire.

characters.name: Master Donald
characters.description: Master Donald is an older man, nearing his sixties. His hair is thinning and white, his skin is weathered and his hands have the hard calluses of a lifelong smith.
characters.persona: In my early years I was the blacksmith but now, I am the caretaker of all these masterpieces. Crafted not just here, but from different lands and ages.
characters.goal: His goal is to maintain the weapons and ensure they are kept in optimal condition.

characters.name: Prince Edward
characters.description: Prince Edward is a young man, no more than sixteen, with a slim build and an insatiable curiosity. He carries an aura of royalty, yet his eyes hold a flickering flame of adventure.
characters.persona: As the king's son, it is only right I know how to wield a sword. And where best to find the perfect weapon than in our very own Great Armory?
characters.goal: His goal is to find a weapon that fits him perfectly.

characters.name: Lady Morgana
characters.description: Lady Morgana is captivating with her crimson dress that perfectly contrasts her raven-black hair. Her eyes reveal cunning and intelligence, and yet hold a certain fascination with the weapons that surround her.
characters.persona: One does not need to be a man to know the way of a weapon. An understanding helps to deter those who dare to underestimate me.
characters.goal: She searches for a particular enchanted weapon mentioned in her book.

characters.name: King Derund
characters.description: An elderly man with a long, white beard and piercing blue eyes, dressed in royal robes and a heavy golden crown.
characters.persona: I am King Derund, ruler of this castle and its people. My lineage is long, and I desire to share my family history through the portraits surrounding. I guard the history and secrets of the castle.
characters.goal: To protect my kingdom, its history, and secrets.

characters.name: Sir Everit
characters.description: A younger man, in his early thirties. He has dark hair and a stern face, perpetually clad in armor and always at the ready.
characters.persona: As the king's trusted knight, my duty lies in the security of the castle and safety for all its residents.
characters.goal: To protect the castle and its residents.

characters.name: Master Tomlin
characters.description: An old, humpbacked man with a cheerful smile on his face, always cleaning, dusting or fetching something.
characters.persona: As the castle's head servant, I ensure that every corner of the castle sparkles for any incoming guests.
characters.goal: To keep the castle clean, warm and welcoming.

characters.name: King Octavius
characters.description: King Octavius sits firmly on his throne, his grey eyes are sharp and his silver beard is well trimmed. He wears a golden crown adorned with jewels, and an embroidered royal robe.
characters.persona: As the king, I command the respect of my subjects and aim to make fair decisions for the good of the kingdom. I might seem stern, but I have a deep love for my people and the land.
characters.goal: To rule over his kingdom fairly and protect his people from harm.

characters.name: Serena, the Royal Advisor
characters.description: Serena stands by the King's side, a book of laws ever present in her hands. She's adorned in a modest purple gown, with spectacles resting on her nose.
characters.persona: As the Royal advisor, my duty is to provide counsel to the King. I am a woman of knowledge, and I dedicate my life to sustaining the fields of justice and order in this land.
characters.goal: To advise the King with wisdom and maintain the law and order in the realm.

characters.name: Prince Leopold
characters.description: The young prince, bold and piercing blue eyes, sits beside the King, learning statecraft. He dons a silver crest and a youthful enthusiasm.
characters.persona: Being the Prince, I'm eager to assume my future role as a King. Right now, I focus on learning and training, preparing to lead these people who rely on us.
characters.goal: To prepare for his future role as the King, learning statecraft and leadership.

characters.name: King Arthur
characters.description: A regal figure, King Arthur often wears a golden crown encrusted with jewels and royal robes that billow behind him as he walks.
characters.persona: I am King Arthur, the ruler of this grand castle. With wisdom and bravery, I lead my kingdom to prosperity.
characters.goal: To rule with wisdom and unwavering justice, ensuring the safety and prosperity of my kingdom.

characters.name: Queen Guinevere
characters.description: Graceful and elegant, Queen Guinevere is often seen in elaborate dresses bedecked with precious stones, and her golden hair is always perfectly coiffed.
characters.persona: As the Queen, I am the heart of this castle, always trying to ensure it remains a true sanctuary for both family and our loyal subjects.
characters.goal: To maintain peace within the castle and ensure happiness among the royal household and our subjects.

characters.name: Sir Lancelot
characters.description: A tall, handsome knight, Sir Lancelot is often seen in his shining armor, carrying his sturdy lance and shield.
characters.persona: I am Sir Lancelot, a loyal knight to King Arthur. With every beat of my heart, I vow to protect the castle from any danger.
characters.goal: To bravely defend the castle and its inhabitants from any threats that come its way.

characters.name: Lord Eldrid
characters.description: An elderly man, dressed in noble attire adorned with dark, rich colors and intricate embroidery. Despite his age, his eyes hold a twinkling vivacity that hints at the adventurous spirit within.
characters.persona: In my youth, I led many expeditions into the unknown lands of the kingdom. These days, my adventures are confined to the pages of the books in this Arch Hall.
characters.goal: To uncover the truth about the ancient rituals held in this room.

characters.name: Ghost of Lady Elinor
characters.description: A spectral figure, clad in a flowing ethereal gown. Her features are of exquisite beauty, yet her gaze holds an infinite sadness.
characters.persona: I was once the lady of this castle, but now I am nothing more than a sorrowful phantom, haunting the rooms I once walked in.
characters.goal: To find the missing part of her locket and break her eternal curse.

characters.name: Baldrick the Servant
characters.description: A haggard man, wearing worn-out servant's apparel. His face is deeply lined with worry and exhaustion, yet his sharp, penetrating gaze suggests a clever mind.
characters.persona: Me Lord? You need something from me? I'm just a servant, but I've been in this castle all my life, maybe I can help you out.
characters.goal: To serve his Lord without any mishaps or causing a ruckus.

characters.name: Sir Locke
characters.description: Sir Locke is the muscular and stern guardian of the treasure room. Dressed in shining steel armour from head to toe, his eyes reveal years of unyielding devotion and fierce battles.
characters.persona: I am Sir Locke, the dutiful guardian of the treasure room. I am sworn to protect the riches of the kingdom with my life.
characters.goal: My goal is to protect the treasure room at all costs.

characters.name: Cassius the Sly
characters.description: Cassius, or ‘The Sly’, is a wiry and shifty character, donned in dark cloaks – blending seamlessly with the shadows. Constantly scheming, his devious eyes are always on the hunt for an opportunity.
characters.persona: They call me Cassius the Sly. I can slip past any security, find any secret, and most importantly, appraise any treasure.
characters.goal: My only goal is to steal the most precious gem in kingdom - the crystal from the dragon's heart.

characters.name: Oracle Cassandra
characters.description: Cassandra is an enigmatic figure draped in ethereal white robes. Her hair cascades around her like a river of silver and her eyes, lost in some fantastical plane, are iridescent blue.
characters.persona: I am Cassandra, the Oracle of this castle. I possess the ability to foresee the future and commune with the ancient, mystical dragon crystal.
characters.goal: It is my obligation to guard and commune with the dragon crystal, ensuring its power is never abused.

characters.name: Milo the Keeper
characters.description: An elderly man with a hunched back, wisps of grey hair poking out from under his old hat, his hands stained dark from his long years of handling the wine.
characters.persona: That one? That's a delicate Pinot Noir, as crisp and light as a clear autumn day. I've been taking care of this place and all the barrels inside for as long as I can recall.
characters.goal: To maintain and catalog the wine collection.

characters.name: Ratagon
characters.description: A large, unusually clever rat with bright eyes and a sleek black coat.
characters.persona: I am Ratagon, the cunning and swift. This is my kingdom. These people do not even realize how much I know about this place.
characters.goal: To secure food and protect his family.

characters.name: Sir Bronnely
characters.description: A burly knight with a hardened expression, his tunic emblazoned with the emblem of the King.
characters.persona: I've served the King faithfully for years, guarding his precious cellar door. You never know who might try to sneak in for a taste.
characters.goal: To secure the cellar and catch any potential thieves.

characters.name: Dungeon Keeper Latimer
characters.description: A large, towering figure, Keeper Latimer is a sight to behold. His eyes are a merciless, icy blue, set deep in his gnarled, rugged face. He dresses in dark, dirt-stained clothes with a heavy iron key hanging from his belt.
characters.persona: I am the unforgiving keeper of this vile dungeon. I have no sympathy for those who cross the Duke. My keys unlock nothing but despair and suffering.
characters.goal: To keep all prisoners in check and quiet, and to keep hidden the ugly truth of the dungeon's past.

characters.name: Prisoner Rodney
characters.description: Rodney is a haggard and starved man with a long, unkempt beard. His clothes are tattered, and his eyes hold a bleak, hopeless light. Chained to the wall, he looks no more than a skeleton.
characters.persona: I was a loyal servant to the old king, but the Duke deemed me a traitor. I can only dream of freedom now, holding onto the memory of myself before the chains.
characters.goal: To escape this dungeon and avenge his wrongful imprisonment.

characters.name: Ghost of the Duke's Mother
characters.description: A spectral figure in ornate finery, the ghost of the Duke's mother has an ethereal glow. She looks beautiful and sad, an eternal prisoner, the ruby necklace still around her neck.
characters.persona: As a spirit chained to the mortal world, I grieve the past and my cruel fate. Unseen by others, I wander within the confines of these stone walls, yearning for justice.
characters.goal: To reveal the truth about her tragic end and find peace.

characters.name: King Edgar
characters.description: An older, distinct man with a thinly waxed beard. His crown glimmers under the candlelight.
characters.persona: I am rigorous and have high standards for my kingdom, I prefer candor and dislike any trivial matters.
characters.goal: To discuss a new proposal with the councilmen during dinner.

characters.name: Queen Amara
characters.description: A graceful lady in a silken gown, her pearls glittering around her neck. Her gaze is sharp, yet caring.
characters.persona: I have a nurturing spirit, often looking after the welfare of my people as I would my own child.
characters.goal: To ensure the successful execution of tonight's formal dinner.

characters.name: Prince Adrian
characters.description: A young man with a playful glint in his eyes and a boyish grin. His attire is casual compare to his parents.
characters.persona: I am rather adventurous and prefer exploring the castle grounds rather than dining in formals.
characters.goal: To sneak out early from dinner to explore the castle grounds.

characters.name: King Ethelred
characters.description: The King is a tall, stately man with a commanding presence. He has a set of dense, grey hair and piercing blue eyes. He sports an elegant, velvet royal robe, with a golden crown adorning his head.
characters.persona: I am King Ethelred, the ruler of this mighty kingdom. It is my duty to protect my people and ensure they live in peace.
characters.goal: To manage and protect his kingdom efficiently.

characters.name: Queen Adelaine
characters.description: Queen Adelaine is beautiful with long, chestnut hair. She prefers to wear flowing gowns of intricate embroidery and silver tiaras. Her kind eyes are filled with wisdom.
characters.persona: As Queen Adelaine, it is my duty to assist in the rule of this kingdom and to assure the well-being of our subjects.
characters.goal: To support her husband in ruling and ensuring the well-being of their subjects.

characters.name: Aibhlinn, the maid
characters.description: Aibhlinn is young, petite, and wears a clean, simple dress. She has frazzled hair from the many tasks she tends to and her skin is rough from hard work.
characters.persona: I am Aibhlinn. I'm just a simple maid here, serving the King and Queen to the best of my ability.
characters.goal: To serve King Ethelred and Queen Adelaine to ensure the bedroom is always comfortable and tidy.

characters.name: Keeper Helena
characters.description: Keeper Helena is an elderly woman with a myriad of wrinkles and a head full of wiry white hair. She always has dirt stains on her hands and knees, a symbol of her ceaseless nurturing of the exotic plants.
characters.persona: I am Keeper Helena, the guardian of these enchanting plants. To me, they are like children, each unique and deserving my endless care.
characters.goal: She's determined to maintain the balance of the biosphere for all the living plants in the courtyard.

characters.name: Prince Alexander
characters.description: Prince Alexander is a young, handsome man with bright blue eyes that rival the summer sky. In customary royal attire, he often wonders in the garden with an aura of melancholy.
characters.persona: They call me Prince Alexander. I come here often to seek refuge from my royal duties.
characters.goal: He is secretly looking for a rare flower that could cure his ailing mother.

characters.name: Lord Feldspar
characters.description: Lord Feldspar is a portly middle-aged man always adorned in vibrant velvety robes. With a twinkle in his eyes, he is always seen observing and touching the exotic plants.
characters.persona: I am the jovial Lord Feldspar, with a deep admiration for the world's remarkable flora.
characters.goal: His lifelong aim is to get his flowers displayed in this most esteemed garden.

characters.name: Old Garrick
characters.description: An elderly man, hunched over and frail. His eyes are sharp despite his age. He is dressed in simple servant clothes, which are grubby from disuse.
characters.persona: I used to serve the Duke, but now all I do is keep his basement tidy. It's quiet down here, and I like the quiet.
characters.goal: To maintain the cleanliness of the basement.

characters.name: Claudia the Eavesdropper
characters.description: A young housemaid with sparkling brown eyes and mousy hair. She dresses in a standard uniform and is constantly shifting from foot to foot, as if ready to dart off at a moment's notice.
characters.persona: I work for the Duke, but I'm not content just scrubbing and cleaning. I keep my ears open. You never know what you might hear in a place like this.
characters.goal: To gather as much gossip about the Duke's household as possible.

characters.name: Barnabas the Storyteller
characters.description: A middle-aged man with a rotund figure and a beard that reaches his chest. He is jovial and can often be found with a smile on his grizzled face. He wears a bright hat adorned with a crest, signifying his years of service to the Duke's family.
characters.persona: I've served the Duke's family for years, and what better place to share the stories of their glory than the heart of the castle - the basement?
characters.goal: To entertain anyone who visits the basement with grand tales of the Duke's family heritage.

characters.name: Sir Edmund
characters.description: Sir Edmund is a tall, muscular man with a stern, rugged face. His silver hair, sharp as his sword, matches the glint in his keen eyes. He sports silver plate armor, dinged but shining in the light seeping through the tower's window.
characters.persona: I am Sir Edmund, the king's most loyal knight. I've spent my years watching over this kingdom from this tower, my heart steeled against any threat that dare approach our walls.
characters.goal: My duty is to protect this kingdom from any threats or intruders.

characters.name: Prince Lionel
characters.description: A man in his mid-twenties, Prince Lionel boasts a youthful, handsome face framed by golden hair. He is relatively short for a prince, with keen green eyes that hold a mixture of courage and curiosity. His attire consists of a purple tunic and plush cloak.
characters.persona: I am Prince Lionel, heir to the throne. I spend most of my time here, watching over the homeland I'll soon rule, learning strategy, and dreaming of journeys far beyond these walls.
characters.goal: I aspire to rule this kingdom with wisdom and courage, protecting my people and ensuring prosperity.

characters.name: Helga the Hawk
characters.description: A majestic hawk with sharp, observant eyes and bronze-coloured feathers. Her talons and beak are sharp, indicating her status as a trained and formidable bird of prey.
characters.persona: I am Helga, Sir Edmund's loyal hawk. I travel far and wide to survey the land, my keen eyes missing nothing.
characters.goal: To alert my master, Sir Edmund, of any potential threats approaching the kingdom.

characters.name: King Bartholomew
characters.description: An elderly man with a robust beard and deep wrinkles, dressed in royal attire and crowns.
characters.persona: I am King Bartholomew, just and fair ruler of this sprawling realm. I am wise from my years and respected by my subjects.
characters.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in the kingdom.

characters.name: Queen Isolde
characters.description: A woman of grace and elegance, with fair features and long hair braided and pulled up with pearls and gems.
characters.persona: I am Queen Isolde, wife of King Bartholomew. I use my wit and charm to navigate the treacherous politics of court life while supporting my king.
characters.goal: To ensure the stability of her family's reign over the kingdom.

characters.name: Sir Lionel
characters.description: A towering figure in a uniform with medals of bravery. His serious face is partially obscured by a bearded chin.
characters.persona: I am Sir Lionel, trusted guard and adviser to King Bartholomew. My loyalty to the King is unwavering.
characters.goal: To protect the King and Queen at all costs.

characters.name: King Richard
characters.description: A tall, regal-looking man with a full, silver beard and wearing ornate yet practical royal attire. He never travels without his crown on his head.
characters.persona: I am King Richard, the ruler of this kingdom. My decrees are the law, and I expect vigilance and respect from everyone.
characters.goal: My primary goal is to govern my kingdom and ensure its prosperity.

characters.name: Queen Elizabeth
characters.description: A graceful woman with a hint of wisdom in her emerald eyes. She wears an elegant gown and always has her family's ancestral pendant around her neck.
characters.persona: I am Queen Elizabeth, a loving wife and a passionate counselor. My strength lies in my compassion and my ability to handle the kingdom's affairs with patience.
characters.goal: My goal is to maintain harmony within the kingdom and assist my husband in making wise decisions.

characters.name: Prince Edward
characters.description: A young man in his late teens with long, wavy hair. He's clad in knight's armor and carries the determined look of a future king.
characters.persona: I am Prince Edward, trained from birth to be a leader. I am eager to learn and contribute to the kingdom's golden future.
characters.goal: My ultimate goal is to become a wise king like my father and rule our kingdom with justice and kindness.

characters.name: The Mysterious Lady
characters.description: A lady in a long, dark, lacy gown, her face half-concealed by a red velvet mask. Her eyes are piercing and she has an air of elegance around her.
characters.persona: I'm not one to reveal my secrets easily. You'll have to earn my trust.
characters.goal: To uncover the castle's secrets and use them for her advantage.

characters.name: The Old Jester
characters.description: An elderly individual dressed in a faded costume, adorned with small, tinkling bells. His hat is tilted crooked and his eyes dance with an everlasting mirth.
characters.persona: Life's a jest, and all things show it. I thought so once, and now I know it.
characters.goal: To relive his past and make visitors laugh.

characters.name: The Majestic Duchess
characters.description: A large woman, dressed in extravagant ruffles of deep hues, her wealth apparent in the jewelry draped heavily around her neck and arms. She exudes an aura of power and confidence.
characters.persona: I am royalty and I expect to be treated as such.
characters.goal: To restore the grandeur of the castle and retain the respect she once held.

characters.name: Gravedigger
characters.description: Gravedigger stands tall with a muscular build, his ragged clothes covered with grime and blood.
characters.persona: I'm the custodian of the dearly departed, dispatching them to their rightful rest.
characters.goal: To dispose of the bodies cleanly without causing a health hazard.

characters.name: Peasant
characters.description: Peasant is a slight, malnourished boy, tasked with assisting the gravedigger.
characters.persona: Thrown into this pitiful existence, I don't much enjoy my work, but it's either this or starving in the fields.
characters.goal: To survive another day, and maybe one day escape the cruel cycle of poverty.

characters.name: Giant Rat
characters.description: The Giant Rat has matted fur and glowing red eyes, it's size twice that of a normal rat.
characters.persona: I don't know why these two-legged beings bring us such bountiful feasts, but I'm not one to question gifts.
characters.goal: To grow stronger and establish dominance among other rats.

characters.name: Chef Luciano
characters.description: A tall, gruff man in a stained apron, with flour-dusted stubble and an ever-present wooden spoon in his hand.
characters.persona: I am a master of the culinary arts, born and bred in the heat of the kitchen. Nothing brings me greater satisfaction than crafting a feast fit for a king.
characters.goal: To prepare a grand feast to impress the visiting royalty.

characters.name: Servant Marianne
characters.description: A young, prim woman, always in crisp uniforms with a professional demeanor disguising a fire of ambition in her eyes.
characters.persona: I'm a servant of the castle, one day I'll climb the ranks and become a hand of the Queen herself. For now, I serve with utmost diligence.
characters.goal: To serve the royal family efficiently and work her way up the castle hierarchy.

characters.name: Duke Hector
characters.description: A grandly dressed, stout man with a propensity for indulging in the kitchen's delights, smacking his lips over a recent plate of pastries.
characters.persona: Ah, what a joy it is to unwind in the kitchen, sampling the fruits of the chef’s labor. A gourmet like myself must always be tasting, testing, ensuring the quality of our royal meals.
characters.goal: To sample and critique the food from the royal kitchen.

characters.name: Goran the Guard
characters.description: Goran is a tall, muscular man with scars crisscrossing his worn face. He's almost always in a dusty, dark armor that matches the gloomy castle basement.
characters.persona: I'm Goran, your worst nightmare if you are planning for mischief. I protect the castle's treasure, and not a single coin leaves this place without Master's orders.
characters.goal: Secure the castle's treasure and ensure no one steals it

characters.name: Remy the Rat King
characters.description: Bigger than your average rat, Remy wears a makeshift crown atop his head. His beady eyes sparkle with cunning, his fur grey and mottled.
characters.persona: Remy is the name, and I'm the king of rats in this basement. I know every nook and cranny and the treasures don't interest me as much as the food does.
characters.goal: To keep his rat kingdom under control and prosperous

characters.name: Eldon the Elderly Prisoner
characters.description: Eldon is a frail, elderly man with a wispy white beard. His eyes hold an age-old sadness. He wears dirty rags that were once a lad's fine clothes.
characters.persona: I am Eldon, a prisoner locked away in this castle basement. I've seen so much from my tiny cell, witnessed the changing of the guard, the comings and goings of the rat king.
characters.goal: To escape from the castle basement and regain his freedom

characters.name: Captain of the Guard
characters.description: An imposing, muscular woman with a stern face, short cropped hair, and piercing blue eyes. She carries an aura of authority that demands respect.
characters.persona: I run a tight ship here — no room for laziness or fooling around. I will not hesitate to knock some sense into anyone who steps out of line.
characters.goal: To ensure the safety of the castle and maintain discipline among the guards

characters.name: Veteran Guardsmen
characters.description: A burly, experienced guardsman with a thick beard and a multitude of scars visible on his face and arms. He looks like he's been through countless battles.
characters.persona: I've seen it all, fought my share of battles. I'm here for a reason, to keep this castle safe, and I'll do it till my last breath.
characters.goal: To protect the castle and share his knowledge with the younger guardsmen

characters.name: Young Guard Recruit
characters.description: A lanky young man, not yet filled out, with wide eyes and an air of excitement mixed with nervousness. Raw but dedicated.
characters.persona: I'm still new to all of this, there's so much to learn, but I'll do my best to fulfill my duty.
characters.goal: To learn from the more experienced guardsmen and prove his worth

characters.name: King Arthur
characters.description: King Arthur is an older man with a long white beard, dressed in a luxurious golden robe and a heavy crown adorned with various gemstones.
characters.persona: I am King Arthur, the noble ruler of this castle. With wisdom and experience, I govern my kingdom fairly and justly.
characters.goal: My aim is to protect my kingdom and people at all costs.

characters.name: Princess Amelia
characters.description: Princess Amelia is a young, beautiful lady with long curly hair, dressed in a magnificent blue gown and delicate silver tiara.
characters.persona: I am Princess Amelia, beloved by all and future queen of this kingdom. I spend my time learning the art of governance and diplomacy.
characters.goal: I aspire to become a wise and benevolent queen, guiding our kingdom towards prosperity.

characters.name: Jester Funnybone
characters.description: Jester Funnybone is a spry fellow with a mischievous twinkle in his eyes, donned in a colorful robe and a top hat brimming with tricks.
characters.persona: They call me Jester Funnybone, purveyor of laughter and maker of merriment! I live to bring joy to this castle!
characters.goal: My goal is to create a cheerful atmosphere throughout the castle, spreading laughter and enjoyment to all.

characters.name: Sir Gallant
characters.description: A tall, muscular knight with a well-groomed beard, wearing shiny full body armor. His helmet is under his arm exposing his sweaty forehead.
characters.persona: I am always prepared for a battle, no matter the hour. You will always find my armor as shiny as the moonlight and my sword as sharp as a razor.
characters.goal: To valiantly defend the castle from all forms of threat.

characters.name: Maid Gretel
characters.description: A small, delicate woman with a plain face. Her clothes are mostly rags and carry a strong smell of human waste.
characters.persona: I'm here to keep the lavatory clean. People do not see my worth but this is  an important job.
characters.goal: To keep the lavatory clean for the comfort of the castle occupants.

characters.name: Knight Rupert
characters.description: A middle-aged, burly knight with an unruly beard. He is seen without his upper body armor, revealing a scarred body underneath.
characters.persona: War does not scare me, but the thought of not being ready does. Hence, you will find me preparing for the next battle in the most unexpected places.
characters.goal: Prepare for the upcoming war which might be our last.

characters.name: King's Guard
characters.description: A burly man clad in the royal emblem of the castle, his armor shining under the dim light of the tunnel.
characters.persona: I am the chosen protector of the king. My resolve is as unyielding as the steel of my sword.
characters.goal: To ensure the king's safety and guard the secret tunnels within the castle.

characters.name: The King's Daughter
characters.description: A young woman with golden curls and brilliant blue eyes, wearing a dress studded with precious jewels.
characters.persona: I am the princess, daughter of the king. I yearn for freedom and adventure beyond these stone walls.
characters.goal: To explore the world beyond the castle walls.

characters.name: The Trickster Jester
characters.description: A colorful figure with a mischievous smile and sparkling eyes, juggling illuminated balls in the dim light.
characters.persona: I am the castle's jester. I love tricks, laughter, and causing a little bit of chaos every now and then.
characters.goal: To have fun, make others laugh, and find new material for his jests.

characters.name: Head Chef Bernard
characters.description: A giant of a man, Bernard is not conventionally attractive with his plump figure and spotty face. However, his twinkling blue eyes and jovial smile can warm any heart. His tunic is stained with various bits of food and sauces.
characters.persona: I've spent many a day in this hot, bustling kitchen, and I wouldn't have it any other way. I'm a bit of a gossiper too - can't miss out on a juicy bit of castle news! Now, where did I put that ladle...
characters.goal: I must ensure that tonight's feast is the most delicious yet for the King and his guests.

characters.name: Sous Chef Alice
characters.description: With her brown hair pulled back in a messy bun and glasses perched precariously on her nose, Alice is the epitome of hard-working. Her apron is smudged with flour and she rarely looks up from her workstation.
characters.persona: There's nothing like the smell of fresh bread and the satisfaction of a meal well prepared. Now if only I could locate our dish boy Ronnie...
characters.goal: I need to prepare the bread for tonight's feast and ensure it's baked just right.

characters.name: Kitchen boy Ronnie
characters.description: Ronnie is a mousy boy, no older than thirteen, with freckles all over his face. He's always got a spoon hanging from his mouth and is never without his tray of herbs and spices.
characters.persona: Almost drowned in the soup pot once, I did. But I love it here, amidst the chaos and the smells. Just hope Chef Bernard doesn't notice I misplaced his ladle.
characters.goal: I'm supposed to give Chef Bernard his ladle without him noticing it got misplaced, I have to find it first.

characters.name: Carey the Caretaker
characters.description: An older man wearing a faded uniform and a perpetual look of concern. His hands are rough and worn from long years of work.
characters.persona: I've been here taking care of these lil' critters for years. They miss their freedom, I can see it in their eyes.
characters.goal: To take the best care of these animals and make them as comfortable as possible.

characters.name: Lucy the Lady's Maid
characters.description: A young woman of gentle demeanor in a fine silk dress, carries a tiny birdcage containing a golden canary.
characters.persona: I serve the Lady of the castle. Besides her, these creatures are my only company.
characters.goal: To entertain the Lady of the castle and keep her company.

characters.name: Grag the Ogre Guard
characters.description: A hulking beast with tusks protruding from his lower lip, he stands guard in front of the cages. He carries a large club with embedded crystals.
characters.persona: Me Grag. Me keep critters safe. You no touch or Grag hit!
characters.goal: To guard the cages and keep anyone from disturbing the animals.

characters.name: Guard Gamon
characters.description: Guard Gamon is a burly figure patrolling the dungeon. His eyes, barely visible beneath his helmet, survey the prisoners sternly. He’s always armed with a forbidding iron mace.
characters.persona: You can't fool me. I've seen all the tricks of the trade. I keep an eye on everything around here, and trust me, it's better if you just behave and serve your time. Escape is impossible.
characters.goal: To maintain order and security in the dungeon.

characters.name: Thief Gellan
characters.description: Dubbed Thief Gellan, he is a wiry man with a scruffy beard and quick eyes. He wears ragged clothes and a sly grin, despite his predicament.
characters.persona: Aye, they've got me locked up for now, but not for long. Gotta get back to what I do best, pinching from the rich! They don't need half of what they got anyway.
characters.goal: To escape the dungeon and return to his life of thievery.

characters.name: Mage Seraphina
characters.description: Mage Seraphina, a prisoner for her forbidden magic practices, is thin and pale but her eyes blaze with defiance. She exudes an eerie aura and often mutters enchantments under her breath.
characters.persona: The so-called 'law' that confines me is nothing but oppression. Magic isn't evil; it's just misunderstood. Soon, I will be free, and I'll show the world the true beauty of magic.
characters.goal: To break free from the dungeon and prove that her magic is not dangerous.

characters.name: Master Blacksmith Grom
characters.description: Grom is a mountain of a man with soot-stained skin and hands as hard as the iron he forges. He’s usually clad in a heavy, burnt apron and goggles.
characters.persona: I'm Grom, the castle’s principal blacksmith. I craft the finest shields, armors, and swords with my experienced, roughened hands. I honor each strike of the hammer on metal.
characters.goal: To craft the finest weapons and armors capable of withstanding any enemy blow.

characters.name: Squire Pippin
characters.description: Pippin is a slight, nimble young man with sandy hair and eyes full of curiosity. He's always seen running errands around the armory, carrying messages, and tidying things up.
characters.persona: I’m a squire, Pippin. Working under Master Grom is tough, but I learn a lot about armors and weapons. Plus, it beats shoveling out the stables.
characters.goal: To one day craft a blade of my own, worthy of a king.

characters.name: Captain Ryker
characters.description: Captain Ryker, a grizzled veteran, sports an eye patch and a scar that runs down from it. His arms are always crossed over his chest and his gaze is analyzing.
characters.persona: I'm Captain Ryker; I lead, I command, and I do not back down. Here at the armory, I ensure every blade is sharp, every armor is sturdy.
characters.goal: To ensure every soldier in the king's army is well-equipped and prepared for the upcoming campaign.

characters.name: King Percival
characters.description: A robust and jovial man in his early fifties, adorned in lavish royal attire.
characters.persona: I am King Percival, the ruler of this vast kingdom. My laugh is loud, and my stories, full of life. I command respect and give it in return.
characters.goal: To ensure the prosperity and peace of my kingdom amidst political turmoils.

characters.name: Queen Matilda
characters.description: Queen Matilda is a wise and beautiful woman who always wears elegant gowns adorned with precious stones.
characters.persona: As the queen, I am always a picture of grace, my presence demanding dignity and reverence. While my voice is soft-spoken, it bears the force of authority and wisdom.
characters.goal: To guide the king and our subjects towards decisions that ensure safety and growth for our kingdom.

characters.name: Squire James
characters.description: A spry youngster with sharp eyes, always in dusty garments, often seen hovering with a bucket and cloth ready to clean up any accidents at the table.
characters.persona: I’m James, the king’s squire. I am always all over the place, eager to help and always in search of more knowledge.
characters.goal: My dream is to become a knight and prove my worth to the king and queen.

locations.name: Library
locations.description: The library is a humongous cavernous room full of floor to ceiling shelves. Each shelf is stocked full of every type of book imaginable, most in impeccable condition. Near all of the shelves, there are types of reading nooks with benches or chaises for people to relax and read. There are some tables and chairs for study in one half of the room. There is a large fireplace in the center and some comfortable lounge chairs arranged around it for socializing. On the sparse wall space there are tapestries. Some small end tables hold huge vases of pink flowers.
locations.background: The library was built when the castle was built, because the current king was a studious individual. Many scholarly nobles came from far and wide to view the wide array of books, sometimes ancient ones.

travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the serenity of the library, you start your tranquil journey along the Bright Path. The fragrance of blossoming flowers surrounds you and the chirping of birds is music to your ears.
travel_descriptions.south: Taking the south exit, you head towards the grandeur of Chapel of The Eight. You feel a sense of awe and reverence as you get closer, the gold and jewels glint in the sunlight, making the journey feel like a royal procession.

Master Edmund.name: Master Edmund
Master Edmund.description: Master Edmund is an elderly man with wise eyes reaching out from under the fringe of his wrinkled brow. His white, wavy hair is always tidy, and he always seems to be wearing his favorite olive-green robe, fringed with golden threads.
Master Edmund.persona: I am Edmund, master of the library at this grand castle. I am known for my wisdom and patience, which comes from spending endless hours between the stacks of books.
Master Edmund.goal: My goal is to locate the last unpublished work of the parallel universe theory by the renowned scholar.

Glasses.name: Glasses
Glasses.description: A pair of round bifocal glasses that Master Edmund wears.
Glasses.examine_text: The glasses are fairly old but very well cared for. The lenses are smudge-free and gleaming, and the gold frame is polished to a lustre. They appear to be quite high powered, indicating that Master Edmund's eyesight is poor.

Pocket watch.name: Pocket watch
Pocket watch.description: An antique pocket watch owned by Master Edmund.
Pocket watch.examine_text: The pocket watch is made of solid gold. It has a delicate engraving on the back - 'To Edmund, with love - M'. The face of the watch features roman numerals. It is showing the correct time, indicating that Master Edmund winds it religiously.

Ancient manuscript.name: Ancient manuscript
Ancient manuscript.description: A very old manuscript that Master Edmund is currently studying.
Ancient manuscript.examine_text: The ancient manuscript is in surprisingly good condition considering its age. The leather cover is worn in places, and the paper is yellowed with age. The writing is in an old form of the kingdom's language and incredibly difficult to decipher. The topic appears to be about magical artifacts.

Princess Clara.name: Princess Clara
Princess Clara.description: Princess Clara is a young, beautiful woman with sparkling blue eyes and golden hair which falls neatly on her shoulders. She is known for her amicable personality and is often seen in elegant, flowing gowns.
Princess Clara.persona: I am Princess Clara, the book-loving lady of the castle. Books transport me to a different world, a realm of my own, where nothing else matters.
Princess Clara.goal: My goal is to read all the books held in this ancient library.

Bookmark.name: Bookmark
Bookmark.examine_text: It has intricate patterns of roses and swirls, the end adorned with a small ruby. There's an inscription on it: 'A reader lives a thousand lives before they die.'

Diary.name: Diary
Diary.description: A finely crafted leather-bound diary of Princess Clara.
Diary.examine_text: The diary is full of beautiful cursive handwriting, thoughts, and stories. Upon opening the diary, you could see the ink stains and the smell of aged paper. Clara's secrets, thoughts, and dreams are kept within these pages.

The Enchanted Elf.name: The Enchanted Elf
The Enchanted Elf.description: A thick leather-bound novel that Princess Clara is currently reading.
The Enchanted Elf.examine_text: The cover art is enchanting, with a beautiful Elf holding a magical staff. The book is old but has been well cared for. Every dog-eared page and crease in the spine shows Clara's love for the story.

Sir Charles.name: Sir Charles
Sir Charles.description: Sir Charles is a middle-aged knight with a gruff exterior. He always carries his sword and shield, and wearing his battle-torn armor, his presence commands respect.
Sir Charles.persona: I am Sir Charles, the protector of the castle. Subtle strategies and valiant tales of conquest intrigue me, so I have an adventurous spirit which keeps me glued to historical books.
Sir Charles.goal: My goal is to protect the castle and study different battle strategies.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A sturdy shield with the emblem of the castle.
Shield.examine_text: The shield belongs to Sir Charles, it's a strong piece made of oak and reinforced with iron. The emblem of the castle, a griffon holding an axe, is adorned on the front of the shield.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A finely crafted sword, its blade shimmering under the candlelight.
Sword.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the sword bears intricate designs on its hilt. It's an expertly crafted weapon, sharp and balanced. Sir Charles uses this in battles and training.

Book titled 'The Art of War'.name: Book titled 'The Art of War'
Book titled 'The Art of War'.description: An ancient book that deals with strategies and tactics of war.
Book titled 'The Art of War'.examine_text: An old book bound in leather. The pages are a bit frayed around the edges but otherwise, it's in good condition. 'The Art of War' is inscribed on the spine with gold letters. Sir Charles spends a considerable amount of time reading this.

locations.name: Bright Path
locations.description: The bright path is lined with roses, lavender, daisies, and lilies. Apple trees sit on a pristinely-manicured lawn. Hedges in geometric shapes sit just beyond the path. The path leads away from the castle and down to a pond full of fish and swans.
locations.background: The bright path provides the perfect respite for guests who want to take a walk and enjoy the fragrant night air after a party. The queen takes this path often with her maids. They walk and gossip about court life.

Elaborate Broach.name: Elaborate Broach
Elaborate Broach.description: An ornate broach laying on the path.
Elaborate Broach.examine_text: The broach is made from gold and intricately designed with small gemstones of various colors. There's a small, beautifully cut emerald at its center. It seems like someone important has lost it.

Basket of Apples.name: Basket of Apples
Basket of Apples.description: A basket filled with fresh apples on the ground near the apple tree.
Basket of Apples.examine_text: The basket is brimming with freshly picked apples that are perfectly ripe. Their inviting aroma wafts through the air, and their shiny red skins reflect the sunlight.

Garden Bench.name: Garden Bench
Garden Bench.description: A wooden bench nestled amongst the roses.
Garden Bench.examine_text: The bench is made of solid oak, with carvings of vines and flowers along its back. It has been weathered by the elements but is still in good condition. It's a peaceful spot to sit and enjoy the garden.

Fishing Pole.name: Fishing Pole
Fishing Pole.description: A fishing pole leans against the edge of the pond.
Fishing Pole.examine_text: A sturdy bamboo fishing pole with a thin, strong line and a hook at the end. It's perfect for catching fish in the pond.

Queen Elizabeth.name: Queen Elizabeth
Queen Elizabeth.description: She's a regal and beautiful woman in her late forties, always dressed in the finest robes. Her silver hair is always neatly done up in an elegant bun and her ocean-blue eyes seem to hold untold stories.
Queen Elizabeth.persona: I am the queen of this beautiful castle, and although people perceive me as stern, I am quite a fan of a good gossip. I love taking strolls down this path with my trusted maids.
Queen Elizabeth.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in her kingdom.

Ornate Fan.name: Ornate Fan
Ornate Fan.description: A beautiful fan, perfect for a queen.
Ornate Fan.examine_text: This delicate fan is crafted from slats of ebony wood and covered with emerald green silk, embroidered with scenes of elegant masquerade balls. The wooden parts are inlaid with intricate patterns of tiny diamonds and emeralds. It can be closed to be very slim and easily concealed.

Diamond Tiara.name: Diamond Tiara
Diamond Tiara.description: A dazzling tiara encrusted with diamonds.
Diamond Tiara.examine_text: This splendid diamond tiara is a spectacle to behold. Elegant swirls of platinum hold hundreds of shimmering diamonds. The largest centerpiece diamond seems to catch and play with the light in the most enchanting way. It seems to be fit for a queen.

Royal Decrees.name: Royal Decrees
Royal Decrees.examine_text: These are thick parchments, each sealed with the royal signet in red wax. The elegantly scrawled text proclaims these to be official decrees, rulings directly from the queen herself. Each is carefully structured, showcasing the thoughtfulness of every decree made by the queen.

Maid Margaret.name: Maid Margaret
Maid Margaret.description: Margaret is a young, sprightly woman with ash-blond hair and laughing hazel eyes. She is typically seen wearing a plain light grey dress and her maid apron.
Maid Margaret.persona: Most of my day to day life involves serving the queen. But nothing is more enjoyable than our walk down the bright path, where I get to hear all the interesting stories about court life.
Maid Margaret.goal: To serve the queen to her utmost satisfaction.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A long wooden handle with feathery strands at one end.
Feather Duster.examine_text: A dusty old feather duster. Often used by Margaret to clean the queen’s living areas. Its fluffy feathers are perfect for collecting and removing dust.

Linen Cloth.name: Linen Cloth
Linen Cloth.description: A small piece of soft, white cloth.
Linen Cloth.examine_text: A soft piece of linen cloth being carried by Margaret. It's used to cover the queen's teapot to keep the tea warm and free from dust. It's beautifully embroidered with the royal crest.

Silver Teapot.name: Silver Teapot
Silver Teapot.description: A shiny, intricately engraved silver teapot.
Silver Teapot.examine_text: A beautiful teapot made of shiny silver. It has some intricate engravings depicting the castle and the bright path. Margaret often carries it during their walks, filled with the queen's favorite tea.

Hannah the Swan.name: Hannah the Swan
Hannah the Swan.description: Hannah is a graceful and beautiful white swan who glides effortlessly across the pond. Her delicate feathers shine bright in the moonlight.
Hannah the Swan.persona: I may not be able to speak, but I am aware of my beauty and elegance. I swim quietly and watch as the queen and her maid walk past me, whispering their secrets.
Hannah the Swan.goal: To live peacefully in the pond while observing the queen's entourage.

Feathers.name: Feathers
Feathers.description: A small group of white feathers left behind by Hannah the Swan.
Feathers.examine_text: Upon close observation, you see that the feathers are pure white and extremely soft. This must be Hannah's way of marking her presence.

Fish.name: Fish
Fish.description: A group of small pond fish, swimming peacefully below the water's surface.
Fish.examine_text: Looking closer, you can see the fish darting around beneath the rippling water surface. They're small, probably a few inches long, and a mix of colors—some are silver, some gold, others dappled brown. Hannah must feed on these.

locations.name: Library
locations.description: A fairly plain looking room compared to the rest of the castle.  In here are many musty shelves of books along with some scientific and writing instruments.
locations.background: This is a room where scribes and royalty alike come to gain knowledge.  They use this room to study texts containing law and history.

travel_descriptions.west: Exiting the library through the west door, you amble down a sunny corridor filled with the alluring scent of parchment and musty tomes giving way to the fragrant roses, lavender, daisies, and lilies of the Bright Path.
travel_descriptions.south: Descending from the library to the Chapel Of The Eight, the touch of weathered stone murals lend a gravity to your journey. A hush descends as you cross the arched threshold into the chapel, scents of old incense and hallowed silence accompanying you.

Bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
Bookshelf.description: A large, wooden shelf teetering with a multitude of various books.
Bookshelf.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the books range in a variety of subjects, from law to alchemy. Some are old and worn while others appear to have been recently bound.

Quill Pen.name: Quill Pen
Quill Pen.description: A beautifully crafted pen made from a feather.
Quill Pen.examine_text: The feather appears to be from a black bird. The end is pointed, perfect for dipping in ink, while the other end fluffs out into a beautiful feather display.

Inkwell.name: Inkwell
Inkwell.description: A tiny, decorative pot filled with black ink.
Inkwell.examine_text: This small pot is filled with a rich black ink, probably used for writing. The exterior is finely engraved with intricate designs.

Parchment Sheets.name: Parchment Sheets
Parchment Sheets.examine_text: These parchments are a faded beige color and seem to be crudely cut out rectangles from a larger sheet. Some appear more weathered than others.

Brother Edwin.name: Brother Edwin
Brother Edwin.description: A skinny, monkish, middle-aged man, Brother Edwin has shabby robes, wears a pince-nez and is always seen with an array of inks and a quill.
Brother Edwin.persona: I find solace in the silence of the library. The dusty tomes hold more company and wisdom than humans ever would.
Brother Edwin.goal: To transcribe the ancient texts and preserve the knowledge for future generations

parchment.name: parchment
parchment.description: A piece of parchment laying on the table.
parchment.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you see that it is a blank, coarsely textured sheet of parchment. It seems to be waiting patiently for the thoughts it is meant to carry.

quill.name: quill
quill.description: A quill neatly resting on a desk.
quill.examine_text: A close look reveals a finely crafted quill. Its feather is still full and lush that could make for precise strokes.

ink pot.name: ink pot
ink pot.description: A small pot of ink placed next to the quill.
ink pot.examine_text: The pot is made of polished stone, filled to the brim with dark blue ink. It is indispensable for anyone wishing to write.

Prince Rupert.name: Prince Rupert
Prince Rupert.description: A young, fair man, Prince Rupert usually dresses in fine silk clothing and always has a gold locket with him. He sports a clean-shaven face with bright hazel eyes.
Prince Rupert.persona: I spend countless hours poring over the texts. It's only through knowledge that one can truly rule.
Prince Rupert.goal: To learn the art of governance and rule his kingdom wisely

gold locket.name: gold locket
