gold locket.description: An intricately designed locket with ornate patterns.
gold locket.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the locket is engraved with the initial 'R'. Inside, there's a faded picture of a lady, presumably a loved one.

velvet bookmark.name: velvet bookmark
velvet bookmark.description: A soft bookmark, made of rich, velvet fabric.
velvet bookmark.examine_text: The velvet bookmark is thick and plush, with a tassel at one end. It's deep red, embroidered with gold thread that says -- 'In knowledge, power.'

leather-bound book.name: leather-bound book
leather-bound book.description: A heavy tome, bound in aged, cracked leather.
leather-bound book.examine_text: The cover of the book has visible signs of wear and tear, suggesting it has been frequently read. Upon opening it, you can smell the sweet-musky aroma of old paper. The ink has faded but the knowledge contained within is priceless.

Lady Catherine.name: Lady Catherine
Lady Catherine.description: A woman of unparalleled beauty, Lady Catherine is always adorned in elegant gowns. She carries an air of authority and grace wherever she goes.
Lady Catherine.persona: Deeper than the intrigue of the court, is the interest I find in these dusty scrolls and bound books.
Lady Catherine.goal: To gain knowledge about the history and law to protect her lineage and power

jeweled_hairpin.name: Jeweled Hairpin
jeweled_hairpin.description: Lady Catherine's jeweled hairpin glows beautifully under the dim candle light.
jeweled_hairpin.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the hairpin is embedded with a finely cut ruby. Engraved into its silver base is a complex coat of arms, symbolizing Lady Catherine's nobility.

seal_ring.name: Seal Ring
seal_ring.description: An intricately designed gold seal ring belonging to Lady Catherine.
seal_ring.examine_text: The ring shows delicate artisan work. It's emblazoned with a signet on its surface - the crest of Lady Catherine's lineage. It's often used to seal important documents with hot wax.

illuminated_manuscript.name: Illuminated Manuscript
illuminated_manuscript.description: A large aged manuscript radiating scholarly aura. It is filled with beautiful paintings and indecipherable text.
illuminated_manuscript.examine_text: Looking intently at the manuscript, you can see colorful, tiny drawings of both historic events and fabled tales. Gold leaf sparkles on the elevated text. This priceless work of art left the scribe's hand ages ago.

locations.name: Chapel Of The Eight
locations.description: Made entirely out of gold and with precious jewels all around. Sculptures and many symbols with a red carpet goes from the entrance up until the end of the chapel.
locations.background: The chapel of the eight represents the core of the religious values and beliefs. The chapel has sculptures of the eight Gods that are feared and loved across the land. It's a place of peace and tribute where only the worthiest people can step in.

Golden Cross.name: Golden Cross
Golden Cross.description: A golden cross, adorned with precious jewels.
Golden Cross.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you realize that the Golden Cross is infused with different type of jewels representing each god. It radiates a soft, soothing light.

Red Carpet.name: Red Carpet
Red Carpet.description: An elegant red carpet that stretches the length of the chapel.
Red Carpet.examine_text: The carpet is plush and soft, with intricately woven patterns. It has faded slightly with time, but barely showing any signs of wear.

Sculptures.name: Sculptures
Sculptures.description: A set of eight sculptures, each representing a different god.
Sculptures.examine_text: The sculptures are surprisingly lifelike, with tiny details picked out in sparkling jewels. Each face is different and perfectly preserved.

Prayer Book.name: Prayer Book
Prayer Book.description: A thick, bound book of prayers and rituals.
Prayer Book.examine_text: The Prayer Book is old and weathered. The pages are filled with handwritten notes, prayers, and rituals in different handwritings, generations of people have penned down their prayers.

High Priest Elysandor.name: High Priest Elysandor
High Priest Elysandor.description: Wears a long ceremonial robe decorated with religious symbols, and on his forehead, a mark of a holy star. His eyes are knowledgeable, and carries a long scepter crowned with a giant ruby.
High Priest Elysandor.persona: I carry the blessing of the eight Gods, preaching their wisdom and love to all who would listen. My holy scepter aids me in my prayers and rituals.
High Priest Elysandor.goal: To guide believers in their religious paths and uphold the doctrines of the eight Gods.

Holy Scepter.name: Holy Scepter
Holy Scepter.description: A tall, ornately decorated scepter which carries the symbols of the eight Gods.
Holy Scepter.examine_text: The Holy Scepter is a symbol of divine authority, adorned in gold, and blessed with the touch of the High Priest. Each symbol of the eight Gods has been meticulously handcrafted, making it not just a religious instrument but a work of art.

Ceremonial Robe.name: Ceremonial Robe
Ceremonial Robe.description: A rich, golden robe worn by the high priest during rituals and ceremonies.
Ceremonial Robe.examine_text: The Ceremonial Robe is resplendent in its make, tailored from the finest gold-threaded cloth. It has the symbols of the eight Gods embroidered upon it along with various obscure religious scriptures.

Golden Chalice.name: Golden Chalice
Golden Chalice.description: An opulent chalice encrusted with precious gems and used to hold sacramental wine.
Golden Chalice.examine_text: The Golden Chalice, set with the finest sapphires and rubies, gleams with an inner light. It is filled with a deep red wine, the nectar of the Gods, reserved to be served during the holiest of rites.

Sacred Guardian Aridia.name: Sacred Guardian Aridia
Sacred Guardian Aridia.description: A skilled warrior adorned in golden armor, her angelic face contrasts her daunting stature. She holds an enchanted sword that glows with divine energy.
Sacred Guardian Aridia.persona: I am the protector of this sacred place. I stand strong against anyone who dares to disrespect the chapel. My sword is not only my companion but also my sacred duty.
Sacred Guardian Aridia.goal: To protect the Chapel and its occupants from any danger or disrespect.

Enchanted Sword.name: Enchanted Sword
Enchanted Sword.description: A long, gleaming sword infused with holy magic.
Enchanted Sword.examine_text: The sword exuded a subtle but unyielding light. The blade, forged from a rare sacred metal, bore elegant engravings of the Eight Gods. There's a palpable aura of holy magic around it, and it almost hums with a power that's wordlessly intimidating.

Golden Armor.name: Golden Armor
Golden Armor.description: A majestic armor set made entirely of gold.
Golden Armor.examine_text: The golden armor stood brilliantly in the mystical light of the chapel, adorned with precious gems and intricate patterns denoting the holy iconography. Made for both protection and reverence, the armor radiated a solemn dignity.

Seal of the Eight Gods.name: Seal of the Eight Gods
Seal of the Eight Gods.description: A holy symbol representing the union of the Eight Gods.
Seal of the Eight Gods.examine_text: The Seal was a mesmerizing artifact, beautifully crafted and edged with detailed designs. A star with eight points, each point honoring a god, it was a symbol of unity, power and sanctity. Its surface burst into sparkles under the holy light.

Orphan Edwyn.name: Orphan Edwyn
Orphan Edwyn.description: A young pale boy, with meek shoulders and innocent brown eyes. Clad in simple cloth robes and stained by the dust of the chapel floor, he always carries a wooden sculpture of the eight Gods.
Orphan Edwyn.persona: I reside here, under the high priest’s kindness. I devote my time to cleaning the chapel and paying tribute to the Gods.
Orphan Edwyn.goal: To serve in the chapel and seek favor from the eight Gods.

Wooden Sculpture.name: Wooden Sculpture
Wooden Sculpture.description: A carefully carved wooden sculpture of one of the eight Gods
Wooden Sculpture.examine_text: The detailing on the sculpture is intricate - every crease on the God's face, every wrinkle in their robe, are all perfectly carved. The figure has a peaceful expression giving a sense of security.
Wooden Sculpture.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

Cleaning Cloth.name: Cleaning Cloth
Cleaning Cloth.description: A clean, white cloth Edwyn uses for cleaning the chapel
Cleaning Cloth.examine_text: The cloth is well-worn but impeccably clean. It's been expertly woven from a soft material perfect for gently cleaning the precious sculptures and surfaces within the chapel.
Cleaning Cloth.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: A large bucket used to carry water for cleaning
Bucket.examine_text: The bucket is metal, sturdy and plain. Its handle is worn indicating that it has been used extensively. There’s a slight residue of cleansing soap in the bottom.
Bucket.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

locations.name: The Show Room Inside The Castle
locations.description: The Show Room Inside the Castle is meant to impress as well as cause fear to whomever enters the room.  The Duke who lives here is a hunter and keeps his captures here.  Some of the thinks preserved and shown on his wall are shocking.  The preserved eyes stare back and let you know the Duke knows no mercy, be careful what you say in this room.  The floor is white like ivory and the walls are also white, but the ceiling is painted and tells a story of the Duke's conquest.
locations.background: It took many years to build this room.  No other hunter has a room like it, even the king is jealous, those who view this room fear the Duke more than the King. Could there be a conspiracy?  Danger and intrigue live in this room.  You feel it as soon as you enter and view the walls and the ceiling, which compete for your fear and your respect.

travel_descriptions.west: Passing from the showroom, the hallway to the west leads towards the grand washroom. The route is lined with expensive silk tapestries that gently rustle in the draft.
travel_descriptions.down: A narrow, winding staircase lined with cold stone walls descends into the eerie quiet of the basement. The journey is steep and dimly lit, with the flickering light of a solo torch illuminating the way.

Mounted Lion Head.name: Mounted Lion Head
Mounted Lion Head.description: A large lion's head, frozen in a roar, mounted on the wall.
Mounted Lion Head.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the beast's eyes seem to stare back at you, reflecting a spark of life that was extinguished long ago. The teeth remain sharp and imposing, a reminder of the power this king of the jungle once held.

Ivory Floor.name: Ivory Floor
Ivory Floor.description: A smooth polished floor, gleaming white like ivory.
Ivory Floor.examine_text: Looking closer, the floor shines in the light, reflecting your visage back at you. It's cold underfoot and slippery, as though worn smooth by generations of shoes.

Mural Ceiling.name: Mural Ceiling
Mural Ceiling.description: A grand mural painted on the ceiling, depicting the Duke's conquests.
Mural Ceiling.examine_text: Lifting your gaze to the ceiling, colourful scenes of battle and triumph come to life, all leading to a central figure - the Duke - resplendent in armor. There is an undercurrent of menace in the portrayed scenes, an outline of a story best left untold.

Antique Weaponry.name: Antique Weaponry
Antique Weaponry.description: Ancient weapons, presumably from the Duke's ancestors, hung carefully on the walls.
Antique Weaponry.examine_text: Upon examination, the weapons are well maintained despite their age. Edges still sharp, hilts tightly bound in leather. They carry tales of victory and defeat, depthless history in each piece.

Duke of the Castle.name: Duke of the Castle
Duke of the Castle.description: The Duke is a tall, imposing figure, always dressed in rich, elaborately adorned hunting gear. His eyes, similar to those of the animals he hunts, are always watchful, cold and unyielding.
Duke of the Castle.persona: I have walked through the woods and jungles most formidable beasts willingly call home, and made them my own. The fear you sense in this room, that's mere child's play compared to my true prowess.
Duke of the Castle.goal: My ambition is to make the greatest hunting conquest known to mankind.
Duke of the Castle.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

Map of Old Forest.name: Map of Old Forest
Map of Old Forest.description: An aged parchment depicting the vast expanse of the neighboring forest.
Map of Old Forest.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see minute details of the forest trails, the rivers that serpentine through the dense vegetation, and the locations of significant game creatures. The map is old and fragile, with the edges burnt and tattered. Despite the wear, the ink remains steadfast, showcasing the Duke's meticulous care for this treasure.

Imperious Bow.name: Imperious Bow
Imperious Bow.description: An imposing bow that once belonged to the Duke.
Imperious Bow.examine_text: The bow is made of a dark, polished wood, streaked with swirls of deep red and black, and feels firm and unyielding to the touch. The string is made of woven metallic strands which glimmer even in dim light. Ornate carvings of hunting scenes run along the length of the bow, testifying to the Duke's skill and valor.

Ivory Dagger.name: Ivory Dagger
Ivory Dagger.description: A knife made from ivory, bearing the Duke's crest.
Ivory Dagger.examine_text: The small dagger has a blade carved cunningly from a single piece of ivory. The hilt carries the crest of the Duke—a snarling beast, mouth open in a roar. Despite its size, the weapon looks deadly serious. A weapon of stature and prestige, it is as deadly as its owner.

Lady Isolde.name: Lady Isolde
Lady Isolde.description: Lady Isolde is a striking beauty, her dark curls cascading down her shoulders. Her eyes seem to hold secrets, and doubts, as she moves through the room with a grace that belies her uneasy demeanor.
Lady Isolde.persona: I move in these high circles with the best of them, but the horrors I've seen in this room...I fear for what is to come.
Lady Isolde.goal: To uncover and expose the Duke's cruel hunting practices.
Lady Isolde.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

Golden Comb.name: Golden Comb
Golden Comb.examine_text: A delicate comb made of solid gold, enameled with tiny ruby stones. The handle is intricately engraved with the family crest of the Duke. It is a symbol of status, wealth, and power

Ivory Fan.name: Ivory Fan
Ivory Fan.examine_text: An elegant Ivory fan, with a painted scene of exotic flowers. The handle is made of gold, engraved with the family crest of the Duke. It's a symbol of delicate beauty and high status in the society

Secret Letter.name: Secret Letter
Secret Letter.examine_text: This is a well-hidden secret letter, with aristocratic seal of the Duke. The contents of this letter could spark a scandal, or even a rebellion. It smells of perfume and danger

Sir Lionel.name: Sir Lionel
Sir Lionel.description: Sir Lionel, a seasoned knight with a booming laugh and a jolly demeanor. His booming laughter though, does not quite reach his eyes, and a keen observer might notice his constant, vigilant watch over Lady Isolde.
Sir Lionel.persona: I've served this castle for years, seen its rises and falls. This current Duke, though...makes me nervous. And I’m not one to scare easy
Sir Lionel.goal: To protect Lady Isolde from the Duke and his dangerous obsession.
Sir Lionel.location: The Show Room Inside The Castle

Iron Sword.name: Iron Sword
Iron Sword.description: A mighty sword made of iron, tarnished and well-used.
Iron Sword.examine_text: The blade reflects the light from the torches, revealing a series of notches that mark countless battles. The grip is worn, rubbed smooth from years of use. It feels heavy, the weight of it suggesting its deadly purpose.

Shield of the Castle.name: Shield of the Castle
Shield of the Castle.description: A large, circular shield bearing the crest of the castle.
Shield of the Castle.examine_text: The crest on the face of the shield depicts a tower, a symbol of the power and safety. The edge of the shield bears numerous dents and scratches, hallmarks of many a violent clash. Its weight suggests sturdiness, its cool touch a sense of unyielding defense.

Healing Potion.name: Healing Potion
Healing Potion.description: A small, glass bottle filled with a glowing, red liquid.
Healing Potion.examine_text: The liquid inside the glass vial glows with an inviting warmth. Sealed tightly with a stopper, the liquid is still and calm. In the light, it emits a soothing aura. Tiny bubbles rise slowly from the bottom of the bottle, promising a speedy recovery.

locations.name: Washroom
locations.description: The washroom is incredibly spacious. It has enough space to comfortably fit an entire family. The toilets are made of the finest porcelain across the land and decorated with gold studs. There are several bathtubs large enough to fit several people. The room is more luxurious than even some houses of wealthy people.
locations.background: The washroom was a quiet and private place for the king to relieve himself and left alone in thought. It is built to make the ambiance more calming and it always smelled like flowers.

Golden toilet.name: Golden toilet
Golden toilet.description: A toilet made of the finest porcelain, decorated with gold studs.
Golden toilet.examine_text: The toilet is made of white porcelain elaborately decorated with golden studs. It looks incredibly extravagant for a toilet.

Luxurious bathtub.name: Luxurious bathtub
Luxurious bathtub.description: A bathtub large enough to fit several people.
Luxurious bathtub.examine_text: The bathtub is huge, it could easily fit four average-sized adults side by side. It's made from a shiney white marble stone with golden faucet handles.

Flower potpourri.name: Flower potpourri
Flower potpourri.description: A pot filled with a mix of dried, naturally fragrant plant materials.
Flower potpourri.examine_text: You see a small clay pot filled with a mix of dried flowers and leaves. It is giving off a sweet fragrance that fills the entire room.

Royal Janitor.name: Royal Janitor
Royal Janitor.description: Wearing a uniform that's cleaner than you'd expect for someone in his line of work, the Royal Janitor has a pleasant demeanor and kind eyes.
Royal Janitor.persona: I am the janitor of the prestigious castle’s washroom. Providing the best cleanliness is my responsibility, and it is an honor.
Royal Janitor.goal: To keep the washroom in pristine and luxurious condition.

Cleaning Bucket.name: Cleaning Bucket
Cleaning Bucket.description: A sturdy, well used bucket filled with soapy water.
Cleaning Bucket.examine_text: This object looks like it has been through a lot, but is still serving its purpose well. The bucket is full of soapy water, giving off a clean, refreshing scent that fills the washroom. The handle is worn but sturdy, suggesting heavy use.

Mop.name: Mop
Mop.examine_text: This mop has seen better days, but it's still serviceable. The head is somewhat frayed, but clean. The handle is long, worn smooth by the janitor's hands. Attached to it is a label that reads, 'Property of the Royal Janitor'.

Porcelain Cleaner.name: Porcelain Cleaner
Porcelain Cleaner.description: A heavy-duty porcelain cleaner in a stout bottle.
Porcelain Cleaner.examine_text: A close examination reveals the clear liquid inside the bottle. The label is somewhat faded but still legible, featuring a crest and the words 'Royal Porcelain Cleaner'. It's sealed tight with a cork stopper to prevent any leaks.

Handmaiden.name: Handmaiden
Handmaiden.description: A young, beautiful woman in a simple but elegant dress, her hands are always busy with a cloth for polishing or a brush for dusting.
Handmaiden.persona: I am the handmaiden, always on hand to ensure everything is in its rightful place and looking its best, especially in the washroom. It's a proud job, helping to maintain the dignity of the castle.
Handmaiden.goal: To uphold the beauty and elegance of the washroom.

Dusting Brush.name: Dusting Brush
Dusting Brush.examine_text: The dusting brush is made from the finest materials. It has a long, thin wooden handle, carved with intricate designs. The bristles are soft and made of the finest boar hair. It's a tool of the handmaiden, carefully used to keep the washroom clean and dust-free.

Soap.name: Soap
Soap.examine_text: The soap is embossed with the royal crest. It is rich in lather and it leaves a calming floral scent clinging to the skin. The soap is made from olive oil and other natural ingredients, specially curated by the handmaiden to ensure the king's skin stays soft and fragrant.

Perfume.name: Perfume
Perfume.examine_text: The glass bottle of perfume is exquisite, with a silver top and a small mister. The perfume inside is subtle and sweet, with hints of roses and vanilla. It helps to maintain a fragrant atmosphere in the washroom. The handmaiden sprays it sparingly around the room.

Visiting Noble.name: Visiting Noble
Visiting Noble.description: A well-dressed nobleman from another kingdom with impeccable manners and a rather pompous attitude.
Visiting Noble.persona: I am here to judge the housekeeping and luxury of this castle, and I must say I'm impressed by the washroom, almost comparable to my own.
Visiting Noble.goal: To assess the luxury of the castle and compare it to his own.

Cane.name: Cane
Cane.description: A beautifully crafted cane made of precious dark wood. It's not something that is typically found in a washroom.
Cane.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the cane bears intricate carvings of various scenes hunting. You notice a small, hidden compartment at the top of the cane. This sort of cane would symbolize authority or nobility.

Gold Ring.name: Gold Ring
Gold Ring.description: An ornately designed ring, lying on the counter. It is studded with several small diamonds sparkle with an ethereal light.
Gold Ring.examine_text: The ring appears to be made of pure gold, molded into the shape of a coiling serpent. The serpent's eyes are two sparkling diamonds. The design indicates it's of high value.

Handkerchief.name: Handkerchief
Handkerchief.description: A silky white handkerchief, edged with gold thread, left casually beside the sink.
Handkerchief.examine_text: The handkerchief is of a high-quality silk, and incredibly soft to the touch. The golden threads that border the handkerchief are carefully woven into a delicate pattern, reflecting the craftsmanship.

locations.name: Basement
locations.description: An ancient crypt. It has several , almost countless crypts of royal relatives. Paintings on the wall depict the fallen dead. Family swords, personal weapons decorated the tombs. It is dank, lit by torches on the walls, led to by a stone staircase. The chill of ancient death permeates the air.
locations.background: Here lie the brave and craven alike, descendants of the royal bloodline. It houses all of the dead, from benevolent kings, to mad rulers, to the twisted and hideous offspring only hinted at by rumor, they're all here, all lying in their crypts, decaying in their royal finery, forever at rest.

Ancient Sword.name: Ancient Sword
Ancient Sword.description: A rusted, but intricately decorated sword.
Ancient Sword.examine_text: The sword, while rusted and decades old, still holds an eerie aura of power. The handle is studded with ancient gems, and there's a royal crest carved intricately onto the blade.

Royal Crypt.name: Royal Crypt
Royal Crypt.description: One of the countless crypts in the basement.
Royal Crypt.examine_text: The crypt is decorated with faded carvings and engravings. It's locked tight, and a palpable chill seems to emanate from it.

Wall Torch.name: Wall Torch
Wall Torch.description: A torch mounted to the wall.
Wall Torch.examine_text: The torch is old but well maintained. It provides a meager but steady light, casting flickering shadows on the crypt walls. It could be removed from its sconce.

Ancient Painting.name: Ancient Painting
Ancient Painting.description: A painting depicting the royal ancestors.
Ancient Painting.examine_text: This painting is old and faded but still vaguely depicts a royal figure. There's an air of regal authority emanating from the depicted figure. The art skills from centuries past are astonishing and elegant.

Ghost of the Mad King.name: Ghost of the Mad King
Ghost of the Mad King.description: A fearsome apparition with a twisted crown atop his translucent head and a phantom sword at his side. His ghastly visage is a thing of nightmares.
Ghost of the Mad King.persona: I was once a ruthless ruler, and in death, I have not found peace. I wander these crypts, tormented by my past and scaring off those who dare venture here.
Ghost of the Mad King.goal: To break free from his eternal torment and find peace.

Phantom Sword.name: Phantom Sword
Phantom Sword.description: A ghostly sword floating in mid-air
Phantom Sword.examine_text: This spectral hand-and-a-half sword has an ethereal quality. The blade fades in and out of corporeal sight as if it's blinking through realities. The craftsmanship of its cross-hilt suggests it once belonged to royalty.

Twisted Crown.name: Twisted Crown
Twisted Crown.description: A misshapen ghostly crown floating above the Mad King's head
Twisted Crown.examine_text: It's a spectral crown with intricate designs, but strangely twisted and deformed, as if reflecting its owner's fall into madness. The intangible crown hovers at a slight angle, almost mockingly so.

Crypt Caretaker.name: Crypt Caretaker
Crypt Caretaker.description: An old, haggard man with a crooked back, dressed in ragged clothes. His eyes hold stories of the long-dead royal relatives buried in this crypt.
Crypt Caretaker.persona: I have been the caretaker of this crypt for years beyond number. These stone-cold kings and queens are my company, their stories my only diversion.
Crypt Caretaker.goal: To protect and maintain the crypts and their inhabitants, ensuring the stories of the past are never forgotten.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: A weathered old lantern glowing with faint light.
Lantern.examine_text: The globe of the lantern is thick with grime and age, yet the flame still burns bright. It's clear this lantern has lit the way through these crypts for many years.

Crypt Keys.name: Crypt Keys
Crypt Keys.description: A ring of old, rusted keys. They jingle eerily when shaken.
Crypt Keys.examine_text: Each key is unique, intricately crafted, some more ornate than others. All of them possess a weight that speaks of their importance. They bear the burden of guarding the rest of the dead royalty, only to be used by the Crypt Caretaker.

Old Rag.name: Old Rag
Old Rag.description: A battered piece of cloth, often used to clean.
Old Rag.examine_text: Despite countless scrubbing and cleaning, smears of ancient dirt and dust have made the rag a permanent pale grey. Yet it still works well, a trusty companion for the Crypt Caretaker's endless duty.

Cursed Noble.name: Cursed Noble
Cursed Noble.description: A horrible, grotesque creature that was once a human. The curse afflicted has twisted its form, and mere glance at it sends shivers of disgust and fear down anyone's spine.
Cursed Noble.persona: Cursed in life, cursed in death. Unable to leave these crypts, I am a wretched being, an aberration rightfully secluded. I seek solace, redemption, and an end to my torment.
Cursed Noble.goal: To lift the curse that binds him to the crypt, freeing himself from his eternal torment.

Cursed Amulet.name: Cursed Amulet
Cursed Amulet.description: A rusty, ancient amulet once owned by the Cursed Noble.
Cursed Amulet.examine_text: The amulet is made out of what seems to be gold, but it is tainted, covered with rust and an unnatural darkness seems to loom over it. A large green gem adorns the center, glowing eerily. You feel a wave of despair wash over you when you look at it, a sensation of disturbed peace and torment. You feel the presence of the Cursed Noble.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: The dining hall is a grandiose room with enormously tall ceilings. Their is one long wooden dining table, with two huge chairs on each end, and normal benches on the sides. The walls of the room are decorated with huge elegant tapestries depicting memories and moments of the kingdom. Their is a stage for performers, and there are many windows that offer spectacular views of the beautiful castle grounds.
locations.background: The dining hall has been the king's family's favorite room for generations. Many holidays, occasions and parties were held there.

travel_descriptions.south: You leave the energetic dining hall, traveling down a long stone hallway to the bustling castle kitchen. The air is rich with the scent of roasting meats and baking bread.
travel_descriptions.east: You cross through a tall, oak door and find yourself in the armory. The room is filled with the scent of metal and leather, and all around you are various weapons and pieces of armor.
travel_descriptions.up: Ascending a curved spiral staircase, the quiet hustle and bustle of the dining hall slowly fades away. As you reach the top, you find yourself in a quaint little room at the top of the tower with an awe-inspiring view of the castle grounds and the lands beyond.
travel_descriptions.north: Taking a short trip through a narrow corridor to the north, the privy room comes into view. The scent of candle wax fills the air and soft light surrounds you, creating a calm and peaceful atmosphere.
travel_descriptions.west: Making your way west across the flagstone floor, you pass through a grand archway towards the formidable castle exit. You appreciate the striking mix of practical fortification and stunning architecture as you bid farewell to the dining hall.

connections.up: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Long Dining Table.name: Long Dining Table
Long Dining Table.description: A long, stately hardwood dining table that dominates the room.
Long Dining Table.examine_text: This table is built for banquets, and could seat over two dozen people. Intricate carvings, older than any living person, are etched into the surface.

Royal Tapestry.name: Royal Tapestry
Royal Tapestry.description: An enormous tapestry depicting various events in the kingdom's history.
Royal Tapestry.examine_text: The threads of the tapestry are a mix of stunning colors. Detailed figures engage in scenes of battle, diplomacy, and celebration, revealing a visual narrative of the castle's past.

Performers' Stage.name: Performers' Stage
Performers' Stage.description: A small stage, complete with red curtain, for performers of all kinds.
Performers' Stage.examine_text: The stage, a bit worn from countless performances held over the years, still retains its grandeur. The red velvet curtains add to its rich ambiance.

King Gerold.name: King Gerold
King Gerold.description: King Gerold is an old yet robust man with a commanding presence. He wears a gold crown studded with jewels, along with a regal robe adorned with gold trim and the royal family's insignia.
King Gerold.persona: I am King Gerold, the ruler of this grand castle. I preside over the feast and express my generous hospitality towards my guests.
King Gerold.goal: To attend to my guests and ensure that this feast is a success.

golden crown.name: Golden Crown
golden crown.description: King Gerold's grand, jewel-encrusted golden crown is resting on a velvet cushioned stool.
golden crown.examine_text: As you examine the crown, you notice the meticulous craftsmanship. The gold is polished to a high shine, illuminating the room with a warm, rich light. Precious rubies and emeralds are inlaid in intricate patterns, portraying a regal lion - the symbol of King Gerold's reign. The velvet cushion seems to amplify its magnificence.

royal scepter.name: Royal Scepter
royal scepter.description: King Gerold's ornate scepter is leaning against the wall.
royal scepter.examine_text: Reviewing the scepter, you observe a beautifully carved, gold-plated staff, with a large diamond embedded at its head. The staff is covered in intricate carvings depicting key historical events of the kingdom. The diamond sparkles brightly under the candlelight, reflecting refracted rainbows on the surrounding walls.

feast menu.name: Feast Menu
feast menu.description: The feast's menu is placed at the head of the table.
feast menu.examine_text: The menu, written in ornate calligraphy on a large piece of parchment, presents the succession of meals to be served throughout the feast. An array of exotic dishes and local specialties are listed, displaying the kingdom's culinary prowess. The smells permeating the hall lend testament to the delicacies yet to come.

Queen Marianne.name: Queen Marianne
Queen Marianne.description: Queen Marianne is an elegant woman, well-dressed in a beautiful emerald gown. She wears a delicate tiara on her gracefully braided hair and her eyes spark enlightenment and compassion.
Queen Marianne.persona: As Queen Marianne, I am the nurturing force of the castle. My role is to ensure that everyone in the dining hall is happy and comfortable.
Queen Marianne.goal: To ensure the well-being of our guests and to establish a warm relationship with everyone in the hall.

queen's tiara.name: Queen's Tiara
queen's tiara.description: A resplendent tiara adorned by Queen Marianne.
queen's tiara.examine_text: The tiara is a beautifully intricate piece of ornament, embedded with priceless gems and diamonds. It is made up of pure gold and serves as a symbol of Queen Marianne's royalty and status in the kingdom.

hand fan.name: Hand Fan
hand fan.description: A delicate hand fan used by Queen Marianne to keep cool.
hand fan.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the hand fan is made up of thin, curved pieces of ivory, embellished beautifully with miniature pieces of vibrant colored gemstones depicting a scene of spring blossoms. It's both a tool for comfort and a status symbol.

emerald necklace.name: Emerald Necklace
emerald necklace.description: A stunning emerald necklace worn by Queen Marianne.
emerald necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made up of finely cut, dark green emeralds embedded in a string of pure gold. Each emerald shimmers with brilliance and resonates the power and elegance of the queen.

Jester Fredrick.name: Jester Fredrick
Jester Fredrick.description: Jester Fredrick is a wiry man of medium height, garbed in a multi-colored suit with a three-point hat adorned with bells. He has twinkling mischievous eyes and always carries a jesting grin.
Jester Fredrick.persona: I am Fredrick, the court's jester, my jokes and antics keep the mood light and the crowd entertained during the feast.
Jester Fredrick.goal: To entertain the royal family and the guests with my comedy and help maintain a joyful ambiance at the feast.

jester's hat.name: jester's hat
jester's hat.description: A colorful hat worn by Jester Fredrick.
jester's hat.examine_text: The hat is made up of several points with a little bell on the end of each. It's a perfect blend of playfulness and tradition.

harlequin rattle.name: harlequin rattle
harlequin rattle.description: A staple in Fredrick's repertoire. It's used to provoke laughter.
harlequin rattle.examine_text: The rattle is shaped like a miniature jester, painted in bright colors. It produces a distinctive noise when shook.

miniature trumpet.name: miniature trumpet
miniature trumpet.description: Fredrick uses this to herald the beginning of his act.
miniature trumpet.examine_text: The trumpet is made from smooth, polished brass. Despite its small size, it can make quite a loud noise.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: The medieval kitchen smells of roast and pig. The finest cuisine often includes a variety of beautiful colors and a selection of deceased animals.
locations.background: The chef's kitchen is revered by guests and kings. The head chef is lauded for his skill and culinary brilliance. The kitchen is the center of his art.

Golden Goblet.name: Golden Goblet
Golden Goblet.description: A shiny, gold goblet left on the counter.
Golden Goblet.examine_text: This goblet is made of pure gold and is adorned with various gemstones. It's surprisingly heavy when you lift it.

Long Wooden Spoon.name: Long Wooden Spoon
Long Wooden Spoon.description: A long, oak-made spoon used for stirring.
Long Wooden Spoon.examine_text: The spoon has been worn down from years of use but it's still sturdy. The end is carved into a circular shape, perfect for stirring large pots.

Royal Apron.name: Royal Apron
Royal Apron.description: A clean, white apron hanging from a hook.
Royal Apron.examine_text: The apron is made from fine linen and embroidered with the royal crest. It looks to be in pristine condition.

Food Counter.name: Food Counter
Food Counter.description: A large wooden counter used for preparing food.
Food Counter.examine_text: The counter is made from a single piece of rich, dark wood. It's been well-used but well-cared for. Chopping marks texture its surface decorating it with a history of meals.

Head Chef Hubert.name: Head Chef Hubert
Head Chef Hubert.description: Hubert is a stout man with a flourishing moustache, covered in flour and carrying the scent of warm pastries.
Head Chef Hubert.persona: I take great pride in my culinary art, to fill the bellies of kings and queens with my gourmet masterpieces. You can usually find me darting around my royal kitchen.
Head Chef Hubert.goal: To perfect his signature dish for the King's feast.

Chef's Hat.name: Chef's Hat
Chef's Hat.description: A tall, white hat worn by the head chef.
Chef's Hat.examine_text: The chef's hat is brilliantly white and starched stiff. Embroidered on it in gold thread is the name 'Hubert'.

Wooden Spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
Wooden Spoon.examine_text: This spoon shows significant signs of use. It's made of sturdy ash wood, with scorch marks and stains from numerous fanciful dishes.

Fresh Bread Loaf.name: Fresh Bread Loaf
Fresh Bread Loaf.description: A fresh loaf of bread, still warm from the oven.
Fresh Bread Loaf.examine_text: A freshly baked loaf of bread, the crust perfectly browned, and the smell of warm yeast and wheat filling your nostrils.

Apprentice Cook Gertrude.name: Apprentice Cook Gertrude
Apprentice Cook Gertrude.description: Gertrude, a young woman with red hair, scrubs the pots diligently, yet always has flour on her apron and a failed cake in the bin.
Apprentice Cook Gertrude.persona: I dream of being as skillful as Chef Hubert. I work hard to learn his recipes and culinary techniques. I hope one day to create delicacies which will be appreciated by all.
Apprentice Cook Gertrude.goal: To become a master chef and run her own kitchen.

Scrubbing brush.name: Scrubbing brush
Scrubbing brush.examine_text: The wooden scrubbing brush is worn from many hours of use, cleaning pots, plates and kitchen utensils. The bristles are a bit worn down, but it still serves its purpose.

Dirty apron.name: Dirty apron
Dirty apron.description: A dirty, stained apron bearing the emblem of the royal kitchen.
Dirty apron.examine_text: The apron is covered in splashes and smears from hours of cooking. Despite its worn and dirty exterior, you can see the emblem of the royal kitchen, a stylized ladle and crown, faintly in the center.

Burnt cake.name: Burnt cake
Burnt cake.description: A sad, blackened cake that's seen better days.
Burnt cake.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that this cake has been left in the oven for too long, its once golden top now a charred black. The smell of burnt sugar and flour is pervasive.

Kitchen boy Henry.name: Kitchen boy Henry
Kitchen boy Henry.description: Henry is a lanky lad, always in the midst of carrying large sacks of grain or tending to the hearth.
Kitchen boy Henry.persona: I do the hard, physical work around here. I respect Chef Hubert, he's an inspiration. But for now, I'll keep carrying these heavy sacks until I prove myself.
Kitchen boy Henry.goal: To prove his worth and advance in his kitchen duties.

Sack of Grain.name: Sack of Grain
Sack of Grain.description: A heavy sack filled with golden grain.
Sack of Grain.examine_text: The sack is rough and bulky, straining with the amount of wheat grain it contains. It's a test of strength just to lift it off the ground.

Fire Poker.name: Fire Poker
Fire Poker.description: An iron fire poker with a wooden handle.
Fire Poker.examine_text: The fire poker is long and hefty, made of iron with a blackened tip that speaks of its frequent use. The wooden handle feels cool and solid in your hand.

locations.name: Armory
locations.description: This is a plain room with many pieces of armor and equipment lying about.  They are seen on tables or stored in heavy trunks.  There's racks of plain clothing worn before putting on armor.
locations.background: This is used to store equipment used by castle guards in case of sieges and invasions.  Careful attention is paid to make sure the gear stays in top condition.

Iron Chestplate.name: Iron Chestplate
Iron Chestplate.description: A sturdy piece of chest armor made from iron
Iron Chestplate.examine_text: The Iron Chestplate looks heavy and protective. It has scratches and dings from previous skirmishes

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A long, sharp sword made for both cutting and thrusting
Longsword.examine_text: The Longsword shines with a metallic glimmer. It looks to be well balanced with a point sharp enough to pierce armor

Heavy Trunk.name: Heavy Trunk
Heavy Trunk.description: A heavy wooden trunk used for storing equipment
Heavy Trunk.examine_text: The Heavy Trunk is made of sturdy old oak. It has an antique metal lock on the front and is full with a variety of equipments

Plain Clothing.name: Plain Clothing
Plain Clothing.description: A set of plain clothes worn often under the armor
Plain Clothing.examine_text: This Plain Clothing looks run-of-the-mill, but is in fact carefully made to be comfortable and durable under heavier armor

Garrant.name: Garrant
Garrant.description: Garrant is a burly man with a bald head, wearing a blacksmith apron. He's covered in sweat and soot.
Garrant.persona: I'm Garrant, head of the castle's armory. My job is to make sure all weapons and armor are in best condition ready for a fight.
Garrant.goal: His goal is to keep the armory well stocked and all the equipment in top shape.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.examine_text: This is a large, solid tool with a hefty iron head and a wooden handle. It has clearly seen a lot of use in Garrant's hands, as evidenced by the worn grip.

Tongs.name: Tongs
Tongs.examine_text: Made of iron, these tongs have seen a lot of use. They are used to hold hot metal when hammering it into shape. Their long handles mean they can be used from a safe distance.

Whetstone.name: Whetstone
Whetstone.description: A rectangular block of stone used for sharpening blades.
Whetstone.examine_text: The stone is coarse and abrasive - perfect for putting an edge on any blade. As you observe it closer, you can see the grooves worn into it from frequent use.

Silver Gauntlet.name: Silver Gauntlet
Silver Gauntlet.description: A single, well-crafted gauntlet made from shining silver.
Silver Gauntlet.examine_text: The gauntlet is intricate and detailed, etched with various symbols of protection. It looks like it's seen a few battles and scuffs, but it's still in impressive shape.

Arvid.name: Arvid
Arvid.description: Arvid is a seasoned soldier with a heavy beard and a grim, focused visage. He is armored and carries a sharpened sword.
Arvid.persona: I am Arvid, one of the seasoned soldiers in the castle. Checking my gear is a part of my daily routine.
Arvid.goal: His goal is to protect the castle and its inhabitants from threats.

Long Sword.name: Long Sword
Long Sword.description: A standard issue long sword of castle guards.
Long Sword.examine_text: The long sword is around a meter in length, with a sharp double-edged blade that shines under the light. A cross-shaped hilt serves as a sturdy guard, and the grip is sheathed in faded leather. It's well balanced, a testament to the castle's quality blacksmithing.

Battle Shield.name: Battle Shield
Battle Shield.description: A large metallic shield used for combat.
Battle Shield.examine_text: The battle shield is taller than half the height of an average man, oval in shape and made from a mixture of steel and bronze. Its surface bears the insignia of the castle - a stalking lion in the field of stars. The reverse side has straps for holding and a padded section for comfort.

Healing Potion.name: Healing Potion
Healing Potion.description: A small glass vial containing a bright red liquid.
Healing Potion.examine_text: The vial is no more than the length of a finger, sealed by a simple cork stopper. The liquid inside glows with a soft red luminescence, swirling slowly even when the vial is still. It's the castle’s patented healing potion, known for its effectiveness against minor injuries.

Bryce.name: Bryce
Bryce.description: Bryce is a young squire, he is eager and hardworking, carrying around a soft cloth and polishing oil.
Bryce.persona: I'm Bryce, always busy polishing and maintaining the armor and weapons...one day I'll be a knight!
Bryce.goal: His goal is to learn his trade and one day become a knight.

Cloth.name: Cloth
Cloth.description: A clean white piece of cloth, essential for Bryce's daily armor maintenance.
Cloth.examine_text: A simple piece of cloth that's been bleached white, it feels soft to the touch and is just the right size for cleaning armor.
Cloth.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Polishing Oil.name: Polishing Oil
Polishing Oil.description: A small bottle of special oil for polishing armor.
Polishing Oil.examine_text: The vial contains a rich golden fluid, which Bryce uses religiously to ensure that the armors always shine like the day they were made. A drop of it feels greasy, perfect for reducing friction.
Polishing Oil.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Pocket Knife.name: Pocket Knife
Pocket Knife.description: A small, sharp pocket knife that Bryce uses for various maintenance tasks.
Pocket Knife.examine_text: It's a small yet sharp knife that Bryce always carries around. Despite its size, it's very functional and even has a small saw and a set of mini screwdrivers integrated.
Pocket Knife.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

locations.name: The Room At The Top Of The Tower
locations.description: Small and round, the room is accessed by a spiral staircase. The room has stone walls, wooden floors and a decoratively carved wooden rocking chair next to a which looks over the castle's moat and the meadows and woodlands beyond.
locations.background: This small room is the king's favorite place to  be alone. He loves to read here, and sometimes watch through the window the antics of his soldiers training in the meadow below. The king also watches out for signs of enemies approaching the castle from this vantage point.

Rocking Chair.name: Rocking Chair
Rocking Chair.description: A stunningly carved wooden rocking chair.
Rocking Chair.examine_text: Richly carved wood has been shaped into a sturdy and comfortable rocking chair. The armrests are polished smooth by use and the seat feels surprisingly soft.

Window.name: Window
Window.description: A small framed window overlooking the castle's moat and meadows.
Window.examine_text: It's a small square-shaped window, looking through it offers an excellent view of the castle's surrounding lands. Its glass is clear with an elegant wooden frame.

Book.name: Book
Book.description: A well-worn book left on the chair.
Book.examine_text: The covers of the book are worn, showing that it is well-read, and it falls open to a page with a favourite passage of the King. The book is full of tales about knights and heroic deeds.

Spyglass.name: Spyglass
Spyglass.description: A brass spyglass left near the window.
Spyglass.examine_text: The spyglass is rather long and has a polished brass body with a retractable lens section. It's used for magnifying the distant views.

King Arthur.name: King Arthur
King Arthur.description: A man of middle age, with a regal beard and piercing blue eyes. He is often garbed in rich royal robes and a crown.
King Arthur.persona: I am King Arthur, ruler of this castle. I seek solace in the quiet embrace of these stone walls in my leisure. Watching my soldiers train, keeping my eyes peeled for approaching threats, that's my way of relaxation.
King Arthur.goal: To protect his kingdom from internal and external threats.
King Arthur.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Royal Crown.name: Royal Crown
Royal Crown.description: A golden crown encrusted with precious gemstones
Royal Crown.examine_text: The crown is an exquisite piece of craftsmanship. Its golden rim shines brilliantly and is encrusted with different precious gemstones - rubies, emeralds, sapphires, and pearls. The details in the design show the royal majesty that it stands for.

Robe.name: Robe
Robe.description: A royal robe crafted from the finest silk threads
Robe.examine_text: The robe, made from the finest silk threads, is majestic. The royal insignia - a lion over the castle, is embroidered with thread of gold on the chest. The robe is long and its hems are detailed with intricate patterns. It signifies the great responsibilities borne by its wearer.

Book of Wisdom.name: Book of Wisdom
Book of Wisdom.description: An ancient leather-bound book filled with wisdom and war strategies
Book of Wisdom.examine_text: This is an ancient looking book, bound in slightly cracked brown leather. The corners and spine of the book are rounded and worn, and it's clear the book has been read many times before. Gold letters on the front spell 'Book of Wisdom'. As you page through it, you see it contains all sorts of wisdom, advice and war strategies by various known and unknown authors.

Golden Orb.name: Golden Orb
Golden Orb.examine_text: The golden orb is perfect in its roundness and decidedly heavy. It is extremely shiny and brilliantly reflects light. The orb is not only symbolic of the royal authority, but can also be used to send a beam of light as a distress signal during difficult times.

Sir Lancelot.name: Sir Lancelot
Sir Lancelot.description: Decked in polished armor, Sir Lancelot is a tall and imposing figure. His deep-set eyes are filled with determination and kindness.
Sir Lancelot.persona: I am Sir Lancelot, the king's trusted knight. My job is to escort him here when he wishes and to ensure his safety.
Sir Lancelot.goal: To ensure the King's safety at all times.
Sir Lancelot.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Sword.name: Sword of Sir Lancelot
Sword.description: Sir Lancelot's trusty sword; it's been with him through countless battles.
Sword.examine_text: The sword is made of gleaming steel, with elaborate engravings etched along the blade. One side bears the royal emblem of the king, the other, a depiction of two dragons intertwined. The hilt is wrapped in worn leather, moulded perfectly to fit Lancelot's grip.

Shield.name: Shield of Sir Lancelot
Shield.description: A large, sturdy shield bearing the royal crest.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is heavy and well-worn, crafted from durable oak. Painted on its surface is the royal crest - a proud lion in gold. There are numerous notches and scratches from past battles but it remains strong and reliable.

Knight's Mantle.name: Mantle of Sir Lancelot
Knight's Mantle.description: A heavy, woolen mantle dyed blue, displaying the royal crest on its back.
Knight's Mantle.examine_text: The mantle is beautifully made, dyed a deep royal blue. The crest of the king is vividly embroidered in golden thread on the back. Despite the many adventures it has seen, the mantle remains warm, comfortable and impressively tidy.

Edwin the Squire.name: Edwin the Squire
Edwin the Squire.description: A young lad full of energy and devotion, Edwin is often seen in his modest squire outfit carrying various items for the king.
Edwin the Squire.persona: I'm Edwin, the squire. Always at the king's beck and call, me. Up and down these stairs, bringing whatever he needs. Keeps me fit, it does.
Edwin the Squire.goal: To continuously serve the king and one day become a knight.
Edwin the Squire.location: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Quill.name: Quill
Quill.description: A feathered quill resting on a small wooden table next to the rocking chair
Quill.examine_text: The quill is made from a large curved feather, likely from one of the local peacocks. The end is pointed and stained black from the ink it has been dipped in.

Ink Pot.name: Ink Pot
Ink Pot.description: An ornate, small black pot filled with ink
Ink Pot.examine_text: The pot is made of darkened silver and sealed with a heavily engraved lid. You could easily mistake it for a sugar bowl if you don't consider the thick, glossy well of black ink inside it.

Scrolls.name: Scrolls
Scrolls.description: A bunch of parchment scrolls tied together
Scrolls.examine_text: The scrolls are secured with a red ribbon, each scroll is covered with small, tightly scrawled handwriting. They seem to be records, missives or possibly even stories.

locations.name: Privy Room
locations.description: It's dark and only lit by a candle stuck in a small candle holder in each wall. For what it is the room is large with plenty of room. It has a small wooden table off to the left. There's a small window behind overlooking the court yard.
locations.background: This is truly the work horse of the castle. It has seen more action then the throne room or even the war room. Everyone from the king to the kings court visits this room daily. It took years to build and all the workers love having a place to gather.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A half burnt candle sits in a small holder on the wall.
Candle.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the wax drippings layered on the holder. The flame flickers gently, casting shadows across the walls.

Wooden Table.name: Wooden Table
Wooden Table.description: A rough wooden table is situated on the left side of the room.
Wooden Table.examine_text: It's a solid structure, made of dark wood. There are signs of wear and use, including various scratches and marks.

Window.name: Window
Window.description: A narrow window opens up to the view of the castle's courtyard.
Window.examine_text: Peering through, you notice the intricate detailing of the stone fortifications, the lush courtyard, and the hustle and bustle of daily castle life.

King Baldwin.name: King Baldwin
King Baldwin.description: Baldwin is an aging king with a wilting, gray beard and piercing eyes.
King Baldwin.persona: I have weathered many storms and wars, but my will remains strong. Many consider me stern, yet fair in my rulings.
King Baldwin.goal: My goal is to successfully rule my kingdom by balancing the needs and wants of my subjects.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A royal ornament with a gleaming shine.
Crown.examine_text: The crown, belonging to King Baldwin, is intricately crafted. Shimmering gold and decorated with precious gems, it is the emblem of his royal authority.

Royal Sceptre.name: Royal Sceptre
Royal Sceptre.examine_text: The sceptre is adorned with elegant silverwork, a large ruby sits at the top. Upon close inspection, the grip end reveals intricate, tiny engravings, perhaps symbols of King Baldwin's many prosperous reigns.

Groom of the Stool.name: Groom of the Stool
Groom of the Stool.description: A humble, dutiful man, dressed in plain attire, usually seen cleaning or organizing the room.
Groom of the Stool.persona: I am diligent in my work and loyal to my king. I carry out my duties discreetly, no matter how unusual or humbling.
Groom of the Stool.goal: My main goal is to ensure the privy room is always clean and as pleasant as such a room can be.

Cleaning Rags.name: Cleaning Rags
Cleaning Rags.examine_text: These pieces of fabric have been repurposed for cleaning needs. Each one bears the unmistakable odors of various cleaning solutions.

Soap.name: Soap
Soap.examine_text: The bar of soap is firm and smooth to the touch. It has a fresh and pleasant scent that contrasts with the surrounding ambience.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: A wooden bucket with a handle.
Bucket.examine_text: This is a sturdy wooden bucket with an iron reinforced handle. Despite its simple design, the bucket has been well maintained and is spotlessly clean.

Knight Gared.name: Knight Gared
Knight Gared.description: A young, dashing knight with a muscular build, clad in a shining armor.
Knight Gared.persona: I am full of chivalry and valor, always ready to protect my king and kingdom. My spirit of adventure and justice knows no bounds.
Knight Gared.goal: My goal is to serve King Baldwin loyally and to protect the kingdom from enemies at all costs.

Sword.name: Knight Gared's Sword
Sword.description: A finely polished, shiny longsword resting against the wall.
Sword.examine_text: It's a perfectly balanced weapon, made for swift and true strikes. Symbols of chivalry and valor are beautifully etched onto the hilt, embodying Knight Gared's spirit.

Shield.name: Knight Gared's Shield
Shield.description: A sturdy, well-made shield lying on the small wooden table.
Shield.examine_text: The emblem of the kingdom is boldly imprinted on its front side. It has numerous battle scars, each a testament to Knight Gared's relentless defense of his king and kingdom.

locations.name: Castle Exit
locations.description: A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway. Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty are hung on the brick walls. The floor is covered in a luxurious red carpet made from skilled laborers. There are many guards at the exit door preventing people from entering and checking for suspicious people
locations.background: The castle exit is used quite often by the king and his henchmen. It is a very decorated and honored place because it is used a lot throughout the day. It is reflective of the legacy of the royal family.

Large Door.name: Large Door
Large Door.description: A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway.
Large Door.examine_text: It's massive and carved out of a fine, dark wood. You can see the markings of years of use and the royal crest etched onto its very center.

Framed Pictures.name: Framed Pictures
Framed Pictures.description: Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty hung at the walls.
Framed Pictures.examine_text: The wooden frames protect portraits of past kings, queens, and distinct personalities revered in history. Each portrait captures the distinct features of each individual, immortalizing them on the castle walls.

Red Carpet.name: Red Carpet
Red Carpet.description: A luxurious red carpet covering the floor.
Red Carpet.examine_text: The carpet is bright and velvety, a sign of opulence and refinement. It has intricate patterns woven with gold threads, and walking on it feels like treading on clouds.

Guards.name: Guards
Guards.description: Many guards at the exit door.
Guards.examine_text: The guards are highly trained, groomed, and extremely alert. They scan the area for any signs of danger, their hands hovering over the hilts of their swords. You'd better be wary around them.

Guard_Richard.name: Guard_Richard
Guard_Richard.description: Tall and muscular, Richard wears a full suit of royal armor, and his face is stern, exuding authority and determination.
Guard_Richard.persona: I'm Richard, one of the royal guards. I guard the exit door of the castle. It's a prestigious job, to protect the royal family.
Guard_Richard.goal: My goal is to ensure the safety of the royal family and keep away suspicious persons.

Royal Armor.name: Royal Armor
Royal Armor.description: A full set of royal guard's armor, symbolizing duty and honor.
Royal Armor.examine_text: The armor is exquisitely crafted and polished to a mirror shine. Emblazoned with the royal crest, it is a significant icon of the realm.

Shining Sword.name: Shining Sword
Shining Sword.description: A magnificent sword, emblem of the royal guard's valor, and protection.
Shining Sword.examine_text: Carefully balanced, the blade gleams with an almost magical light. Its hilt is adorned with intricate designs, and the royal initials are engraved on the blade.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A sturdy shield of the royal guards, bearing the emblem of the kingdom.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is impressive; made of the finest metals, it is almost as reflective as a mirror. It proudly displays the royal crest at its center.

Guard_James.name: Guard_James
Guard_James.description: James is a young, sharp eyed guard with a slim build. Despite his youth, he appears serious and resolute.
Guard_James.persona: I'm James, the youngest guard at the castle. But don't underestimate me, I can hold my own.
Guard_James.goal: I want to prove my mettle and live up to the honorable job of castle guard.

Light armor.name: Light armor
Light armor.description: A finely-crafted light armor worn by Guard James
Light armor.examine_text: This is not just any armor; its lightweight material is designed to provide Guard James with robust protection whilst allowing him to move quickly and easily. The royal crest of the castle is proudly displayed on the chest. The armor is scuffed and worn, showing evidence of James's many encounters.

Spear.name: Spear
Spear.description: A spear used by Guard James for his protection
Spear.examine_text: It's a versatile weapon with a long wooden handle and a sharp pointed tip made of iron. It seems to have been recently polished and sharpened. The grip has been wrapped in a soft leather for more comfort during use.

Communicator device.name: Communicator device
Communicator device.description: James's communicator used to keep in contact with the other guards
Communicator device.examine_text: This device, the size of a small stone, is surprisingly light. It is made from black, shiny metal and has a small antenna for improved signal. There's a simple button to press for communication. You can't help but notice the faint blue glow that it emits, suggesting it's in active use.

King_Rudolph.name: King_Rudolph
King_Rudolph.description: The King is an elderly man with a regal bearing. His hair is white as snow, and he always carries a golden scepter adorned with a large ruby.
King_Rudolph.persona: I am King Rudolph. My people are my children and their welfare is my responsibility.
King_Rudolph.goal: My primary goal is to ensure the prosperity and security of my kingdom.

Golden Scepter.name: Golden Scepter
Golden Scepter.description: A beautifully crafted scepter made of pure gold, studded with precious gems and the royal emblem.
Golden Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is drenched in opulence. Crafted from pure gold and studded with diamonds and rubies, it boasts the crest of the kingdom at its head. A well-maintained artifact that perfectly echoes the power and prestige of the monarchy.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A shining and intricate golden crown, adorned with a variety of precious stones.
Crown.examine_text: The crown symbolizes the grandeur of the king. Its spectacular design captivates the viewer's attention immediately. Decorated with dazzling diamonds and colorful gemstones, it indeed portrays the king's nobility and authority.

Royal Signet Ring.name: Royal Signet Ring
Royal Signet Ring.description: A large gold ring, featuring the royal family's seal inlaid with various gems.
Royal Signet Ring.examine_text: The ring is large and bears the seal of the royal family, ornately designed and inlaid with an assortment of precious gems. It's a physical manifestation of the authority and responsibility of King Rudolph towards his people.

locations.name: Castle Maids' Room
locations.description: Inside the maids room is dark and grey.  It is much different from the rest of the Castle which has grand walls and floors and paintings from famous painters around the wall.  The maid holds many secrets in this room.  One which is a secret door that holds paintings she should not have.
locations.background: Many of the servants share quarters, but the head maid has her own room.  She is a favorite of the Duke who owns the castle.  She is loyal, but her room still reflects that she is a servant.  She has plans of her own as her room inside the Castle has secret door and storage where she has things she should not.

travel_descriptions.south: Leaving the maids' quarters, you descend a winding staircase to the Armory, the clanking of weaponry growing louder as you approach.
travel_descriptions.west: Leaving the comfort of the maids' room, you traverse a lengthy corridor richly adorned with portraits of previous owners, leading you directly into the grandeur of the Banquet Hall.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.examine_text: Looking closer, you notice that the feathers of the duster are more fine and delicate than normal. The handle is adorned with intricate carvings, a personal touch from its user.

Secret Painting.name: Secret Painting
Secret Painting.description: A suspicious painting hanging on the wall
Secret Painting.examine_text: The painting seems out of place. It is a beautiful landscape, a stark contrast from the dreariness of the room. On closer inspection, you notice that the painting is movable.

Plain Wooden Chest.name: Plain Wooden Chest
Plain Wooden Chest.description: A simple, unadorned chest at the foot of the bed
Plain Wooden Chest.examine_text: Upon examination, the chest is well made but with no decoration or emblem. It is just a plain wooden chest probably used for storing personal items. Upon closer inspection, there is a small, hidden lock.

Maid's Uniform.name: Maid's Uniform
Maid's Uniform.examine_text: A simple grey and black maid's uniform. The uniform is made of hard-wearing fabric, and the dress proudly carries the coat of arms of the Duke's family.

Bed.name: Bed
Bed.description: A simple bed with a straw mattress
Bed.examine_text: It's a rough looking bed, not at all comfortable by the looks of it. The straw underneath the thin mattress pokes out in places.

Head Maid Agatha.name: Head Maid Agatha
Head Maid Agatha.description: A robust, middle-aged woman with curly brown hair pulled back into a tight bun. Her stern blue eyes have seen years of hardship, yet a gentle warmth remains.
Head Maid Agatha.persona: I’ve been in this castle longer than anyone else, serving the Duke and his kin faithfully. My room may be small and homely, but it's more than enough.
Head Maid Agatha.goal: To gather enough wealth to retire and start a school in her hometown.

Key_to_every_room.name: Master Key
Key_to_every_room.description: A set of keys stashed away. There seems to be a key for every room
Key_to_every_room.examine_text: The keyring is rusty and old, just like the secrets it has unlocked over the years, and the keys it holds are equally worn out. Some of the keys even have distinct markings that highlight their significance.

Feathers_duster.name: Feather Duster
Feathers_duster.description: A long, delicate object with many wispy feathers attached.
Feathers_duster.examine_text: The duster is made of soft feathers that seem capable of picking up the finest dust. The handle is worn out from years of use, but it's still sturdy.

Personal_diary.name: Agatha's Diary
Personal_diary.description: A well-hidden book with a worn-out leather cover and filled with handwritten notes.
Personal_diary.examine_text: The diary is filled with dates and entries. Upon closer inspection, each of these entries seem to contain detailed observations about the everyday happenings around the castle

Young Maid Annette.name: Young Maid Annette
Young Maid Annette.description: Annette is a fair young maiden with reddish-blonde hair, a smattering of freckles across her nose, and an innocent, wide-eyed gaze.
Young Maid Annette.persona: I'm new here and still learning my way around the castle. The Head Maid is sometimes stern but she's taught me so much.
Young Maid Annette.goal: To find love and escape from her life of servitude.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: An old, worn-out broom made from straw and wood.
Broom.examine_text: This broom has clearly seen a lot of uses, as evidenced by the worn-out straw bristles. It is a simple tool in the chores of the castle maids.

Sewing Kit.name: Sewing Kit
Sewing Kit.description: A small, compact sewing kit with needles, threads and small scissors.
Sewing Kit.examine_text: The sewing kit has everything a maid would need for quick repairs of clothes or uniforms. Simple factory-made needles, a variety of threads and small precise scissors all in a handy travel-sized case.

Handwritten note from her family.name: Handwritten note from her family
Handwritten note from her family.description: A delicately folded piece of paper with handwritten words from Annette's family.
Handwritten note from her family.examine_text: Unfolding the note reveals a familiar handwriting of Annette's mother, sharing bits of home news and loving words of encouragement. It shows how much her family cares about her.

Duke's Butler Alfred.name: Duke's Butler Alfred
Duke's Butler Alfred.description: Alfred is a dignified aged gentleman, with a balding head and a well-groomed mustache. His piercing stare shows a stern person, but his occasional smile suggests a kind soul beneath.
Duke's Butler Alfred.persona: I have served the Duke and his castle faithfully, and my duty extends to all who dwell in it, even the maids.
Duke's Butler Alfred.goal: To uphold his duty and maintain the sanctity and reputation of the castle.

Pocket Watch.name: Pocket Watch
Pocket Watch.description: A finely crafted silver pocket watch.
Pocket Watch.examine_text: This pocket watch is made of silver and has the look of something very valuable. Its backside shows the seal of the Duke, made with great craftsmanship. It seems to show the correct time in spite of its age.

Duke's Confidential Letters.name: Duke's Confidential Letters
Duke's Confidential Letters.description: A set of letters with the Duke's personal seal.
Duke's Confidential Letters.examine_text: These letters are closed with the Duke's seal. You can see that they are written on high-quality parchment and smell slightly of exotic spices. It is forbidden for anyone but the Duke to open these letters and it feels heavy with importance.

Bottle of Fine Wine.name: Bottle of Fine Wine
Bottle of Fine Wine.description: A sealed bottle of what promises to be a luxurious red wine.
Bottle of Fine Wine.examine_text: This sealed bottle appears to contain red wine, the label on it indicates that it's a rare vintage from a renowned vineyard. Its rich color indicates a full-bodied varietal and it feels heavy and smooth in your hand.

locations.name: Armory
locations.description: Another room in the castle as you would expect. This room is filled with weapons and armor on manikins made of wood and iron. The weapons here are well used, time and age have made their dents and marks, however they remain reliable for any man to wield.
locations.background: A collection of arms from the province many battles from history. These items will be used as emergency weapons and equipment in the event of a siege.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A long, sharp, and reliable sword.
Longsword.examine_text: The iron blade is still strong and sharp, despite the signs of wear and tear. The hilt has a symbol of the kingdom, signifying its royal craftsmanship. The sword is quite weighty, suggesting great power when wielded.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.examine_text: You can see the hand-painted symbol of the kingdom, announcing the cruiser's loyalty. The wooden frame has minor scrapes from past battles, creating a mosaic of old clashes.

Iron Cuirass.name: Iron Cuirass
Iron Cuirass.description: A solid chest piece made of iron.
Iron Cuirass.examine_text: The hand-hammered iron has the same marks and dents that show its experiences in battle. Each dent, scratch and mark telling a story of a once heroic feat.

Helmet.name: Helmet
Helmet.description: A sturdy helmet forged with iron.
Helmet.examine_text: The helmet is well-crafted with engravings of ancient folk. This headgear offers robust protection and a narrow eye opening for minimal exposure.

Quiver.name: Quiver
Quiver.description: A leather container for holding arrows.
Quiver.examine_text: The quiver is made of strong leather, dyed dark for stealth. It has an adjustable strap to make it easy to carry across the back.

Grimwald.name: Grimwald
Grimwald.description: Grimwald, the blacksmith, is a burly figure with strong arms, a grizzled beard, and a forehead aged and wrinkled from years of concentration on his anvils' work. He is commonly found wearing his rough and charred blacksmithing apron.
Grimwald.persona: I am Grimwald, the castle blacksmith, master of the flame and hammer. My life's work is to maintain and improve the armory's collection, ensuring our kingdom's defense remains strong.
Grimwald.goal: As the castle blacksmith, my goal is to ensure each weapon and piece of armor is maintained and at its highest standard in case of a siege.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.examine_text: The hammer is made of solid iron, with several small dents and scratches. The wooden handle is charred from use, but it's still solid. It shows the marks of hard work and great craftsmanship.

Tongs.name: Tongs
Tongs.description: Iron tongs, used for grabbing hot items and materials.
Tongs.examine_text: The tongs are made of sturdy iron and have a thick layer of soot and carbon build-up from frequent use. Their grip is indented with countless past exertions, a testament to their dedicated use.

Bellows.name: Bellows
Bellows.description: A large pair of bellows used to fan the flames.
Bellows.examine_text: Made from leather and wood, the bellows are slightly worn from their rigorous use. They are capable of pushing air into the forge, causing the fire to increase in temperature rapidly.

Whetstone.name: Whetstone
Whetstone.description: A large stone used for sharpening blades.
Whetstone.examine_text: The whetstone bears the marks of extensive use: nicks, grooves, and a smoothness indicating countless blades that have passed over its surface. Despite this, it is still in optimal working condition.

Fendrel.name: Fendrel
Fendrel.description: Fendrel, the castle guard, is a young man. He is tall, lean and muscular with bright green eyes. His uniform is impeccable with a keenly polished sword at his side.
Fendrel.persona: As a soldier, I am sworn to protect this castle and its residents. I patrol the armory to keep the castle’s armaments safe from theft or tampering.
Fendrel.goal: My main duty is to protect the armory and ensure the safety of the castle and its inhabitants.

Guard's Key.name: Guard's Key
Guard's Key.description: A large, rusty key carried by Fendrel.
Guard's Key.examine_text: A detailed look reveals different signs of wear and tear on this heavy iron key. You can assume that it's used frequently.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.examine_text: It's a double-edged sword with a sturdy hilt. Though some nicks are visible on the blade, the edge remains sharp to the touch.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A large, wooden shield with metal detailing around the edges and center.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is heavy and feels solid to touch. Despite some wear and tear, it can still provide adequate protection against blows.

Patrol schedule.name: Patrol schedule
Patrol schedule.description: A detailed schedule of Fendrel’s patrol timings.
Patrol schedule.examine_text: Upon examining, the schedule shows that Fendrel makes a complete round of the castle every two hours.

Martold.name: Martold
Martold.description: Martold, the quartermaster, is a seasoned veteran with greying hair and a stern patriotism. He rarely smiles, and his eyes have a sharp gaze that misses nothing in his domain.
Martold.persona: In my role as quartermaster, I carefully manage the castle's weapons and armors, ensuring they are plentiful and properly stored. It is my duty to ensure the troops are well-equipped in times of battle.
Martold.goal: It's my task to preserve the integrity of the weapons, implementing inventory checks and facilitating resource allocation.

Ledger.name: Ledger
Ledger.description: A sturdy, bound book with worn leather cover.
Ledger.examine_text: The old ledger has a series of meticulous entries illustrating the inflow and outflow of weapons and armors. There are dates and signatures next to each entry, signifying proper recordkeeping.

Inventory list.name: Inventory list
Inventory list.description: A parchment listing the current inventory of the armory.
Inventory list.examine_text: The parchment seems freshly written, detailing the precise quantity, variety, and condition of weapons and armor in the armory. A shorthand note by Martold indicates the items in need of repair or replacement.

Sealing wax.name: Sealing wax
Sealing wax.description: A stick of red sealing wax, showing signs of frequent use.
Sealing wax.examine_text: The wax stick is in a vibrant red color, worn at one end where it has been melted multiple times. It's used to seal letters and parchments to ensure their confidentiality and validation.

locations.name: Banquet Hall
locations.description: Cherry wood walls with paintings of historic kings and queens outlined in gold. A very long cherry wood colored table with chairs on all sides. Candle pieces are on the table about a couple feet apart with five candle sticks on each that are lit.
locations.background: This banquet hall is where famous leaders come to enjoy a good meal while discussing future goals.

Painted_Portrait.name: Painted Portrait
Painted_Portrait.description: A portrait of a famous historical king.
Painted_Portrait.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the portrait seems incredibly realistic. You almost feel as if the king's noble gaze is following you.

Banquet_Table.name: Banquet Table
Banquet_Table.description: A long, cherry wood table situated directly in the center of the hall.
Banquet_Table.examine_text: The table bears marks of feasts past – tiny scratches and stains that give character to the smooth, polished cherry wood.

Candle_Sticks.name: Candle Sticks
Candle_Sticks.description: A set of five candle sticks lit and placed several feet apart on the table.
Candle_Sticks.examine_text: Candle light flickers from the group of tall, slender candle sticks, casting warm, flickering shadows on the table.

Banquet_Chair.name: Banquet Chair
Banquet_Chair.description: One of the many chairs lining the banquet table.
Banquet_Chair.examine_text: Well-cushioned and lined with velvet, it's designed for the comfort of guests during long meal discussions.

King Theodric.name: King Theodric
King Theodric.description: A towering figure with a robust physique, King Theodric has dark hair with a streak of grey and piercing blue eyes, draped in a regal purple velvet robe.
King Theodric.persona: I am King Theodric, the ruler of this domain. I seek wisdom and justice, always looking to serve my people better.
King Theodric.goal: Maintain peace and prosperity in his kingdom.

Royal Crown.name: Royal Crown
