Royal Crown.description: A stunning crown, gilded with gold and embedded with priceless gems
Royal Crown.examine_text: The royal crown is a magnificent symbol of power and authority. It shines in the soft glow of candlelight, sparkling with numerous diamonds, rubies, and sapphires embedded in its golden structure. It's the crown of King Theodric, a symbol of his reign and dedication to his people.

Scepter.name: Scepter
Scepter.description: The royal scepter, glimmering with gold and topped by a large pearl.
Scepter.examine_text: This ornate scepter is a symbol of the king's rule, intricately designed with fine gold and topped with a massive pearl that seems to be glowing in the candlelight. It is a clear reflection of King Theodric's authority and his edicts hold true.

Proclamation Scroll.name: Proclamation Scroll
Proclamation Scroll.description: A scroll containing a new proclamation from King Theodric.
Proclamation Scroll.examine_text: The scroll is made from heavy parchment and sealed with the king's personal sigil in wax. Upon unrolling it, you see the king's newest law written in elegant handwriting, reflecting his constant effort to guide his kingdom towards justice and peace.

Queen Anastasia.name: Queen Anastasia
Queen Anastasia.description: With her intricate golden crown and enigmatic green eyes, Queen Anastasia is a dignified beauty. Her elegant ruby red gown whispers on the marble floor as she moves.
Queen Anastasia.persona: I am Queen Anastasia, a gentle ruler but with a firm stance on righteousness.
Queen Anastasia.goal: Ensure the wellbeing of her subjects and to instill a love of learning in her kingdom.

Ornate Mirror.name: Ornate Mirror
Ornate Mirror.description: A beautiful mirror with an ornate, gold-plated frame.
Ornate Mirror.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the mirror reveals exquisite detailing in the gold frame. The mirrored glass is of high-quality and reflects a flawless image.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A stunning golden crown, studded with precious gems.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Clustered throughout the crown are various precious gems including diamonds, rubies, sapphires and emeralds. There's a certain unexplained royal aura that emanates from this regal headpiece.

Embroidered Handkerchief.name: Embroidered Handkerchief
Embroidered Handkerchief.description: An elegant handkerchief with intricate embroidery.
Embroidered Handkerchief.examine_text: The embroidery on the handkerchief depicts a beautiful garden scene. The stitching is immaculate. Queen Anastasia's royal monogram is threaded in one of the corners.

Court Jester, Frodric.name: Court Jester, Frodric
Court Jester, Frodric.description: Frodric is a nimble man with a sharp look in his eyes, veiled with humor. He is garbed in multicolored and multi-layered costumes, adorned with tinkling bells.
Court Jester, Frodric.persona: I am Frodric, the court jester, hear to spread laughter and joy. Yet, behind my jesting, lies a keen understanding of the court's secret affairs.
Court Jester, Frodric.goal: To lighten hearts while subtly influencing the course of politics.

Jester's Hat.name: Jester's Hat
Jester's Hat.description: A brightly colored conical hat that's adorned with various ornaments.
Jester's Hat.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this hat seems to have been sewn with great detail. It's covered in vivid colors with a pattern that catches your eyes - undoubtedly made to capture attention during court events.

Jingling Bells.name: Jingling Bells
Jingling Bells.description: Small, shiny bells sewn onto the court jester's clothing.
Jingling Bells.examine_text: The bells are shiny, and they make a pleasant sound when they jingle. Each one has tiny etchings carved into them which is hard to make out without a closer look.

Comical Props.name: Comical Props
Comical Props.description: A bag filled with various toys, trinkets, and joke items.
Comical Props.examine_text: When examining the bag, you're met with an array of strange objects. Each item is designed to provoke laughter or shock, perfect for a jester's performance.

locations.name: Kings Bed Room
locations.description: The walls are tall and stone. They are coated with colorful tapestries showing the kings of years past. A large stone fireplace across from the bed that is large enough to keep the king warm even on the coldest nights. A double thick wooden door with a large lock on each side of the room.
locations.background: The king has wanted a room this large for years. He had people from all around the world come and help work on it. The fireplace and it's mantle are his pride and joys and the doors that can't be broken down.

travel_descriptions.south: You walk south through a narrow corridor, lined with ornate tapestries, towards the banquet hall.
travel_descriptions.west: You make your way west, down a flight of stone steps towards the aroma of the castle kitchen.

Tapestries.name: Tapestries
Tapestries.description: Colorful tapestries depicting the faces of past kings.
Tapestries.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see that each tapestry is delicately woven with threads of gold and silk. The intricate patterns speak of rich history and regal lineage.

Stone Fireplace.name: Stone Fireplace
Stone Fireplace.description: A grand stone fireplace, large enough to keep the room warm on the chilliest nights.
Stone Fireplace.examine_text: The fireplace is constructed from beautifully-decorated stones. Its intricately carved mantle lifts up off the ground, housing a forever burning flame. It's truly a sight to behold.

Wooden Door.name: Wooden Door
Wooden Door.description: An imposing double thick wooden door with large locks.
Wooden Door.examine_text: The door is seemingly weather-proof and almost impenetrable. The locks are intricate, seeming to demand a key of a unique and complex design.

King Alfred.name: King Alfred
King Alfred.description: King Alfred is a robust man with a flowing beard specked with grey, and thick wiry hair. He is clad in royal finery with a large golden crown studded with jewels resting on his head.
King Alfred.persona: I am King Alfred, ruler of all that you see. My will is law here in my kingdom. I am strong and just, but do not test my patience. I have a deep love for my people and for this land.
King Alfred.goal: King Alfred's goal is to ensure the prosperity and safety of his kingdom.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A golden crown inlaid with precious stones.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see the crown is made of pure gold and inlaid with sparkling gemstones of every color of the rainbow. The intricate workmanship speaks volumes about the crafters' skill. Inset at the front of the crown is a large, flawless diamond.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A long, ornamental staff befitting a king.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is a symbol of King Alfred's sovereignty. Its long golden shaft is ornately decorated with motifs of lions and dragons. The top of the scepter holds a large ruby orb.

Key to the Castle.name: Key to the Castle
Key to the Castle.description: A large iron key, it looks very old.
Key to the Castle.examine_text: This is the key to the castle. Despite its age, it is in perfect condition. You notice an insignia of a lion's head etched into the head of the key, signifying the mark of the king.

Queen Adeline.name: Queen Adeline
Queen Adeline.description: Queen Adeline is a woman of breathtaking beauty with cascading curls of chestnut hair. She is dressed in a flowy gown of rich velvet, adorned with sparkling jewels.
Queen Adeline.persona: I am Queen Adeline, the thorn and the rose. Graceful but willful. I am more than just a queen, I am a pillar holding this castle, as vital as its massive stone walls and impenetrable doors.
Queen Adeline.goal: Queen Adeline's goal is to be a wise and compassionate leader supporting her husband, King Alfred.

Emerald Necklace.name: Emerald Necklace
Emerald Necklace.description: A necklace made of pure gold with an emerald pendant.
Emerald Necklace.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the emerald is of high quality, brilliantly cut to enhance its luminosity. The pendant is intricately designed, suggesting it was crafted by a master jeweler.

Silk Handkerchief.name: Silk Handkerchief
Silk Handkerchief.examine_text: This handkerchief is incredibly soft to the touch, and the craftsmanship is incredible. Embroidered on one corner is a delicate rose, a symbol of Queen Adeline's beauty and grace.

Bag of Fragrant Herbs.name: Bag of Fragrant Herbs
Bag of Fragrant Herbs.description: A small bag containing a selection of herbs known for their pleasing scent.
Bag of Fragrant Herbs.examine_text: The bag is filled with dried lavender, mint and other aromatic herbs. Whenever Queen Adeline is present, one could smell its delightful aroma.

Servant Oliver.name: Servant Oliver
Servant Oliver.description: Servant Oliver is a slender young man with unkempt hair and dull brown eyes. He is dressed in simple attire, a shirt of coarse fabric and barefooted, holding a bronze tray.
Servant Oliver.persona: I am Oliver, a humble servant in King Alfred's castle. Day in and day out, I serve diligently, trying to stifle my dreams under the weight of the king's scepter and the queen's expectations.
Servant Oliver.goal: Oliver's goal is to one day become a knight and serve his king honorably.

Bronze Tray.name: Bronze Tray
Bronze Tray.description: A small, polished bronze tray used to carry goblets and plates. It prominently features the king's crest.
Bronze Tray.examine_text: This small, polished bronze tray has an ornate design of the king's crest in the center. Around the crest, delicate outlines of various fruits glisten in the torchlight.

Wooden Cleaner Brush.name: Wooden Cleaner Brush
Wooden Cleaner Brush.description: A sturdy wooden brush with firm bristles, commonly used by servants for cleaning dust and cobwebs.
Wooden Cleaner Brush.examine_text: A meticulously crafted wooden brush. Its firm bristles are a bit worn out due to constant usage. The grip has been polished to avoid any splinters.

Key to Servant's Quarters.name: Key to Servant's Quarters
Key to Servant's Quarters.description: An old iron key, this opens the door to the humble quarters of castle’s servants.
Key to Servant's Quarters.examine_text: A heavy iron key with a complex bit. Sturdy and worn, it's a symbol of servitude.

locations.name: Banquet Hall
locations.description: The banquet hall is like something you've never seen before.  It has gold encrusted tables and chairs, complete with embroidered tapestries and covers all over the floors.  The silverware is even made of diamonds as are all of the plates.  The ceilings are high wooden beams that glisten.
locations.background: This is the banquet hall of the King.  And he gives amazing dinners here for certain distinguished people.  But lately this room has been quiet, as the King is under a sleeping spell.  And interestingly enough, this room is now attended by tiny fairy lights that no one has yet to be able to capture.

Golden_table.name: Golden table
Golden_table.description: A magnificent table made of pure gold.
Golden_table.examine_text: The table is shining with a beautiful glow. The gold is inlaid with numerous precious gems, making it valuable beyond compare.

Diamond_plate.name: Diamond plate
Diamond_plate.description: An exquisitely crafted plate made of pure diamonds.
Diamond_plate.examine_text: This plate glistens with a sparkling brilliance that is truly one of a kind. Its edges are intricately etched with a stunning design.

Embroidered_tapestries.name: Embroidered tapestries
Embroidered_tapestries.description: Exquisite tapestries with beautiful embroidered designs.
Embroidered_tapestries.examine_text: Each tapestry is a masterpiece, depicting various historical and mythical scenes with intricate detail and beautiful color.

Fairy_lights.name: Fairy lights
Fairy_lights.description: Small, elusive lights that hover around the hall.
Fairy_lights.examine_text: The delicate lights flicker with an ethereal glow. They're believed to be tiny fairies, yet no one has been able to catch one.

King Ethelred.name: King Ethelred
King Ethelred.description: King Ethelred, with a robust figure and regal bearing, is currently lying unconscious on his majestic throne. His deep snores echo around the hall, his mighty crown rests askew on his brow.
King Ethelred.persona: It's difficult, ruling an entire kingdom. Events just aren't the same without me, especially dinners in the banquet hall. I wish someone could break this incessant sleeping spell.
King Ethelred.goal: To awaken from the sleeping spell and reclaim his position as ruler of the kingdom.

crown.name: King Ethelred's Crown
crown.description: A stunningly ornate golden crown encrusted with diamonds.
crown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you notice the intricate patterns and inscriptions etched into the gold. The diamonds sparkle brilliantly, reflecting a myriad of colors, testament to King Ethelred's high status.

royal scepter.name: King Ethelred's Royal Scepter
royal scepter.description: A magnificent scepter made from gold, topped with an enormous diamond.
royal scepter.examine_text: As you approach the scepter, you see intricate carvings of ancient runes running the length of the shaft. The diamond topping it exudes an ethereal glow, a signal of King Ethelred's authority.

Faria, the Head Cook.name: Faria, the Head Cook
Faria, the Head Cook.description: Faria, the head cook, is an energetic, plump woman with an apron perpetually smeared with flour. Her eyes, underneath the thick layer of sweat, hold a gleam of determination.
Faria, the Head Cook.persona: Even though my dear King isn't awake to taste my food, I continue to cook. The banquet hall feels so empty without his laughter. Maybe one day, I'll find a way to wake him up.
Faria, the Head Cook.goal: To find a cure for the King's spell through her culinary skills, hoping a special dish can awaken him.

Spoon.name: Spoon
Spoon.description: A solid silver spoon with the king's crest embedded on the handle.
Spoon.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see light reflecting off the beautifully crafted diamond edges. It feels heavy and solid in your hand, indicating its royalty.

Recipe Book.name: Recipe Book
Recipe Book.description: A large leather-bound book filled with Faria's treasured recipes.
Recipe Book.examine_text: It is filled with pages of carefully penned down recipes, handwritten notes and bookmarks. The book spine is frayed from years of use. As you flip through the pages, you can smell a mix of old parchment and a faint smell of herbs.

Sack of Flour.name: Sack of Flour
Sack of Flour.description: A large sack filled with white, finely-ground flour.
Sack of Flour.examine_text: The sack is tightly bound, but a little flour escapes as you touch it. It's definitely high-quality wheat flour, perfect for making the royal bread.

Whimsy, the Fairy.name: Whimsy, the Fairy
Whimsy, the Fairy.description: Whimsy, a sparkling fairy with iridescent wings, darting around the space. Her size doesn't diminish her presence, but she has a mischievous gleam in her eyes.
Whimsy, the Fairy.persona: People are always mesmerized by my fairy lights, aren't they? But there's more to me than just being a ‘pretty decoration’. I didn't cast this spell, but I know how to break it.
Whimsy, the Fairy.goal: To gather the necessary courage and ingredients to craft a potion that can break the King's sleeping spell.

potion_bottle.name: Potion Bottle
potion_bottle.description: A small, intricate glass bottle filled with a mysterious liquid.
potion_bottle.examine_text: Upon closer look, the bottle seems to exude an aura of ancient magic. The liquid inside shimmers, reflecting the colors of the rainbow.

fairy_dust.name: Fairy Dust
fairy_dust.description: A pinch of sparkling dust that glows with a faint light.
fairy_dust.examine_text: The fairy dust twinkles like a starry night sky. It seems to pulse with a strange energy that makes you feel both calm and excited.

small_magic_wand.name: Small Magic Wand
small_magic_wand.description: A petite wand, finely crafted from a glowing, magical wood.
small_magic_wand.examine_text: The wand is carved intricately with swirling designs and tiny, etched runes. It emanates a soft glow and seems to hum with power.

locations.name: Castle Kitchen
locations.description: The kitchen a large room with stone walls and floors. There are cast iron and copper pots on stone shelves. There is a large fire burning stove located in the middle of the room.
locations.background: This is where the royal chef prepares all of the royal meals. It is located right next to the dining room where the servant serves the King and Queen and their family and guests.  There is wood brought in daily to ensure the stove can always be lit.

travel_descriptions.down: Descending into the castle basement, the air becomes cooler tainted with the musty smell of dampness. The trek is eerie with the occasional scurry of a rat breaking the silent descent.
travel_descriptions.north: A brisk walk past rows of armor, swords, and other assorted weaponry relocate you from the kitchen to the guard barracks. The heavy doors closing behind you mark the journey with a thunderous echo.

Cast Iron Pot.name: Cast Iron Pot
Cast Iron Pot.description: A large, heavy pot made of cast iron.
Cast Iron Pot.examine_text: The hefty pot is well seasoned and bears the marks of being used often. It's ideal for cooking large quantities of food.

Copper Pot.name: Copper Pot
Copper Pot.description: A shiny pot made of copper.
Copper Pot.examine_text: The copper pot sparkles in the light. It's lightweight compared to the cast iron pot and would be perfect for cooking small meals.

Fire Burning Stove.name: Fire Burning Stove
Fire Burning Stove.description: A large stove with a fire burning inside.
Fire Burning Stove.examine_text: This is where the magic happens. The stove is always burning and ready for the chef to create the royal meals. It's made of black metal and is quite warm to the touch.

Wood Pile.name: Wood Pile
Wood Pile.examine_text: The wood is of different sizes, all ready to be tossed into the stove to feed the fire. The scent of the wood fills the room.

Chef Gaston.name: Chef Gaston
Chef Gaston.description: A rotund man with a bushy mustache and wearing a stained apron. His cheerful face lights up whenever he presents his latest culinary masterpiece.
Chef Gaston.persona: Ah, welcome to my domain! Would you like a taste of my recent creation? Cooking for the royals is a constant thrill, I tell you.
Chef Gaston.goal: Perfect his recipe for the king's favorite dish.

wooden_spoon.name: wooden spoon
wooden_spoon.examine_text: The wooden spoon looks well worn from many years of use. Its handle is partially charred, likely from the frequent use over a hot stove. The name 'Gaston' is carved into the handle.

recipe_book.name: recipe book
recipe_book.description: An old recipe book full of royal dishes.
recipe_book.examine_text: The book is tattered and stained from years of use. The pages contain handwritten recipes accompanied by meticulous notes and adjustment. It seems like this book describes the royal family's favorite dishes.

pan.name: pan
pan.description: A heavy, well-seasoned cast iron pan.
pan.examine_text: The patina on the pan reveals it has been seasoned for years, providing a non-stick surface. There are a few burnt bits stuck to the pan, indicating that it was recently used for cooking.

Scullery Maid Sophie.name: Scullery Maid Sophie
Scullery Maid Sophie.description: A petite young woman, often blushing and constantly active with her cleaning chores. Her eyes seem to always take in every detail.
Scullery Maid Sophie.persona: Hello there, there is always so much to do here. From cleaning pots and washing dishes to peeling potatoes, you won't see me idle.
Scullery Maid Sophie.goal: To finish all her chores and maybe find some spare time to read her hidden collection of cookbooks.

pail.name: pail
pail.description: A simple wooden pail Sophie uses for transporting water.
pail.examine_text: An old wooden pail. It looks like it's been used a lot, yet it's still sturdy and ready for more work.

washing cloth.name: washing cloth
washing cloth.description: A cloth Sophie uses for scrubbing dishes clean.
washing cloth.examine_text: A simple cloth made from linen. Hampers of them get delivered from the local textile mill regularly.

soap.name: soap
soap.description: A large bar of soap Sophie uses for cleaning.
soap.examine_text: It's a large, white bar of soap. It has a fresh, clean scent that is quite overpowering. It's clearly made for scrubbing rather than beauty.

Kitchen Boy Pip.name: Kitchen Boy Pip
Kitchen Boy Pip.description: A thin, wiry young boy always covered in soot from carrying wood for the stove. He's got a mischievous glint in his eye and a quick smile.
Kitchen Boy Pip.persona: Oy, watch out for Gaston's hot pots, they'll burn ya! But don't worry, bringing wood in for the fire, that's my game.
Kitchen Boy Pip.goal: To ensure the kitchen stove never runs out of fire.

firewood.name: Firewood
firewood.description: A pile of dry, cut logs.
firewood.examine_text: These logs are perfect for burning in the stove. They are dry and cut just to the right size.

kindling.name: Kindling
kindling.description: Small pieces of wood perfect for starting a fire.
kindling.examine_text: This kindling is dry and brittle, making it excellent for starting a fire quickly.

matches.name: Matches
matches.examine_text: This is a small box that contains matches, which can be used to start a fire.

locations.name: Great Armory
locations.description: The Great Armory is a long room filled too to bottom with shelves and racks of weapons of every sort. Swords of every length, weight and style, likes longer than a man is tall, Morning Star maces, longbows, horse bows, crossbows, axes...they're all there.
locations.background: The King's late older brother was an avid collector and historian of weapons of every kind, and ensured that the castle bought the very best. He had a room commissioned just for the weapons, and was always on the lookout for new ones.

travel_descriptions.south: Descending from the Great Armory, a wealth of history reflected in the glinting steel, you swiftly move towards a grand spectacle, the colossal Main Foyer.
travel_descriptions.west: Transitioning from the armory's cold steel and the tangible history it embodies, you travel towards the grandeur of power and sovereignty, the Throne Room.

Long Sword.name: Long Sword
Long Sword.description: A polished steel sword, about 35 inches in length.
Long Sword.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the blade is exquisite, it shines under the light revealing complex patterns etched onto its surface. The leather-wrapped hilt shows signs of usage, but the sword is well maintained.

Morning Star Mace.name: Morning Star Mace
Morning Star Mace.description: A vicious looking mace with sharp spikes protruding.
Morning Star Mace.examine_text: Taking a closer look, you can see that the spikes on the mace are slightly rusted, indicating that it has not been recently used. The handle is wrapped in an old leather that provides an excellent grip.

Longbow.name: Longbow
Longbow.description: A sturdy longbow made of fine yew wood.
Longbow.examine_text: At a closer glance, the longbow's yew wood is finely grained, showing evidence of excellent craftsmanship. It's strung with a taut string, and looks ready to loose an arrow with immense force.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A large round shield made of oak and iron.
Shield.examine_text: Close up, you notice that the shield's front is slapped with several layers of iron and the edges are rimmed with the same material, giving it added strength and durability.

Master Donald.name: Master Donald
Master Donald.description: Master Donald is an older man, nearing his sixties. His hair is thinning and white, his skin is weathered and his hands have the hard calluses of a lifelong smith.
Master Donald.persona: In my early years I was the blacksmith but now, I am the caretaker of all these masterpieces. Crafted not just here, but from different lands and ages.
Master Donald.goal: His goal is to maintain the weapons and ensure they are kept in optimal condition.

Key to the Weapon Racks.name: Key to the Weapon Racks
Key to the Weapon Racks.description: An ancient, heavy-duty key with intricate designs carved in
Key to the Weapon Racks.examine_text: This key is made from bronze, and the patina offers a hint of its age. The handle of it is embellished with mace and sword, symbolic of the armory it unlocks. Its purpose is clear and vital: to access the racks holding all the precious weapons.

Rag and Oil.name: Rag and Oil
Rag and Oil.description: Thick, soft cloth and a small flask of weapon-grade oil
Rag and Oil.examine_text: Master Donald always carries this. The oil flask is glass, with a tight-fitting cork stopper. The oil inside is clear, with a slight golden tint signifying top quality. The accompanying cloth is thick and soft, perfect for polishing and cleaning without risk of damaging the weapons.

Historical Weapons Catalog.name: Historical Weapons Catalog
Historical Weapons Catalog.description: A thick, well-preserved book containing descriptions and illustrations of all the weapons in the armory
Historical Weapons Catalog.examine_text: Bound in embossed leather, the catalog is meticulously maintained. It contains descriptions and intricately drawn pictures of every weapon in the armory. Reading through it, one can tell that the late king's brother was not just a collector, but truly keenly interested and knowledgeable about each piece.

Prince Edward.name: Prince Edward
Prince Edward.description: Prince Edward is a young man, no more than sixteen, with a slim build and an insatiable curiosity. He carries an aura of royalty, yet his eyes hold a flickering flame of adventure.
Prince Edward.persona: As the king's son, it is only right I know how to wield a sword. And where best to find the perfect weapon than in our very own Great Armory?
Prince Edward.goal: His goal is to find a weapon that fits him perfectly.

Golden Compass.name: Golden Compass
Golden Compass.description: A compass encased in gold with intricate design, often used by naval officers.
Golden Compass.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the worn edges of the compass and the words 'True North' engraved on it. The needle is slightly bent but still points diligently towards the north.

Letter from the King.name: Letter from the King
Letter from the King.description: A paraffin-sealed letter that glows in royal aura with its seal bearing the mark of the King.
Letter from the King.examine_text: You carefully break the seal to find a beautifully handwritten letter presumably from the King himself. Though the letters, faint and slightly smudged, are challenging to decipher.

Small Dagger.name: Small Dagger
Small Dagger.description: A finely crafted dagger with a leather-bound hilt and a highly polished blade that gleams when it catches light.
Small Dagger.examine_text: As you observe closely, you can see the initials 'E.K' etched near the base of the blade, revealing that it was perhaps intended for personal use by a royal member. The balance of the dagger is perfect and it lies comfortably in hand.

Lady Morgana.name: Lady Morgana
Lady Morgana.description: Lady Morgana is captivating with her crimson dress that perfectly contrasts her raven-black hair. Her eyes reveal cunning and intelligence, and yet hold a certain fascination with the weapons that surround her.
Lady Morgana.persona: One does not need to be a man to know the way of a weapon. An understanding helps to deter those who dare to underestimate me.
Lady Morgana.goal: She searches for a particular enchanted weapon mentioned in her book.

silver_hairpin.name: Silver Hairpin
silver_hairpin.description: A surprisingly heavy hairpin made of pure silver.
silver_hairpin.examine_text: The hairpin shimmers in the light, revealing intricate designs etched into the surface. One end is pointy, perfect for stabbing if need be.

book_on_dark_magic.name: Book on Dark Magic
book_on_dark_magic.description: An ominous looking book with ebony cover, detailing the dark arts.
book_on_dark_magic.examine_text: When you luff through the pages, you can see various diagrams of complex magical symbols, lists of ingredients for potions, and descriptions of horrific spells. It's enough to give you chills.

forbidden_poison.name: Forbidden Poison
forbidden_poison.description: A small vial containing a purple liquid, known to be a deadly poison.
forbidden_poison.examine_text: The vial is filled with a dark purple liquid. It swirls ominously when shaken. It's known to cause silence and a quick death to those who consume it.

locations.name: Main Foyer
locations.description: The main foyer is massive. A grand staircase sits to the back of the foyer leading to the upstairs. At the front of the foyer stand two servants ready to help anyone who comes to visit. To the left of the room there is a doorway leading into a corridor. To the right there is a door leading to another corridor for the King's servants. At the foot of the stairs there is a bearskin rug that is staring at you almost as if still hungry. The walls are lined with portraits of the king and his family.
locations.background: The foyer is actually the biggest single room in the castle, the King instructed to make it as big as possible so that it could accommodate any family, royal or otherwise that might visit. He wanted every painting of their family they had to be displayed on the walls, so that you could see how long his linage extended.

Grand Staircase.name: Grand Staircase
Grand Staircase.description: A grand and opulent staircase leading to the upper floors.
Grand Staircase.examine_text: The staircase is made of rich, polished mahogany and is wide enough for four people to ascend side by side. The balustrades are speckled with gold leaf, and the stair carpet is a lavish red with golden trim.

Bearskin Rug.name: Bearskin Rug
Bearskin Rug.examine_text: The rug is soft and its fur is remarkably preserved. The bear's mouth is open in a perpetual snarl, showing off its sharp teeth.

Portraits.name: Portraits
Portraits.description: Portraits of the King and his lineage.
Portraits.examine_text: The portraits show a long, uninterrupted line of royals. Each one is individually identifiable, but they all carry a similar noble aura. The latest portrait shows the current King in his regalia.

King Derund.name: King Derund
King Derund.description: An elderly man with a long, white beard and piercing blue eyes, dressed in royal robes and a heavy golden crown.
King Derund.persona: I am King Derund, ruler of this castle and its people. My lineage is long, and I desire to share my family history through the portraits surrounding. I guard the history and secrets of the castle.
King Derund.goal: To protect my kingdom, its history, and secrets.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A majestic gold crown studded with precious gems.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the crown is meticulously crafted. Each gem sparkles intensely in the fading light. Emeralds, rubies, and diamonds all seem to tell a tale of a bygone era. The crown is a symbol of King Derund's authority and lineage.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A magnificent scepter with a large diamond at the top.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: This scepter is exquisitely detailed. The sizeable diamond at the top reflects light in a mesmerizing way. Closer inspection reveals symbols representing the power and dignity of the king. This scepter is a token of King Derund's sovereignty.

Ancient Key.name: Ancient Key
Ancient Key.description: An old, rusted key, seemingly forgotten by time.
Ancient Key.examine_text: This key is heavily rusted and visibly old. Despite its age, it seems to have been used prolifically. The key is indubitably significant, possibly the key to a secret passage or chamber within King Derund's castle.

Sir Everit.name: Sir Everit
Sir Everit.description: A younger man, in his early thirties. He has dark hair and a stern face, perpetually clad in armor and always at the ready.
Sir Everit.persona: As the king's trusted knight, my duty lies in the security of the castle and safety for all its residents.
Sir Everit.goal: To protect the castle and its residents.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A shiny metal sword with a finely crafted hilt.
Sword.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the fine crafting of the hilt, adorned with jewels and an insignia of a lion. The metal of the blade gleams dangerously under the light.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A large round shield adorned with the royal crest.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is heavy, made from iron and perfectly round. It carries the royal crest, a dragon wrapped around a tower, painted in vibrant colours.

Set of Keys.name: Set of Keys
Set of Keys.description: A set of antique keys, possibly for opening various doors in the castle.
Set of Keys.examine_text: The keys are of different sizes, each one distinct and well-worn. From the wear and the vintage design, you can tell that they've been used to open and lock many doors in the castle for years.

Master Tomlin.name: Master Tomlin
Master Tomlin.description: An old, humpbacked man with a cheerful smile on his face, always cleaning, dusting or fetching something.
Master Tomlin.persona: As the castle's head servant, I ensure that every corner of the castle sparkles for any incoming guests.
Master Tomlin.goal: To keep the castle clean, warm and welcoming.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A well-worn wooden broom with stiff bristles.
Broom.examine_text: This broom has definitely been heavily used. The handle is worn smooth from years of handling and the bristles are caked with dust. Master Tomlin uses it daily to help keep the castle clean.

Duster.name: Duster
Duster.description: A long-handled duster made of soft, fluffy feathers.
Duster.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see that the feathers are from peacocks that reside in the castle gardens. Occasionally, Master Tomlin must replace a feather, but overall it's stood the test of time. It's his trusted companion in maintaining the castle's grandeur.

Tray of food.name: Tray of food
Tray of food.description: A silver tray laden with a sumptuous selection of delicacies.
Tray of food.examine_text: The tray holds an assortment of cheeses, fruits, fresh bread, and a carafe of wine. It's not for the guests but for the long hours Master Tomlin works without a break, keeping up the castle's impeccable reputation.

locations.name: Throne Room
locations.description: The throne room has a throne all the way in the back of the room in the center. There is a silver carpet that lead up to the throne as you walk into the room. There are pictures of royalty hanging in the room and multiple chandeliers are hanging up. There throne chair in the back of the room with jewelry on it
locations.background: This room is the place where the King or Queen makes decisions regarding his servants, populace and territory. It is handed down to the next King or Queen each generation.

Throne.name: Throne
Throne.description: A large, ornate chair in the center of the room.
Throne.examine_text: You see a large throne, made from beaten gold. It's embedded with precious stones that gleam and sparkle. The seat is padded with red velvet cushions.

Silver Carpet.name: Silver Carpet
Silver Carpet.description: A long, silver carpet leading up to the throne.
Silver Carpet.examine_text: You see a plush carpet underfoot, woven from strands of silver reflecting the light.

Chandeliers.name: Chandeliers
Chandeliers.description: Several imposing chandeliers hang from the ceiling.
Chandeliers.examine_text: You look up to see chandeliers, delicately crafted from gold and glass, reflecting the light and illuminating the room.

Royal Portraits.name: Royal Portraits
Royal Portraits.description: Pictures of past royalty adorning the walls.
Royal Portraits.examine_text: You look around and see pictures of past royalty. Each portrait is meticulously painted and framed in ornate gold.

Jewelry.name: Jewelry
Jewelry.description: Various pieces of jewelry lying on the throne.
Jewelry.examine_text: You take a closer look at the jewelry on the throne. There are multiple items made from gold and precious stones, including a crown, a scepter, and a ring.

King Octavius.name: King Octavius
King Octavius.description: King Octavius sits firmly on his throne, his grey eyes are sharp and his silver beard is well trimmed. He wears a golden crown adorned with jewels, and an embroidered royal robe.
King Octavius.persona: As the king, I command the respect of my subjects and aim to make fair decisions for the good of the kingdom. I might seem stern, but I have a deep love for my people and the land.
King Octavius.goal: To rule over his kingdom fairly and protect his people from harm.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A pristine crown crafted from pure gold, adorned with precious gems.
Golden Crown.examine_text: This golden crown is surprisingly heavy, intricately designed with complex patterns carved into the pure gleaming gold. Several bright, multicolored gems are set within the crown, sparkling brilliantly under the light. You can tell that it symbolizes royalty and command.

Royal Robe.name: Royal Robe
Royal Robe.description: A plush, grand, purple robe displaying the coat of arms of the kingdom.
Royal Robe.examine_text: The royal robe is utterly magnificent to behold. The deep, rich shade of purple signals royalty and power. Gold embroidery details the edges in intricate patterns, and the coat of arms of the kingdom is stitched proudly on the chest. The robe is heavy, adorned with gold threading and gems, still, it provides a sense of comfort and warmth.

Scepter.name: Scepter
Scepter.description: A majestic golden scepter, symbolizing the king's authority.
Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is a long, gold staff adorned with precious gems and ornate carvings. It's top end consists of a large, spherical gem shining with a radiance that's almost magical. This is a symbol of the king's authority, used to make official decrees. It is heavy, yet perfectly balanced, a testament to the weight and balance of ruling a kingdom.

Serena, the Royal Advisor.name: Serena, the Royal Advisor
Serena, the Royal Advisor.description: Serena stands by the King's side, a book of laws ever present in her hands. She's adorned in a modest purple gown, with spectacles resting on her nose.
Serena, the Royal Advisor.persona: As the Royal advisor, my duty is to provide counsel to the King. I am a woman of knowledge, and I dedicate my life to sustaining the fields of justice and order in this land.
Serena, the Royal Advisor.goal: To advise the King with wisdom and maintain the law and order in the realm.

Book of Laws.name: Book of Laws
Book of Laws.description: A thick, ancient book filled with the laws of the kingdom.
Book of Laws.examine_text: The Book of Laws is bound in worn leather. Its heavy, parchment pages are filled with descriptions of every law in the kingdom, painstakingly inked in the elegant, precise hand of generations of royal scholars. The book smells of old paper and faintly of ink.

Quill.name: Quill
Quill.examine_text: The quill is made from a swan's feather and its tip is quite sharp, capable of producing thin, precise lines of ink. It has been well used, but well cared for. Slight traces of ink can be spotted here and there on the feather.

Scroll of Parchment.name: Scroll of Parchment
Scroll of Parchment.description: A blank scroll of parchment meant for writing.
Scroll of Parchment.examine_text: This roll of parchment is made of high quality material. Its unblemished surface is an invitation for knowledge and tales yet to be written. The edges are slightly rough, giving it a rustic feel.

Prince Leopold.name: Prince Leopold
Prince Leopold.description: The young prince, bold and piercing blue eyes, sits beside the King, learning statecraft. He dons a silver crest and a youthful enthusiasm.
Prince Leopold.persona: Being the Prince, I'm eager to assume my future role as a King. Right now, I focus on learning and training, preparing to lead these people who rely on us.
Prince Leopold.goal: To prepare for his future role as the King, learning statecraft and leadership.

Silver Crest.name: Silver Crest
Silver Crest.description: An emblem of Prince Leopold's lineage.
Silver Crest.examine_text: A magnificent crest made from pure silver. It has the Prince's family symbol meticulously etched onto its surface. The heirloom reflects dignity and heritage.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: An elegant sword for Prince Leopold's training.
Sword.examine_text: The sword is precisely balanced, perfect for a prince's training. The hilt is wrapped in blue leather, embossed with the royal crest. The blade is sharp and gleaming.

Sealed Letters.name: Sealed Letters
Sealed Letters.description: Letters of affairs for Prince Leopold to learn from.
Sealed Letters.examine_text: An array of letters, each sealed with wax and embossed with the royal seal. They contain discussions on varying topics, meant to educate the Prince on the kingdom's state of affairs.

locations.name: Castle
locations.description: The inside of the castle is made from grey brick. All the floors are made from gold and silver. The castle is lit by lights as well as some candles.
locations.background: This castle is where the king lives and where other royalty reside. There are fancy dinners here as well as many important meetings.

travel_descriptions.south: Traveling south to the Lavoratory, one might encounter the not-so-pleasant smell that wafts from it due to the lack of ventilation. The gritty stone walls and dim candle light intensify the eerie atmosphere.
travel_descriptions.east: Venturing east towards the Secret Tunnel, one must make their way through a narrow path that teems with intrigue. The journey is shrouded in secrecy, and careful steps must be taken to navigate it successfully.

Golden Cup.name: Golden Cup
Golden Cup.description: A shiny golden cup studded with precious stones
Golden Cup.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the golden cup appears to be made of pure gold and embeded with an array of precious gems. It is carefully crafted with intricate designs.

Silver Plate.name: Silver Plate
Silver Plate.examine_text: The silver plate shines bright under the dim light. It is extremely clean and reflects the light beautifully.

Candlestick.name: Candlestick
Candlestick.description: A brass candlestick holder with a half-burnt candle
Candlestick.examine_text: The candlestick is constructed of brass and bears ornate patterns. The wax of the candle has dripped along the sides of the sticks giving it a rustic look.

Royal Robe.name: Royal Robe
Royal Robe.examine_text: The royal robe is adorned with embroidered gold trims and decorated with tiny pearls. The velvet fabric feels rich and plush.

King Arthur.name: King Arthur
King Arthur.description: A regal figure, King Arthur often wears a golden crown encrusted with jewels and royal robes that billow behind him as he walks.
King Arthur.persona: I am King Arthur, the ruler of this grand castle. With wisdom and bravery, I lead my kingdom to prosperity.
King Arthur.goal: To rule with wisdom and unwavering justice, ensuring the safety and prosperity of my kingdom.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A beautiful and elegant crown, embellished with precious stones.
Golden Crown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the golden crown shimmers with an otherworldly glow. The diamonds, sapphires, and rubies embedded into it make a beautiful pattern, indicating royalty and wealth. It is a symbol of King Arthur's rule.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: The royal scepter of King Arthur, it symbolizes his authority.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is a long, golden piece of royal regalia. It is adorned with jewels, each symbolizing a different aspect of his reign. In the right hands, it could also serve as a formidable weapon.

Sealed Letters.name: Sealed Letters
Sealed Letters.description: A bunch of sealed letters from various kingdoms.
Sealed Letters.examine_text: Upon examining, you find letters from various kingdoms. Some are pleas for help, others offer alliances, while some contain threats. Each letter is sealed with the emblem of the kingdom it originates from.

Queen Guinevere.name: Queen Guinevere
Queen Guinevere.description: Graceful and elegant, Queen Guinevere is often seen in elaborate dresses bedecked with precious stones, and her golden hair is always perfectly coiffed.
Queen Guinevere.persona: As the Queen, I am the heart of this castle, always trying to ensure it remains a true sanctuary for both family and our loyal subjects.
Queen Guinevere.goal: To maintain peace within the castle and ensure happiness among the royal household and our subjects.

Bejeweled Dress.name: Bejeweled Dress
Bejeweled Dress.description: This is Queen Guinevere's gorgeous dress, studded with precious stones of every color.
Bejeweled Dress.examine_text: Upon close inspection, you see rubies, sapphires, emeralds, and even a diamond or two. The dress is an array of color and light, reflecting off the castle's lights to make beautiful patterns on the walls.

Mirror.name: Mirror
Mirror.description: This is a giant ornate mirror with a gold frame, standing in the Queen's dressing room. It reflects the entirety of the room.
Mirror.examine_text: Looking into the mirror, you see yourself surrounded by the opulence of the castle. The frame is carved with intricate designs, depicting various Celtic knots and heraldic symbols.

Portrait of King Arthur.name: Portrait of King Arthur
Portrait of King Arthur.description: A beautifully rendered portrait of King Arthur, hung with pride on the castle wall.
Portrait of King Arthur.examine_text: King Arthur, as depicted, exudes a noble and dreamy aura, a crown of gold adorning his head and a royal cloak draping his proud shoulders. His eyes hold a far-off look, as if he's gazing into the future of his kingdom.

Sir Lancelot.name: Sir Lancelot
Sir Lancelot.description: A tall, handsome knight, Sir Lancelot is often seen in his shining armor, carrying his sturdy lance and shield.
Sir Lancelot.persona: I am Sir Lancelot, a loyal knight to King Arthur. With every beat of my heart, I vow to protect the castle from any danger.
Sir Lancelot.goal: To bravely defend the castle and its inhabitants from any threats that come its way.

Steel Armor.name: Steel Armor
Steel Armor.description: An finely crafted armor made from hardened steel, associated with the highest tier of knights
Steel Armor.examine_text: As you look closer, you can see the wear and tear from countless battles. Inscriptions of a distant language are carved into its surface, serving as reminders of knights of old.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A round shield made of sturdy oak and reinforced with iron
Shield.examine_text: A well-worn protective gear, adorned with a menacing lion emblem. It has seen many battles, and it bears the scars proudly with dents and scratches.

Lance.name: Lance
Lance.description: A long, sharpened weapon commonly used by knights in jousting
Lance.examine_text: Nearly as tall as a man, the lance is a formidable weapon, fearsome in its simplicity. The sharp tip looks as if it could pierce through the staunchest shield.

locations.name: Arch Hall
locations.description: The main beauty of this room is it's Arches. Four massive arches surround the four walls of this room with red drapes falling from each side. There are book shelves covered in old books that have collected dust, showing the room has been unoccupied for some time. In the center of the room is four blood red carpets that branch out to the four draped arches. The center of the room holds a dark oak-like wooden round table with a loan golden candle dimly lit in the center.
locations.background: This room was often used by cult worshippers whom would perform rituals at the center table. The golden candle was a symbol of release and renewal, but was also construed as a summoning candle. There are legends of ancient demons being summoned here, but to this day has not been confirmed.

Golden Candle.name: Golden Candle
Golden Candle.description: A dimly lit golden candle at the center of the table.
Golden Candle.examine_text: The candle has a heavy gold casing. The flame flickers dimly, creating dancing shadows across the room. Despite being long abandoned, the candle still seems to have a lot of wax left.

Old Books.name: Old Books
Old Books.description: Various old books placed randomly on the shelves.
Old Books.examine_text: Books of different sizes and thickness. The contents are about ancient cults and magic, some with handwritten annotations on the margins.

Oak Table.name: Oak Table
Oak Table.description: A dark oak-like wooden round table.
Oak Table.examine_text: The table is old and sturdy, made of solid dark oak. It is covered in scratches and stains from centuries of use.

Red Drapes.name: Red Drapes
Red Drapes.description: Long red drapes hanging from the arches.
Red Drapes.examine_text: On closer inspection, the drapes are a rich velvet and are dust covered. They drape down from the arches to the floor elegantly, adding an eerie atmosphere to the room.

Lord Eldrid.name: Lord Eldrid
Lord Eldrid.description: An elderly man, dressed in noble attire adorned with dark, rich colors and intricate embroidery. Despite his age, his eyes hold a twinkling vivacity that hints at the adventurous spirit within.
Lord Eldrid.persona: In my youth, I led many expeditions into the unknown lands of the kingdom. These days, my adventures are confined to the pages of the books in this Arch Hall.
Lord Eldrid.goal: To uncover the truth about the ancient rituals held in this room.

Key to the hidden library.name: Key to the hidden library
Key to the hidden library.description: An antique key, carefully crafted from a dark gold metal.
Key to the hidden library.examine_text: The key is a rusted dark gold color, with intricate markings carved on the bow. It seems to belong to some sort of lock.

Ornate silver dagger.name: Ornate silver dagger
Ornate silver dagger.description: A beautiful dagger, crafted from silver, with an ornate handle.
Ornate silver dagger.examine_text: The dagger shimmers with the hint of danger. Its handle is decorated with delicate, yet largely faded carvings, belying its age and nobility. The blade is sharp and gleams in the dim candle light.

Dusty old parchment.name: Dusty old parchment
Dusty old parchment.description: A piece of parchment, yellowed and brittle from age.
Dusty old parchment.examine_text: The parchment is covered in dust and feels like it would crumble if handled roughly. There are symbols on it, presumably some ancient language. The symbols look like they were written in a hurry, as if the writer was running out of time.

Ghost of Lady Elinor.name: Ghost of Lady Elinor
Ghost of Lady Elinor.description: A spectral figure, clad in a flowing ethereal gown. Her features are of exquisite beauty, yet her gaze holds an infinite sadness.
Ghost of Lady Elinor.persona: I was once the lady of this castle, but now I am nothing more than a sorrowful phantom, haunting the rooms I once walked in.
Ghost of Lady Elinor.goal: To find the missing part of her locket and break her eternal curse.

Fragment of a Locket.name: Fragment of a Locket
Fragment of a Locket.description: A broken piece of a once precious locket
Fragment of a Locket.examine_text: The tarnished silver locket piece, small and damp from age, bears the initials 'E.S'. The locket seems to have been snapped off forcefully. A faintly lingering scent of roses fills your senses as you draw closer. Could this have been Lady Elinor's?

Piece of a Cursed Scroll.name: Piece of a Cursed Scroll
Piece of a Cursed Scroll.description: A torn piece of an ancient scroll
Piece of a Cursed Scroll.examine_text: This scroll piece is old and tattered, its edges brown with age. The writing is difficult to decipher - arcane symbols combined with a forgotten dialect. A harsh energy seeps from it, making you feel uneasy. It seems to be a part of some ritualistic incantation, possibly linked to Lady Elinor's unfortunate fate.

Baldrick the Servant.name: Baldrick the Servant
Baldrick the Servant.description: A haggard man, wearing worn-out servant's apparel. His face is deeply lined with worry and exhaustion, yet his sharp, penetrating gaze suggests a clever mind.
Baldrick the Servant.persona: Me Lord? You need something from me? I'm just a servant, but I've been in this castle all my life, maybe I can help you out.
Baldrick the Servant.goal: To serve his Lord without any mishaps or causing a ruckus.

broom.name: broom
broom.description: An old and worn broom, seen a lot of use over the years
broom.examine_text: This is a traditional, hand-held broom made mostly from straw. It's seen a lot of use, and looks like it has been through a lot. Some straw has started to come loose from the end, but it is still functional.

cleaning_fluid.name: cleaning fluid
cleaning_fluid.description: A half used bottle of cleaning fluid
cleaning_fluid.examine_text: A bottle of generic cleaning fluid. The label is a bit worn and torn, making it hard to read the whole name. The fluid inside is a murky blue colour and smells strongly of chemicals.

keys.name: keys
keys.description: A set of old, rusty keys
keys.examine_text: There's a large ring holding together a set of five keys. Each key is different then another - they're all rusty and old. It's hard to tell what they could open.

locations.name: Treasure Room
locations.description: It is home to all the most valuable and legendary pieces of fortune that have been collected by the kingdom over hundreds of years. It contains many treasure chests filled to the brim with gold. Necklaces strewn about made from every type of valuable material imaginable. Legendary swords made from the greatest sword makers in all of the lands. Pieces of armor worn by the mightiest warriors that have ever lived are lined up meticulously on one of the walls.
locations.background: The treasure room is the most sacred room inside the castle. This room was created hundreds of years ago to house and protect an ancient magical crystal that was found in the heart of a mystical dragon. Ever since then more and more pieces of treasure have been secured inside the room.

Treasure Chest.name: Treasure Chest
Treasure Chest.description: A sturdy wooden chest gleaming with golden ornaments.
Treasure Chest.examine_text: This chest has been decorated with intricate carvings and brilliant gold detailing. The chest is locked by some unseen mechanism.

Legendary Sword.name: Legendary Sword
Legendary Sword.description: An impossibly sharp sword made by a renowned blacksmith.
Legendary Sword.examine_text: The blade glows faintly with an otherworldly aura, and a faint hum seems to fill the air around it. However, it's held firmly in place by a magical force.

Warrior's Armor.name: Warrior's Armor
Warrior's Armor.description: A set of ancient, silvery armor that belonged to a mighty warrior.
Warrior's Armor.examine_text: The armor exudes an aura of might and bravery. Despite its age, it doesn't have a single dent, testifying to the skills of its previous owner. But, it's affixed securely to the wall.

Ancient Magical Crystal.name: Ancient Magical Crystal
Ancient Magical Crystal.description: A radiant crystal of immense energy and power.
Ancient Magical Crystal.examine_text: This crystal pulses with magical energy. Its unearthly lights cast a surreal glow onto its surroundings. You can feel a strong force field around it making it immovable.

Sir Locke.name: Sir Locke
Sir Locke.description: Sir Locke is the muscular and stern guardian of the treasure room. Dressed in shining steel armour from head to toe, his eyes reveal years of unyielding devotion and fierce battles.
Sir Locke.persona: I am Sir Locke, the dutiful guardian of the treasure room. I am sworn to protect the riches of the kingdom with my life.
Sir Locke.goal: My goal is to protect the treasure room at all costs.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A legendary sword made of the strongest steel.
Sword.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the sword's intricate carvings and embed of precious stones are revealed. The blade is so sharp that even the air seems to part in its presence.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: An ancient and strong shield, worn with various battles but still standing.
Shield.examine_text: Closer inspection shows the many scratches and dents it has taken over years of usage. It still reflects a strong shine showing its high-quality and durability.

Keys to the treasure room.name: Keys to the treasure room
Keys to the treasure room.description: A set of golden keys engraved with the royal emblem.
Keys to the treasure room.examine_text: The keys are finely made of gold, displaying the royal emblem. Turning them in the light reveals embedded rubies in the handle. Clearly, these keys were not designed merely for utility, but as a display of wealth and stature.

Cassius the Sly.name: Cassius the Sly
Cassius the Sly.description: Cassius, or ‘The Sly’, is a wiry and shifty character, donned in dark cloaks – blending seamlessly with the shadows. Constantly scheming, his devious eyes are always on the hunt for an opportunity.
Cassius the Sly.persona: They call me Cassius the Sly. I can slip past any security, find any secret, and most importantly, appraise any treasure.
Cassius the Sly.goal: My only goal is to steal the most precious gem in kingdom - the crystal from the dragon's heart.

Lock picks.name: Lock picks
Lock picks.description: A set of lock picks. Tools of the trade for a skilled thief.
Lock picks.examine_text: The lock picks are small and metallic. They're precisely machined and designed to disable a variety of locks. There are scratches and wear marks from previous uses, but they're generally in good condition.

Dagger.name: Dagger
Dagger.description: A short, stealthy dagger. A necessary tool for someone who wishes to remain unseen yet protected.
Dagger.examine_text: The dagger is made from tempered steel, with a blade that gleams ominously. The handle is meticulously carved with intricate designs, and fits perfectly in your hand. Despite its size, the weapon is surprisingly heavy and solid.

Black cloak.name: Black cloak
Black cloak.description: A black cloak, perfect for those who wish to blend in with the shadows.
Black cloak.examine_text: The cloak is thick and heavy, made of a soft but durable material. It's the deepest black, swallowing light, and billows slightly even in the absence of wind. This is not just a tool, but also a symbol. It's a promise of secrecy, of invisibility. The lining is silver, a subtle hint of the person behind the disguise.

Oracle Cassandra.name: Oracle Cassandra
Oracle Cassandra.description: Cassandra is an enigmatic figure draped in ethereal white robes. Her hair cascades around her like a river of silver and her eyes, lost in some fantastical plane, are iridescent blue.
Oracle Cassandra.persona: I am Cassandra, the Oracle of this castle. I possess the ability to foresee the future and commune with the ancient, mystical dragon crystal.
Oracle Cassandra.goal: It is my obligation to guard and commune with the dragon crystal, ensuring its power is never abused.

Orb of Clairvoyance.name: Orb of Clairvoyance
Orb of Clairvoyance.description: A clear crystal orb sitting atop a golden stand.
Orb of Clairvoyance.examine_text: Upon examination, the crystal ball reveals mystical symbols floating within it. It glows with a soft light, inviting the observer to look into the future.

Ancient tome.name: Ancient tome
Ancient tome.description: A weathered, old book bound in leather and aged parchment.
Ancient tome.examine_text: The tome is populated with age-old diagrams, ancient scripts and magical incantations. It feels heavy with the wisdom and power of centuries.

Silver staff.name: Silver staff
Silver staff.description: A tall staff crafted from lustrous silver, adorned with intricate engravings and capped by a radiant crystal.
Silver staff.examine_text: On closer inspection, the staff emanates a low hum, as if filled with dormant magic. The engravings depict stories of ancient prophecies, and the crystal at the top shimmers with an otherworldly light.

locations.name: The Bottlery
locations.description: The room is dark and the air is still. There are large barrels of wine from various decades. The corners are spotted with cobwebs.
locations.background: The Bottlery is where the kings wines are stored. The wines stored here date back to several centuries.

Antique_Wine_Barrel.name: Antique Wine Barrel
Antique_Wine_Barrel.description: A large wooden barrel filled with wine from a bygone era.
Antique_Wine_Barrel.examine_text: The barrel is made from aged oak, stained dark by countless years of holding wine. You can smell the rich aroma of wine seeping through the wood.

Bottled_Wine.name: Bottled Wine
Bottled_Wine.description: A bottle of fine, aged wine, sealed with a cork.
Bottled_Wine.examine_text: The liquid inside is a deep red, and seems to give off a soft glow. The label declares it to be a wine of a particularly good year.

Cobweb.name: Cobweb
Cobweb.description: A dusty, old cobweb spun by a long-gone spider.
Cobweb.examine_text: The cobweb is spun with a masterful intricacy, glistening faintly in whatever light it catches. It's delicate, and looks as though it could tear apart at the slightest touch.

Milo the Keeper.name: Milo the Keeper
Milo the Keeper.description: An elderly man with a hunched back, wisps of grey hair poking out from under his old hat, his hands stained dark from his long years of handling the wine.
Milo the Keeper.persona: That one? That's a delicate Pinot Noir, as crisp and light as a clear autumn day. I've been taking care of this place and all the barrels inside for as long as I can recall.
Milo the Keeper.goal: To maintain and catalog the wine collection.

set_of_rusted_keys.name: Set of Rusted Keys
set_of_rusted_keys.description: A bunch of old rusted keys, held together by a worn copper ring.
set_of_rusted_keys.examine_text: The keys are covered in small patches of rust that flake off when touched. They are old and heavy, formed of a metal that has seen better days. Each key is unique and intricate, their origins long lost to time.

crimson_stained_cloth.name: Crimson Stained Cloth
crimson_stained_cloth.description: A thin cloth dyed a deep crimson, stained with various shades of red.
crimson_stained_cloth.examine_text: The cloth is smoothed out on wooden barrel, covered in different hues of red, as if wine has been wiped off on it repeatedly. It trails a faint smell of aged grapes.

small_wooden_cup.name: Small Wooden Cup
small_wooden_cup.description: A simple wooden cup without any major decorations.
small_wooden_cup.examine_text: The cup looks old, its wood stained dark by the countless glasses of wine it once held. Its rim is worn smooth by use and its base is steady and solid.

Ratagon.name: Ratagon
Ratagon.description: A large, unusually clever rat with bright eyes and a sleek black coat.
Ratagon.persona: I am Ratagon, the cunning and swift. This is my kingdom. These people do not even realize how much I know about this place.
Ratagon.goal: To secure food and protect his family.

Gnawed Piece of Cheese.name: Gnawed Piece of Cheese
Gnawed Piece of Cheese.description: A small piece of aged, gnawed cheese
Gnawed Piece of Cheese.examine_text: The cheese looks like it has been nibbled on by something small, most likely a rat. The cheese itself appears to be a fine cheddar, and despite the gnawing, it might still be edible.

Small Golden Coin.name: Small Golden Coin
Small Golden Coin.description: A small, shiny golden coin, dropped unnoticed
Small Golden Coin.examine_text: This tiny golden coin is highly shiny and looks precious. It seems to have been minted a long time ago, indicating it has been here in the castle for quite a while unnoticed. Someone must have lost it or it was accidentally dropped.

Sir Bronnely.name: Sir Bronnely
Sir Bronnely.description: A burly knight with a hardened expression, his tunic emblazoned with the emblem of the King.
Sir Bronnely.persona: I've served the King faithfully for years, guarding his precious cellar door. You never know who might try to sneak in for a taste.
Sir Bronnely.goal: To secure the cellar and catch any potential thieves.

shiny long sword.name: Shiny Long Sword
shiny long sword.description: A beautifully-crafted shiny long sword, and a symbol of Sir Bronnely's loyalty.
shiny long sword.examine_text: The blade glimmers in the dim light of the room. It seems sharp. The hilt is ornately decorated, signifying the stature of its bearer.

wine barrel key.name: Wine Barrel Key
wine barrel key.description: A small, golden key used for unlocking the king's wine barrels.
wine barrel key.examine_text: The key is small and delicate, with intricate engravings. It appears to be made of gold. It is cold to touch, providing a strange comfort.

old castle map.name: Old Castle Map
old castle map.description: A dusty old map providing a layout of the entire castle.
old castle map.examine_text: The map is brittle and faded, much of it unreadable due to age. However, you can make out the layout of the castle, the bottlery being one of the rooms. You can almost trace the history of the castle just by looking at it.

locations.name: Dungeon
locations.description: Dark and gloomy, the dungeon is the ugly underbelly of the castle. A few torches line the black stone walls, throwing a meager light on the iron bars of the cells. The air is damp and still; the only disruptions are the occasional anguished moans and cries from the prisoners.
locations.background: The existence of this dungeon predates the castle's current occupants. Only years after the duke inherited this castle from his father did he stumble upon a hidden trapdoor that concealed the staircase that led deep down into the dungeon. Inside were the skeletons of several men, still chained in their cells. One of those skeletons still had an ornate ruby necklace around its bony neck; it was the Duke's mother, who had mysteriously vanished years earlier. Now the Duke uses the dungeon to hold any dissenters.

Old Torch.name: Old Torch
Old Torch.description: An old torch shedding flickering light.
Old Torch.examine_text: The torch is fixed to the blackstone wall, its flames dancing on the stones. Its crude wooden handle looks ancient and the slow burn of the tinder proves that it's been burning for quite some time.

Iron Lock.name: Iron Lock
Iron Lock.description: A rusty lock that securers the prison cell.
Iron Lock.examine_text: The lock is old and made entirely out of iron with a rusty patina making it almost blend into the bars of the cell. Its keyhole suggests that the key must be somewhere in the castle.

Cheese Rind.name: Cheese Rind
Cheese Rind.description: A mouldy piece of discarded cheese rind.
Cheese Rind.examine_text: The cheese rind looks old and moldy, likely discarded by a guard or prisoner. It's difficult to tell what kind of cheese this might have been, but the strong smell suggests it was quite ripe.

Bone Shards.name: Bone Shards
Bone Shards.description: Broken pieces of bone, long abandoned.
Bone Shards.examine_text: These are fragments of bone; the brittle remnants of a prior resident of this cell. The bone pieces are bleached white with age and exposure.

Ruby Necklace.name: Ruby Necklace
Ruby Necklace.description: An ornate ruby necklace found on the bony remains of a prisoner.
Ruby Necklace.examine_text: The necklace is exquisite; the gem is a deep blood-red ruby set in a carefully crafted gold setting. Despite being in a dungeon for an unknown number of years, it somehow managed to retain its splendor.

Dungeon Keeper Latimer.name: Dungeon Keeper Latimer
Dungeon Keeper Latimer.description: A large, towering figure, Keeper Latimer is a sight to behold. His eyes are a merciless, icy blue, set deep in his gnarled, rugged face. He dresses in dark, dirt-stained clothes with a heavy iron key hanging from his belt.
Dungeon Keeper Latimer.persona: I am the unforgiving keeper of this vile dungeon. I have no sympathy for those who cross the Duke. My keys unlock nothing but despair and suffering.
Dungeon Keeper Latimer.goal: To keep all prisoners in check and quiet, and to keep hidden the ugly truth of the dungeon's past.

Iron Keys.name: Iron Keys
Iron Keys.description: A heavy set of cold iron keys the Dungeon Keeper always has at his belt.
Iron Keys.examine_text: The keys are corroded from decades of use and on very close inspection, you can see that each one is distinctly different, shaped to unlock a specific cell within this gloomy dungeon.

Torture Instruments.name: Torture Instruments
Torture Instruments.description: A weathered table contains various sinister instruments of torture.
Torture Instruments.examine_text: The instruments, obstructive in their function, seemed to be coated with a rusty layer of dried blood. One could easily guess the pain they've inflicted from the ominous scratches and dents they bear.

Half-eaten Bread.name: Half-eaten Bread
Half-eaten Bread.description: A piece of half-eaten stale bread lies on the cold stone floor.
Half-eaten Bread.examine_text: It's been infested with mold and some insects. This bread is nothing short of a repugnant meal, signifying the bleak existence of those held captive in the dungeon.

Prisoner Rodney.name: Prisoner Rodney
Prisoner Rodney.description: Rodney is a haggard and starved man with a long, unkempt beard. His clothes are tattered, and his eyes hold a bleak, hopeless light. Chained to the wall, he looks no more than a skeleton.
Prisoner Rodney.persona: I was a loyal servant to the old king, but the Duke deemed me a traitor. I can only dream of freedom now, holding onto the memory of myself before the chains.
Prisoner Rodney.goal: To escape this dungeon and avenge his wrongful imprisonment.

Rusty Chain.name: Rusty Chain
Rusty Chain.description: An old, rusted chain that has been Rodney's tether for years.
Rusty Chain.examine_text: The huge iron chain is covered in layers of rust. It looks heavy, the links are thick, designed to keep a prisoner in place. The shackle end of the chain is securely fastened around Rodney's ankle and the other end is bolted to the wall.

Remnant of a Broken Spoon.name: Remnant of a Broken Spoon
Remnant of a Broken Spoon.description: The remnants of what once was Rodney's only eating utensil.
Remnant of a Broken Spoon.examine_text: The spoon remnant is tarnished and bent, the handle end broken off. The bowl of the spoon is heavily scratched. It's clear that Rodney has been using this as a makeshift tool.

Ghost of the Duke's Mother.name: Ghost of the Duke's Mother
Ghost of the Duke's Mother.description: A spectral figure in ornate finery, the ghost of the Duke's mother has an ethereal glow. She looks beautiful and sad, an eternal prisoner, the ruby necklace still around her neck.
Ghost of the Duke's Mother.persona: As a spirit chained to the mortal world, I grieve the past and my cruel fate. Unseen by others, I wander within the confines of these stone walls, yearning for justice.
Ghost of the Duke's Mother.goal: To reveal the truth about her tragic end and find peace.

Ruby Necklace.name: Ruby Necklace
Ruby Necklace.description: An ornate necklace with a large, red gem at its center.
Ruby Necklace.examine_text: A thick silver chain holds a painstakingly crafted pendant. At the heart of the pendant is a large, deep red ruby. It glows faintly when the torchlight catches it, illuminating a swirl of tiny inclusions within the gem. The necklace seems to have been made for a noblewoman's neck.

locations.name: Knights Quarters
locations.description: The knights quarters are where the King's royal guard is allowed to lodge. The quarters are dimly lit and are generally only populated at night time. Several beds are aligned along the walls with locked trunks at the base of the beds, where the knights keep their personal belongings.
locations.background: The Knights Quarters were installed as an attempt at generosity by the King. The Knights live rent-free, but are not allowed to leave as long as they are employed. They must live here 24-7 and cannot take wives. Many of the knights have not seen sunlight since the last major battle. A hidden tunnel is located inside the trunk of an abandoned cot. It is believed to lead to a pub or perhaps a brothel.

travel_descriptions.east: Walking eastwards from the Knights Quarters takes you towards the Dining Hall. The aroma of delicious food fills the air as the large, grandiose dining hall comes into view.
travel_descriptions.north: Heading north from the Quarters, the opulent Master Bedroom can be found. Lavish decorations adorn every corner along the way as you tread on the plush, carpeted floors.
travel_descriptions.west: To the west from the Quarters lies the peaceful Garden Courtyard. On making your way there, you are greeted with the sweet fragrance of a myriad of fresh blossoms that fills the air.
travel_descriptions.down: Going downwards leads to the archaic Basement. Descending the staircase feels as chilling as the history it holds, each step echoing the tales of the royals from centuries ago.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: An old, rusty sword likely belonging to a knight.
Rusty Sword.examine_text: The sword appears well-used and aged. The hilt is wrapped with worn leather, and the blade, although dull and rusty, seems sturdy.

Knight's Trunk.name: Knight's Trunk
Knight's Trunk.description: A large, aging wooden trunk. It's likely to hold a knight's personal belongings.
Knight's Trunk.examine_text: The trunk is well-built but bears marks of age and use. A strong lock secures it, suggesting there are items of value inside.

Knight's Cot.name: Knight's Cot
Knight's Cot.description: A narrow, single bed where a knight sleeps.
Knight's Cot.examine_text: The cot is narrowly built, with a thin mattress and a blanket that has seen better days. It's not comfortable, but appears serviceable for a life of duty.

Hidden Tunnel.name: Hidden Tunnel
Hidden Tunnel.description: A secret passage hidden in the base of a cot.
Hidden Tunnel.examine_text: The opening to the tunnel is small and hidden in the corner of a disused cot. It's dark and the destination is unclear.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: The dining hall is large and airy. Huge candelabras with many candles stand throughout the room. There is one huge wooden table spanning the room that can accommodate a hundred guests. Tapestries with angels line the walls. The chairs are gilded and intricate.
locations.background: The dining room is used for eating for small occasions and large festivities alike. The king and his family always eat here. They have used it for special occasions such as weddings and Christmas dinner but also for family meals. Many important discussions take place over food here.

travel_descriptions.south: Descending south from the dining hall, you pass through a warm fragrance of fresh bread and brewing stews, signaling your approach to the kitchen.
travel_descriptions.east: Moving east, the distant clang of metal and the crisp smell of well-oiled equipment heralds your arrival to the armory.
travel_descriptions.up: Climbing up a spiral staircase, the quiet isolation from the castle's liveliness indicates your journey to the solitary room at the top of the tower.
travel_descriptions.north: Venturing north from the dining hall, a draft of cool, clean air welcomes you to the well-maintained privy room.
travel_descriptions.west: Traveling westward, the aura of grandeur and historical richness grows stronger as you approach the castle's prestigious exit.

connections.up: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Large Wooden Table.name: Large Wooden Table
Large Wooden Table.description: A long and grand wooden table, capable of accommodating a hundred guests.
Large Wooden Table.examine_text: The table is massive with intricate designs and carvings. It spans the length of the room, telling stories of grand feasts and engagements.

Gilded Chair.name: Gilded Chair
Gilded Chair.description: An elegantly carved chair with gold detailing.
Gilded Chair.examine_text: The chair possesses exquisite craftsmanship, decorated with gold, the symbol of royalty. Its ornate decorations feature mythical creatures.

Candelabra.name: Candelabra
Candelabra.description: A large candelabra with many candles providing illumination to the room.
Candelabra.examine_text: This grand candelabra stands tall with numerous candles, each emitting a warm, enchanting glow that dance around the room.

Tapestry.name: Tapestry
Tapestry.description: Wall hangings depicting angels, adding a sacred touch to the room.
Tapestry.examine_text: These wall hangings are finely woven with great detail, showing scenes of angels. They provide a solemn yet comforting atmosphere.

King Edgar.name: King Edgar
King Edgar.description: An older, distinct man with a thinly waxed beard. His crown glimmers under the candlelight.
King Edgar.persona: I am rigorous and have high standards for my kingdom, I prefer candor and dislike any trivial matters.
King Edgar.goal: To discuss a new proposal with the councilmen during dinner.

Royal Crown.name: Royal Crown
Royal Crown.description: King Edgar's pristine gold and jeweled crown.
Royal Crown.examine_text: The crown of King Edgar is made of solid gold, decorated with all manner of precious gems. Its design is complicated, displaying Edgar's wealth and power. Looking closely, you can see intricately carved lions and falcons, the symbols of Edgar's kingdom.

Golden Goblet.name: Golden goblet
Golden Goblet.description: A beautifully crafted golden goblet placed in front of King Edgar's seat.
Golden Goblet.examine_text: The goblet is hefty, made from gold and adorned with jewels around the rim. It clearly signals King Edgar's wealth. It is filled with wine, the sweet aroma rising from it.

Scroll of Kingdom Laws.name: Scroll of Kingdom Laws
Scroll of Kingdom Laws.description: A scroll containing all the laws of the kingdom.
Scroll of Kingdom Laws.examine_text: The scroll is quite large, and as you unfurl it the endless list of kingdom's rules, regulations and laws come in view. The script is graceful, written in ink as black as night. King Edgar looks at it with a critical eye, always guarding the welfare of his kingdom.

Queen Amara.name: Queen Amara
Queen Amara.description: A graceful lady in a silken gown, her pearls glittering around her neck. Her gaze is sharp, yet caring.
Queen Amara.persona: I have a nurturing spirit, often looking after the welfare of my people as I would my own child.
Queen Amara.goal: To ensure the successful execution of tonight's formal dinner.

Silver Spoon.name: Silver Spoon
Silver Spoon.description: An ornate, delicately-crafted silver spoon. Looks like it's used for special occasions.
