Silver Spoon.examine_text: The spoon is made of pure silver, with intricate floral designs engraved on its handle. There is a small crown emblem at the back of the spoon, representing Queen Amara's reign. The spoon is polished to a mirror-like shine, reflecting the flickering candlelight in the hall.

Silk Handkerchief.name: Silk Handkerchief
Silk Handkerchief.description: A delicate piece of cloth, made of the finest silk. It has an embossed letter 'A' on one corner
Silk Handkerchief.examine_text: The silk handkerchief is soft to touch, almost feather-like. The color is a deep, royal blue, with beautifully embroidered edges. Near the corner is a carefully sewn letter 'A' representing Queen Amara.

Pearl Necklace.name: Pearl Necklace
Pearl Necklace.description: A majestic necklace strung together with creamy pearls and a gleaming gold clasp
Pearl Necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made of lustrous, perfectly round pearls that are uniform in size. The gold clasp at the back is shaped as a regal-looking swan, an emblem of grace and care, representing Queen Amara's nurturing spirit. From afar, it's simply a necklace but upon further inspection, you see the elegance and sheer quality.

Prince Adrian.name: Prince Adrian
Prince Adrian.description: A young man with a playful glint in his eyes and a boyish grin. His attire is casual compare to his parents.
Prince Adrian.persona: I am rather adventurous and prefer exploring the castle grounds rather than dining in formals.
Prince Adrian.goal: To sneak out early from dinner to explore the castle grounds.

Wooden carving knife.name: Wooden carving knife
Wooden carving knife.description: A sharp and sturdy knife with a wooden handle
Wooden carving knife.examine_text: The knife is made from high-quality steel and looks very sharp. The handle is carved from wood, lovingly polished to a high sheen. It is light and feels good in the hand, perfect for carving meat at a feast or for self-defense.

Map of castle.name: Map of castle
Map of castle.description: A parchment roll with drawings and annotations about the castle
Map of castle.examine_text: This is a detailed map of the castle. It includes the layout of all the floors, including secret passages, storage rooms, and the underground dungeon. There are notes written in old, faded ink, perhaps revealing the castle's secrets.

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.examine_text: The apple looks fresh and juicy. It has a bright red skin that shines under the light. It is a perfect bite to satiate the hunger of a wandering prince.

locations.name: Master Bedroom
locations.description: Large and spacious, the master bedroom houses a giant four poster bed with cerulean silk curtains. The bed is covered with dozens of fluffy pillows and the duvet is inlaid with sapphires and intricate silver embroidery. There lays a thick fur carpet in front of the bed. The floor-to-ceiling windows let in sunlight which catches on various gems and jewels. An ancient mahogany writing desk sits before one of the windows and has important looking papers and scrolls spread atop it.
locations.background: The master bedroom is home to the castle's master, the King. He often finds himself there, either relaxing on the silk sheets or writing away at his desk. The large windows look out on his realm and he finds much comfort in looking out over his people.

Four Poster Bed.name: Four Poster Bed
Four Poster Bed.description: A giant bed with cerulean silk curtains.
Four Poster Bed.examine_text: The massive bed is oversized even for the opulent room it's in. It can easily hold several people. The cerulean silk curtains are smooth to the touch. The bed is warm, inviting, and reeks of royalty.

Mahogany Writing Desk.name: Mahogany Writing Desk
Mahogany Writing Desk.description: An ancient mahogany writing desk with important looking papers and scrolls spread atop it.
Mahogany Writing Desk.examine_text: The desk is made of heavy, old mahogany which has darkened from age. It looks immovable. Important looking papers, sealed with wax seals, and scrolls are spread in a seemingly orderly fashion atop of it.

Fur Carpet.name: Fur Carpet
Fur Carpet.description: A thick fur carpet that lies in front of the bed.
Fur Carpet.examine_text: Exceptionally plush and warm underfoot, the fur carpet lends a sense of luxurious comfort to the room. Its light color contrasts strikingly with the dark, wood floor.

King Ethelred.name: King Ethelred
King Ethelred.description: The King is a tall, stately man with a commanding presence. He has a set of dense, grey hair and piercing blue eyes. He sports an elegant, velvet royal robe, with a golden crown adorning his head.
King Ethelred.persona: I am King Ethelred, the ruler of this mighty kingdom. It is my duty to protect my people and ensure they live in peace.
King Ethelred.goal: To manage and protect his kingdom efficiently.

crown.name: King's Crown
crown.description: A stunning piece of work, adorned with various gems and jewels.
crown.examine_text: The Crown is a magnificent masterpiece, made from pure gold and studded with a myriad of precious gems, including diamonds, sapphires and emeralds. The jewels glitter brilliantly under the light, almost as if they contain a magic within them. The gold is polished to such a level that it reflects light clearly.

quill.name: King's Quill
quill.description: A large feather quill, looking quite regal.
quill.examine_text: An elegant, large feather quill. The feather is from a royal falcon, its sheen reflects shades of indigo and violet under light. The tip appears to be made of a beautifully carved nib, perfect for king's dictations.

parchments.name: Pile of Parchments
parchments.description: A stack of parchment, scribbled with kingly orders and declarations.
parchments.examine_text: The parchments are of a high quality paper, some are scrolled up, others lay flat and contain writings - some in an indecipherable language and some with king's orders and declarations. Each document bears the royal seal showing its authenticity.

signet ring.name: King's Signet ring
signet ring.description: The King's signet ring; a symbol of authority and power.
signet ring.examine_text: The ring is a heavy piece of jewelry, made from pure gold. It bears the crest of the kingdom, a lion standing atop a mountain. Its used by the king to seal and authenticate documents. The ring reflects King Ethelred's authoritative presence.

Queen Adelaine.name: Queen Adelaine
Queen Adelaine.description: Queen Adelaine is beautiful with long, chestnut hair. She prefers to wear flowing gowns of intricate embroidery and silver tiaras. Her kind eyes are filled with wisdom.
Queen Adelaine.persona: As Queen Adelaine, it is my duty to assist in the rule of this kingdom and to assure the well-being of our subjects.
Queen Adelaine.goal: To support her husband in ruling and ensuring the well-being of their subjects.

tiara.name: Queen's Tiara
tiara.description: A crown befitting Queen Adelaine, adorned with sparkling brilliants.
tiara.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the tiara, made of pure gold and inlaid with a variety of gemstones including diamonds, emeralds, and rubies, is extravagant and regal. This tiara is a symbol of nobility and the great responsibility Queen Adelaine bears. Further investigation reveals a small inscription: 'To Adelaine, my queen and my heart.'

embroidered gown.name: Queen's Embroidered Gown
embroidered gown.description: A beautifully crafted royal gown, woven with intricate embroidery and precious gems.
embroidered gown.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the gown is made of high-quality silk dyed in a royal shade of azure. The hem and sleeves are intricately embroidered with silver thread, forming complex patterns. All every so often along the pattern is a small diamond or sapphire. The garment truly speaks to the queen's elegance and grace.

pearl necklace.name: Queen's Pearl Necklace
pearl necklace.description: A strand of vibrant pearls with a sapphire-set clasp glimmers invitingly.
pearl necklace.examine_text: Looking closer, you can see that each pearl is perfectly round and lustrously white. The clasp has a stunning royal blue sapphire set in the center, surrounded by a few smaller diamonds. This necklace is truly fit for a queen.

Aibhlinn, the maid.name: Aibhlinn, the maid
Aibhlinn, the maid.description: Aibhlinn is young, petite, and wears a clean, simple dress. She has frazzled hair from the many tasks she tends to and her skin is rough from hard work.
Aibhlinn, the maid.persona: I am Aibhlinn. I'm just a simple maid here, serving the King and Queen to the best of my ability.
Aibhlinn, the maid.goal: To serve King Ethelred and Queen Adelaine to ensure the bedroom is always comfortable and tidy.

cleaning_supplies.name: cleaning supplies
cleaning_supplies.description: A collection of various tools and supplies used for cleaning.
cleaning_supplies.examine_text: You see a collection of cleansers, scrubbers, dusting cloths, and a feather duster. You can smell the strong scent of soap and see the bright colors of the cleaning liquids.

tray_of_food.name: tray of food
tray_of_food.description: A large tray of food prepared for the King.
tray_of_food.examine_text: On the tray, you see a large roasted chicken, surrounded by boiled vegetables, a bowl of soup, and a goblet of the finest wine. The aromas wafting from the tray make your mouth water.

locations.name: The Garden Courtyard
locations.description: The garden courtyard is found at the very center of the Grand Castle. Its the castle's 6 walls encompass the garden courtyard, creating a hexagon shaped court. Exotic flowers and plants of all varieties from all across the kingdom fill the courtyard. Reds, yellows, bright greens, and even seldom seen colors dominate the flowers that make up the garden. There are large trees and insect sized buds, massive bloomed flowers and normal lilies. The garden is an enchanment.
locations.background: The garden courtyard is the only exotic garden in the entire kingdom. The most respected exotic flower and plant collectors send their finest collections as gifts and homage to be displayed in the garden. It is the highest honor to have one's plants and flowers be relocated there. The biosphere is unique and self sufficient to keep all of the flowers and plants alive, a strange phenomenon harmonized by the existence of many foreign plants living together.

Exotic Flower.name: Exotic Flower
Exotic Flower.description: A flower you've never seen before. It displays a vibrant array of colors.
Exotic Flower.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the Exotic Flower doesn't appear to be of this world. The color scheme is outlandishly vibrant. The petals seem surreal and alien, yet beautiful. The flower has a mild, distinct fragrance that's overwhelmingly enchanting.

Shimmering Pond.name: Shimmering Pond
Shimmering Pond.description: A small, crystal-clear pond glimmers in the sunlight.
Shimmering Pond.examine_text: As you look closer, the Shimmering Pond provides a detailed reflection of the vibrant garden landscape. Peculiarly, the pond also houses a number of exotic aquatic plants, possibly carried over by birds from various parts of the kingdom. The water is cool and refreshing to the touch.

Insect-sized Bud.name: Insect-sized Bud
Insect-sized Bud.description: A bud so small it could be mistaken for an insect.
Insect-sized Bud.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the tiny bud seems to be a minuscule version of a larger plant species. Intricate patterns decorate its surface, visible only upon the closest inspection. It's a feat of natural perfection.

Grand Tree.name: Grand Tree
Grand Tree.description: A grand, towering tree, reaching for the sky.
Grand Tree.examine_text: A close examination reveals the tree's bark to be rough to the touch, while the branches are home to many species of birds. The tree's roots spread wide and far, strong and firm. Its presence is humbling and reflects  the enduring might of nature.

Keeper Helena.name: Keeper Helena
Keeper Helena.description: Keeper Helena is an elderly woman with a myriad of wrinkles and a head full of wiry white hair. She always has dirt stains on her hands and knees, a symbol of her ceaseless nurturing of the exotic plants.
Keeper Helena.persona: I am Keeper Helena, the guardian of these enchanting plants. To me, they are like children, each unique and deserving my endless care.
Keeper Helena.goal: She's determined to maintain the balance of the biosphere for all the living plants in the courtyard.

Gardening Tools.name: Gardening Tools
Gardening Tools.description: A set of well-worn gardening tools that comprises of a trowel, pruning shears, and a small rake.
Gardening Tools.examine_text: These gardening tools exhibit signs of frequent use. The sturdy wooden handles have darkened over time from extended contact with the keeper's hands. The metal prongs of the small rake and the blade of the trowel look dipped in soil showcasing the constant use., while the pruning shears show slight discoloration from the various plants they have interacted with.

Watering Can.name: Watering Can
Watering Can.description: An elegant, silver watering can quaintly designed with etchings of various flowers.
Watering Can.examine_text: The silver gleams sharply in the sunlight, revealing intricate carvings on its body. The carvings depict various flowers, and each one is intricately drawn, almost lifelike. The handle is perfectly molded for a comfortable grip, and the spout of the can has a wide, rose-shaped nozzle. It's clear this was crafted by someone who understands and appreciates the exquisite art of horticulture.

Book of Botany.name: Book of Botany
Book of Botany.description: A thick book filled with diagrams and descriptions of various plants in the courtyard.
Book of Botany.examine_text: The worn leather cover of the book has 'The Art and Science of Botany' embossed on it in gold lettering. The pages, though yellowed with age, are thick and sturdy, each one filled with meticulously illustrated diagrams and detailed descriptions of various plants and flowers, many of which you recognize dotting the courtyard. It is evident that the compilation of this book is a labor of love.

Prince Alexander.name: Prince Alexander
Prince Alexander.description: Prince Alexander is a young, handsome man with bright blue eyes that rival the summer sky. In customary royal attire, he often wonders in the garden with an aura of melancholy.
Prince Alexander.persona: They call me Prince Alexander. I come here often to seek refuge from my royal duties.
Prince Alexander.goal: He is secretly looking for a rare flower that could cure his ailing mother.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A tall and regal object showing the authority of the prince.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is a fine piece of craftsmanship. It's made of pure gold, with intricate designs running through the length of it. The top part is a detailed crown, indicating the prince's sovereignty. It is well-polished and glistening under the sunlight.

Golden Compass.name: Golden Compass
Golden Compass.description: A shiny compass essential for navigation and exploration.
Golden Compass.examine_text: The compass is made of gold and has a royal emblem on the lid. It is an old piece but very reliable. The needle still swings freely, pointing north. The compass also has an exquisite miniature engraving of the castle and it's layout.

Piece of Exotic Flower.name: Piece of Exotic Flower
Piece of Exotic Flower.description: A flower from the garden, unique and very rare.
Piece of Exotic Flower.examine_text: The small piece of flower seems to come from a plant not found in the local region. Its petals shine with a strange color, and the scent is unusual, rich, and intoxicating. It's surprisingly cool to touch, and you can feel a hint of magic radiating from it.

Lord Feldspar.name: Lord Feldspar
Lord Feldspar.description: Lord Feldspar is a portly middle-aged man always adorned in vibrant velvety robes. With a twinkle in his eyes, he is always seen observing and touching the exotic plants.
Lord Feldspar.persona: I am the jovial Lord Feldspar, with a deep admiration for the world's remarkable flora.
Lord Feldspar.goal: His lifelong aim is to get his flowers displayed in this most esteemed garden.

Magnifying Glass.name: Magnifying Glass
Magnifying Glass.description: A carefully crafted glass lens encased in a golden rim with an intricately designed handle.
Magnifying Glass.examine_text: The magnifying glass reflects light beautifully. The carved designs on the handle tell various stories of different flower species. It's set with tiny emerald and ruby stones, resembling the colors of many exotic flowers.

Botanist's Journal.name: Botanist's Journal
Botanist's Journal.description: A heavy-bound, leather journal filled with sketches, notes, and samples of various plants and flowers.
Botanist's Journal.examine_text: The journal is filled with description of thousands of exotic plants and flowers. Each page contains a sketch, a short description, and an actual part of the plant, pressed and preserved beautifully. Lord Feldspar's handwriting is impeccable.

Exotic Seeds.name: Exotic Seeds
Exotic Seeds.description: A small ornate pouch full of numerous, unusual looking seeds.
Exotic Seeds.examine_text: Each seed in the pouch is unique and gathered from different parts of the kingdom. Their colors, sizes, and shapes are vastly different. You can almost feel their potential energy, waiting to bloom into the most beautiful and rare flowers.

locations.name: Basement
locations.description: The basement is very dark, the only lighting coming from the few torches on the surround walls. There are four pillars in the middle of the basement with only 1 torch on the inside of each pillar as they face each other. In the middle of the room there's a small rug laying under a table with some loose scroll paper on it. The walls are also lined with cleaning supplies for the maids to use.
locations.background: The basement was originally going to be a dungeon that served for the prisoners who were found trying to infiltrate the castle but as the room was smaller than originally planned it was decided to be used as a storage for the cleaning supplies for the Duke's housemaids.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A torch fastened to the wall.
Torch.examine_text: An old, smoke-blackened torch. The fire burns steadily though it gives off a lot of smoke.

Pillar.name: Pillar
Pillar.examine_text: The pillars are huge, carved from solid stone. They are cold to the touch and covered with a thin layer of dust.

Rug.name: Rug
Rug.examine_text: The rug is surprisingly soft and has intricate patterns. It looks out of place in the otherwise damp and cold basement.

Table.name: Table
Table.examine_text: An old, rickety wooden table. It's not very stable, but it's good enough to hold some parchment scrolls.

Cleaning Supplies.name: Cleaning Supplies
Cleaning Supplies.examine_text: An assortment of brooms, mops, dusters, buckets, and soaps. Everything one needs to keep a castle clean.

Old Garrick.name: Old Garrick
Old Garrick.description: An elderly man, hunched over and frail. His eyes are sharp despite his age. He is dressed in simple servant clothes, which are grubby from disuse.
Old Garrick.persona: I used to serve the Duke, but now all I do is keep his basement tidy. It's quiet down here, and I like the quiet.
Old Garrick.goal: To maintain the cleanliness of the basement.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: An old but sturdy broom used for cleaning.
Broom.examine_text: The broom has a long wooden handle with well-worn and darkened lacquer from years of use. Though its bristles are worn and tattered, it still serves its purpose well.

Dustpan.name: Dustpan
Dustpan.description: A metal dustpan used to collect swept up dust and dirt.
Dustpan.examine_text: The dustpan is made of light metal and still has some residue dust in it. The edges have some small dents and paint is chipped off in some places. It fits the broom perfectly.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: A large bucket used for holding water when mopping floors.
Bucket.examine_text: This is a large, sturdy bucket with a rusted metal handle. The insides of the bucket are discolored from years of use, but no holes or cracks are present.

Claudia the Eavesdropper.name: Claudia the Eavesdropper
Claudia the Eavesdropper.description: A young housemaid with sparkling brown eyes and mousy hair. She dresses in a standard uniform and is constantly shifting from foot to foot, as if ready to dart off at a moment's notice.
Claudia the Eavesdropper.persona: I work for the Duke, but I'm not content just scrubbing and cleaning. I keep my ears open. You never know what you might hear in a place like this.
Claudia the Eavesdropper.goal: To gather as much gossip about the Duke's household as possible.

Red Feather Duster.name: Red Feather Duster
Red Feather Duster.description: A useful tool for dusting and cleaning.
Red Feather Duster.examine_text: A duster with a beautifully ornate handle leading up to a fluffy collection of bright red feathers. It seems to be well used, yet in good condition.

Cleaning Rags.name: Cleaning Rags
Cleaning Rags.description: Several small pieces of fabric, clearly intended for cleaning purposes.
Cleaning Rags.examine_text: Worn, faded rags of several different colours. Further inspection reveals traces of wax and polish, suggesting they were heavily used in maintenance work.

Wax for Polishing.name: Wax for Polishing
Wax for Polishing.description: A small tin of wax to make things shine.
Wax for Polishing.examine_text: A small, solid metal tin, filled with a translucent wax. The wax has a slightly musty smell and is smooth and cool to the touch, ideal for rubbing into wood or stone to bring out its lustre.

Barnabas the Storyteller.name: Barnabas the Storyteller
Barnabas the Storyteller.description: A middle-aged man with a rotund figure and a beard that reaches his chest. He is jovial and can often be found with a smile on his grizzled face. He wears a bright hat adorned with a crest, signifying his years of service to the Duke's family.
Barnabas the Storyteller.persona: I've served the Duke's family for years, and what better place to share the stories of their glory than the heart of the castle - the basement?
Barnabas the Storyteller.goal: To entertain anyone who visits the basement with grand tales of the Duke's family heritage.

Half-finished Bottle of Mead.name: Half-finished Bottle of Mead
Half-finished Bottle of Mead.description: A glass bottle containing a golden liquid with a sweet, robust aroma.
Half-finished Bottle of Mead.examine_text: This bottle of mead appears to have been opened previously, but plenty of the golden liquid still remains. The label indicates it's a regional specialty, brewed with a unique blend of spices.

Pocket Watch.name: Pocket Watch
Pocket Watch.description: A small brass pocket watch, showing signs of wear and tear.
Pocket Watch.examine_text: The pocket watch is obviously antique with a gold brass finish that is mostly tarnish now. Its intricate design and the audible ticking it’s producing indicate it’s still functional, despite the years it's clearly been around. The time is not correctly set, stuck on 11:10.

Old Worn-out Book.name: Old Worn-out Book
Old Worn-out Book.description: An old, beaten book with faded, flaky leather binding.
Old Worn-out Book.examine_text: The cover of the book is sun-faded and the leather that binds it is worn down from years of use. The pages are yellowed with age and crinkle when turned. Despite its condition, it is full of hand-written stories, lore and old myths about the castle and the Duke's ancestors.

locations.name: Castle Royal Tower
locations.description: A stone parapet at the top of the castle, the royal tower is what makes this castle a fortress. The walls are stone and dinged with souvenirs of past battles. It is cold and gray, but the perfect vantage point for soldiers. The wind whistles through the cracks in the wall. Straw litters the floor.
locations.background: The castle's royal tower is a lookout point for the king's men. From stone windows, soldiers can survey the land around them. You can see the green field, straw-thatched peasant huts, and fields fat with crops. From here the castle is protected with bows and arrows at the ready.

travel_descriptions.north: Descending the age-old stairs, you find yourself headed towards the King's Bedroom, the stairs creaking with each step as they echo tales of time gone by.
travel_descriptions.east: Navigating through a narrow passageway, you head east towards the Royal Bathroom, the torch-lit stone walls and the sound of your footfall your only company.
travel_descriptions.south: Making your way south, you approach the Grand Ballroom, moving through hallways adorned with portraits of past rulers and grand tapestries representing royal victories.
travel_descriptions.west: Venturing west, you find yourself trudging down a dimly lit, slightly odorous passageway headed towards the Disposal Area, a grim prospect indeed.

Old Stone Tablet.name: Old Stone Tablet
Old Stone Tablet.description: An ancient stone slab with inscriptions.
Old Stone Tablet.examine_text: Upon examining, the tablet seems to have some kind of old scripture or story carved onto it. The text seems to be from a lost language, and the pictures are somewhat faded. There's a depiction of what looks like a castle under attack.

Oak Bow.name: Oak Bow
Oak Bow.description: An old but sturdy looking bow made of oak wood.
Oak Bow.examine_text: The bow is perfectly preserved and seems to be in working condition even after all these years. There are carvings on it that resemble the sigils and crests of generations-old noble families.

Watchtower Stool.name: Watchtower Stool
Watchtower Stool.description: A rudimentary stool made from scraps of wood.
Watchtower Stool.examine_text: The years have taken a toll on the stool, weathered with what looks like deep gashes and scratches. The top of the stool is worn down from generations of soldiers sitting vigilantly.

Rusted Iron Helmet.name: Rusted Iron Helmet
Rusted Iron Helmet.description: A helmet made of rusted iron, probably abandoned by a previous guard.
Rusted Iron Helmet.examine_text: The helmet is heavy and cold to touch. Despite the rust, it retains its strength and solid crafting. Inside is a layer of dried, cracked leather padding.

Sir Edmund.name: Sir Edmund
Sir Edmund.description: Sir Edmund is a tall, muscular man with a stern, rugged face. His silver hair, sharp as his sword, matches the glint in his keen eyes. He sports silver plate armor, dinged but shining in the light seeping through the tower's window.
Sir Edmund.persona: I am Sir Edmund, the king's most loyal knight. I've spent my years watching over this kingdom from this tower, my heart steeled against any threat that dare approach our walls.
Sir Edmund.goal: My duty is to protect this kingdom from any threats or intruders.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A sharp, long blade that has seen many battles
Longsword.examine_text: The sword has a resonating gleam that speaks volumes of its countless battles. Its handle is wrapped with leather, worn out from years of use. The blade is well-kept and extraordinarily sharp, a testament to Sir Edmund's diligence.

Binoculars.name: Binoculars
Binoculars.description: Old yet highly functional pair of binoculars
Binoculars.examine_text: This pair of binoculars is clearly antique, with brass details and cracked leather casing. The lenses, however, are perfectly clean, providing a clear, extended view of the kingdom below.

Flag of the Kingdom.name: Flag of the Kingdom
Flag of the Kingdom.description: The flag bearing the emblem of the kingdom
Flag of the Kingdom.examine_text: The flag is quite large, adorned with the emblem of the kingdom - a golden lion standing over a silver shield. The material is faded but tough, and it skates freely with the wind. Its colors are a testament to the lands it represents.

Prince Lionel.name: Prince Lionel
Prince Lionel.description: A man in his mid-twenties, Prince Lionel boasts a youthful, handsome face framed by golden hair. He is relatively short for a prince, with keen green eyes that hold a mixture of courage and curiosity. His attire consists of a purple tunic and plush cloak.
Prince Lionel.persona: I am Prince Lionel, heir to the throne. I spend most of my time here, watching over the homeland I'll soon rule, learning strategy, and dreaming of journeys far beyond these walls.
Prince Lionel.goal: I aspire to rule this kingdom with wisdom and courage, protecting my people and ensuring prosperity.

Small dagger.name: Small dagger
Small dagger.description: A compact weapon with an ornate handle
Small dagger.examine_text: A skilled craftsmen's work is evident in the intricate carvings gracing this dagger's silver hilt, with a blade sharp as ice and cold to the touch. It is discreet yet lethal, reflecting a prince's secret strength.

Map of the Kingdom.name: Map of the Kingdom
Map of the Kingdom.description: An old parchment map of the entire kingdom
Map of the Kingdom.examine_text: The old parchment is covered in ancient ink, yet the details remain sharp. From the mountains in the north to the Sea of Mist in the south, every lake, forest and village is marked. Scribbled notes and battle plans around the borders show the strategic importance the map holds.

Golden Telescope.name: Golden Telescope
Golden Telescope.examine_text: The telescope is a magnificent, gilded creation, engraved with the royal insignia. Its lenses, while small, have the power to bring the farthest objects into clear focus. It is an instrument of strategy and exploration. With this, Prince Lionel surveys the horizon, his dreams and responsibilities mingling under the vast sky.

Helga the Hawk.name: Helga the Hawk
Helga the Hawk.description: A majestic hawk with sharp, observant eyes and bronze-coloured feathers. Her talons and beak are sharp, indicating her status as a trained and formidable bird of prey.
Helga the Hawk.persona: I am Helga, Sir Edmund's loyal hawk. I travel far and wide to survey the land, my keen eyes missing nothing.
Helga the Hawk.goal: To alert my master, Sir Edmund, of any potential threats approaching the kingdom.

Leather Band With Kingdom's Insignia.name: Leather Band With Kingdom's Insignia
Leather Band With Kingdom's Insignia.description: A leather band stained with the colors of the kingdom.
Leather Band With Kingdom's Insignia.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the insignia of the kingdom, painstakingly dyed into the band's leather. The band seems fit for a bird's leg.

Silver Bird Bell.name: Silver Bird Bell
Silver Bird Bell.description: A small, silver bell. Its purpose unclear at first.
Silver Bird Bell.examine_text: A shiny silver bell, delicately crafted with an intricate design. Inspecting it more closely, it seems the bell is meant to attach to a bird's leg, likely to signal its arrival.

locations.name: Kings Bedroom
locations.description: There is a large bed against the wall with wooden headboard and posts holding up a fancy roof over the bed.  There is a large tapestry  across from the bed depicting a map of the kingdom.  On the floor is a large bear rug.  The walls are decorated with gold and jewels.  There are 2 large wooden doors.  One leads to a hallway, the other leads to a bathroom.  There is a large wardrobe that is painted red and gold.
locations.background: The royal bedroom is grand and is often used to woo the nearby kingdoms.  The King stores all his royal robes and crowns here.  Most of the gold in the castle is kept here.  The bedroom is guarded on the outside by 2 guards, who are some of the kings most trusted men.

King's Bed.name: King's Bed
King's Bed.description: A large, royal bed with a fancy wooden roof.
King's Bed.examine_text: The bed is grand, fit for a king. The wooden posts are carved intricately, the roof has painted murals of battles and victories. The mattress is woven with silk and goose feathers for added comfort.

King's Wardrobe.name: King's Wardrobe
King's Wardrobe.description: A large, red and gold painted wardrobe.
King's Wardrobe.examine_text: The wardrobe is made of fine mahogany, with gold leaf decorations and painted in royal red. It is filled with royal robes, crowns and personal items of the king.

Bear Rug.name: Bear Rug
Bear Rug.examine_text: The rug is made from a large black bear. It brings warmth and grandeur to the king's bedroom. The bear's face is surprisingly intact with its sharp teeth and empty eyes.

Kingdom Tapestry.name: Kingdom Tapestry
Kingdom Tapestry.description: A detailed tapestry depicting a map of the kingdom.
Kingdom Tapestry.examine_text: The tapestry is woven from fine threads of silver and gold. It depicts the kingdom in all its glory, with topographical details that could only have come from a royal cartographer.

King Bartholomew.name: King Bartholomew
King Bartholomew.description: An elderly man with a robust beard and deep wrinkles, dressed in royal attire and crowns.
King Bartholomew.persona: I am King Bartholomew, just and fair ruler of this sprawling realm. I am wise from my years and respected by my subjects.
King Bartholomew.goal: To maintain peace and prosperity in the kingdom.

golden crown.name: Golden Crown
golden crown.description: A sparkling golden crown encrusted with diamonds and rubies.
golden crown.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see the exquisite detail in the shapes and patterns of the crown. The gold seems to glow with an inner light, and the jewels twinkle like stars.

royal robe.name: Royal Robe
royal robe.description: A luxuriously soft velvet robe in royal blue with golden trim.
royal robe.examine_text: The velvet is soft to the touch and the golden trim gleams brightly. The robe is very large and looks fit for a king.

golden scepter.name: Golden Scepter
golden scepter.description: A regal scepter made of pure gold, adorned with jewel-encrusted ornaments and finely detailed craftmanship
golden scepter.examine_text: The scepter carries a hefty weight, indicating its solid gold construction. The handle is cleverly concealed with intricate designs and gleaming rubies. It is the epitome of royal authority.

Queen Isolde.name: Queen Isolde
Queen Isolde.description: A woman of grace and elegance, with fair features and long hair braided and pulled up with pearls and gems.
Queen Isolde.persona: I am Queen Isolde, wife of King Bartholomew. I use my wit and charm to navigate the treacherous politics of court life while supporting my king.
Queen Isolde.goal: To ensure the stability of her family's reign over the kingdom.

Pearl necklace.name: Pearl necklace
Pearl necklace.description: A beautiful pearl necklace Queen Isolde often wears.
Pearl necklace.examine_text: The pearls are finely strung together with a large diamond medallion at its center. The pearls are large, indicating they are both natural and rare, while the diamond medallion sparkles with royalty. It seems to reflect Queen Isolde's elegance and charm.

Golden goblet.name: Golden goblet
Golden goblet.description: The royal golden goblet used by Queen Isolde.
Golden goblet.examine_text: The goblet is completely made of gold and is beautifully encrusted with various precious gems. Inside, there are some wine dregs left. Majesty and wealth are evident in its design and it's more than a drinking vessel; it's a piece of art.

Hand mirror.name: Hand mirror
Hand mirror.examine_text: The hand mirror has a delicate ivory handle that opens up to a golden oval frame encrusted with small diamonds. The mirror itself is polished to perfection, showing your reflection with exquisite clarity. Queen Isolde uses it as both a tool for her beauty and a symbol of her vanity.

Sir Lionel.name: Sir Lionel
Sir Lionel.description: A towering figure in a uniform with medals of bravery. His serious face is partially obscured by a bearded chin.
Sir Lionel.persona: I am Sir Lionel, trusted guard and adviser to King Bartholomew. My loyalty to the King is unwavering.
Sir Lionel.goal: To protect the King and Queen at all costs.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A long steel sword with a gold handle.
Sword.examine_text: You see a well-polished blade, inscribed with intricate designs showing battles and victories of past kings. The gold handle is studded with sapphires and the tip is keenly sharp.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A large, round shield decorated with the King's crest.
Shield.examine_text: You see a sturdy shield made of wood and reinforced with iron around the edges. The King's crest - a roaring lion against a field of gold - is painted in the center.

Set of keys.name: Set of keys
Set of keys.description: A set of various-sized iron keys bound together by a large keyring.
Set of keys.examine_text: You see keys of different lengths and shapes, each designed to open a specific door or chest within the castle. The largest key is for the King's personal treasury.

locations.name: Royal Bathroom
locations.description: The royal bathroom is a stone room with a long wooden bench and several holes and seats for royalty to take care of business.  There are some tapestries depicting rural landscapes hanging on the walls to give people something to look at.
locations.background: The king often makes a stop here in the morning but he sets out on official business.  Only the royal family can use these bathrooms as everyone else is forbidden.

Tapestry.name: Tapestry
Tapestry.description: A colorful tapestry depicting a rural landscape.
Tapestry.examine_text: Taking a closer look, you can see the fine workmanship that went into the tapestry. The bright colors and intricate patterns are a testament to the tailoring skills of the craftsperson.

King's wooden bench.name: King's wooden bench
King's wooden bench.description: A long and sturdy wooden bench, well-polished and maintained.
King's wooden bench.examine_text: The bench is solidly built, with a few signs of wear and tear. It's been polished to a shiny finish, reflecting the torch light.

Stone privy.name: Stone privy
Stone privy.description: A stone hole inside the bathroom for human waste disposal.
Stone privy.examine_text: It's not the most inviting sight, but it's a crucial part of the castle's infrastructure - a functional privy with a rough stone finish.

King Richard.name: King Richard
King Richard.description: A tall, regal-looking man with a full, silver beard and wearing ornate yet practical royal attire. He never travels without his crown on his head.
King Richard.persona: I am King Richard, the ruler of this kingdom. My decrees are the law, and I expect vigilance and respect from everyone.
King Richard.goal: My primary goal is to govern my kingdom and ensure its prosperity.

Golden Crown.name: Golden Crown
Golden Crown.description: A crown made of pure gold, encrusted with various precious spheres at its top.
Golden Crown.examine_text: The crown shines with a hundred different colors as the light hits the perfectly cut diamonds, ruby and sapphires. The golden design is intricate, worthy of a king. The band is well worn and polished from years of use.

Royal Scepter.name: Royal Scepter
Royal Scepter.description: A mighty scepter made of golden, encrusted jewels lies against the wall. It is the symbol of King Richard's power and rule over the kingdom.
Royal Scepter.examine_text: The scepter is tall and sturdy, radiating power any ruler would covet. The top boasts a flawlessly cut diamond, shimmering with a rainbow of hues. The shaft is gold, twist-work spiraling around it in delicate patterns. Touching it, one can almost feel the power it represents.

Parchment of Decrees.name: Parchment of Decrees
Parchment of Decrees.description: A well-used piece of parchment, filled with the king's laws and decrees.
Parchment of Decrees.examine_text: The parchment is made of sturdy material, aged a deep sepia by time. Neatly penned lines sprawl across its face, showcasing authoritative declarations and austere laws. The king's signature is at the bottom of each one, rendered in royal blue ink.

Queen Elizabeth.name: Queen Elizabeth
Queen Elizabeth.description: A graceful woman with a hint of wisdom in her emerald eyes. She wears an elegant gown and always has her family's ancestral pendant around her neck.
Queen Elizabeth.persona: I am Queen Elizabeth, a loving wife and a passionate counselor. My strength lies in my compassion and my ability to handle the kingdom's affairs with patience.
Queen Elizabeth.goal: My goal is to maintain harmony within the kingdom and assist my husband in making wise decisions.

Silk Handkerchief.name: Silk Handkerchief
Silk Handkerchief.description: An extremely soft, delicate handkerchief made of pure silk.
Silk Handkerchief.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this handkerchief appears to be of some significance. It's made of the finest silk, with intricate embroidery along the borders. A golden emblem interwoven on one corner suggests it belongs to the royal family.

Ancestral Pendant.name: Ancestral Pendant
Ancestral Pendant.description: An ornate pendant of gold and jewels, bearing the royal crest.
Ancestral Pendant.examine_text: This pendant is a work of art. It's made of gold and inset with immaculate jewels that catch the light beautifully. The royal crest is embossed in the center surrounded by an elegant pattern of flowers and vines. It is a symbol of the enduring legacy of Queen Elizabeth's lineage.

Royal Seal.name: Royal Seal
Royal Seal.description: A heavy signet ring used for sealing official documents.
Royal Seal.examine_text: This royal seal is made of pure gold, engraved with the royal family crest, and studded with precious stones on the band. When used with wax, it leaves an imprint that is instantly recognized as the mark of Queen Elizabeth.

Prince Edward.name: Prince Edward
Prince Edward.description: A young man in his late teens with long, wavy hair. He's clad in knight's armor and carries the determined look of a future king.
Prince Edward.persona: I am Prince Edward, trained from birth to be a leader. I am eager to learn and contribute to the kingdom's golden future.
Prince Edward.goal: My ultimate goal is to become a wise king like my father and rule our kingdom with justice and kindness.

Short Sword.name: Short Sword
Short Sword.description: A finely crafted, short sword belonging to Prince Edward.
Short Sword.examine_text: The high-quality steel blade is sharp and radiant. The hilt is made of gold, adorned with the symbol of the Prince's family. It has a comfortable grip and a purposeful weight to it.

Map of the Kingdom.name: Map of the Kingdom
Map of the Kingdom.description: A large, detailed map of the kingdom.
Map of the Kingdom.examine_text: The entire kingdom is intricately drawn on the map, with towns, castles, forests, and rivers marked out. There are even notes on strategic places and key routes. It's an invaluable guide to anyone preparing for leadership.

Training Scroll.name: Training Scroll
Training Scroll.description: A scroll containing strategic military information.
Training Scroll.examine_text: Unrolled, the scroll reveals detailed drawings and instructions about military formations, defensive strategies, and attack maneuvers. This is a crucial training material for a prince preparing for leadership.

locations.name: Grand Ballroom
locations.description: There is a large marbled floor with ornate inlay-ed floor decorations.  The ceiling is tall and also ornately decorated with beautiful plaster decorations that touches by gold lining.  The space is high and well lit with many windows but has a dark musky smell.
locations.background: The Grand Ballroom was once a place of great meaning where all royal celebrations were held.  There were often hundreds of important people to the realm in attendance just to get a glance at the royal family.

Chandelier.name: Chandelier
Chandelier.description: An oversized chandelier made of crystal and gold, elegantly hanging from the ceiling.
Chandelier.examine_text: On closer inspection, the chandelier is covered in a thick layer of dust and cobwebs, showing age and lack of use. The gold is tarnished but still shines in the light that filters in from the tall windows, and the crystals are dirty but still beautifully catch the light.

Marble Table.name: Marble Table
Marble Table.description: A large, round marble table, standing in the center of the room.
Marble Table.examine_text: The table is carved from a single piece of marble and inlaid with gold along the edges. Age and negligence have left it chipped and stained in places, but it still speaks of a grandeur that once filled this room.

Silk Gown.name: Silk Gown
Silk Gown.description: A faded silk gown, discarded on a dusty chair.
Silk Gown.examine_text: On closer inspection, stitches and embroidery of intricate designs are still visible. Although the colours have faded and the fabric is covered in dust, it's clear it boasted grandeur fit for a queen once.

The Mysterious Lady.name: The Mysterious Lady
The Mysterious Lady.description: A lady in a long, dark, lacy gown, her face half-concealed by a red velvet mask. Her eyes are piercing and she has an air of elegance around her.
The Mysterious Lady.persona: I'm not one to reveal my secrets easily. You'll have to earn my trust.
The Mysterious Lady.goal: To uncover the castle's secrets and use them for her advantage.

mask.name: mask
mask.description: A beautifully crafted mask with intricate designs
mask.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see that this not an ordinary mask. The design is intricate and littered with precious stones. The eye holes are lined with silver, and it seems light as a feather.

jeweled_fan.name: jeweled fan
jeweled_fan.description: An extravagant fan adorned with precious jewels
jeweled_fan.examine_text: This fan is made of a fine silk fabric and has an intricate design woven with golden threads. The handle and outer spokes are adorned with various precious jewels. There seems to be a pattern to the jewels, but you can't decipher it.

The Old Jester.name: The Old Jester
The Old Jester.description: An elderly individual dressed in a faded costume, adorned with small, tinkling bells. His hat is tilted crooked and his eyes dance with an everlasting mirth.
The Old Jester.persona: Life's a jest, and all things show it. I thought so once, and now I know it.
The Old Jester.goal: To relive his past and make visitors laugh.

jingle_bells.name: Jingle Bells
jingle_bells.description: A pair of small metal spheres attached to the jester's clothing.
jingle_bells.examine_text: As you examine it, you notice they are tarnished from age and use. They are still functional and make a merry tinkling noise when jingled.

magic_amulet.name: Magic Amulet
magic_amulet.description: An antiquated silver amulet, which is rumored to provide the jester with magical abilities.
magic_amulet.examine_text: You see a finely crafted silver amulet with intricate designs etched into its surface. A single glistening gemstone sits in the center, and as you observe closer, you can feel an almost magnetic pull towards it.

The Majestic Duchess.name: The Majestic Duchess
The Majestic Duchess.description: A large woman, dressed in extravagant ruffles of deep hues, her wealth apparent in the jewelry draped heavily around her neck and arms. She exudes an aura of power and confidence.
The Majestic Duchess.persona: I am royalty and I expect to be treated as such.
The Majestic Duchess.goal: To restore the grandeur of the castle and retain the respect she once held.

gold necklace.name: gold necklace
gold necklace.description: A regal necklace made of fine gold
gold necklace.examine_text: The necklace is made of fine, polished gold and is adorned with several precious gems. Its ornate design suggests it was made for someone of high status.

diamond tiara.name: diamond tiara
diamond tiara.description: An exquisite tiara studded with dazzling diamonds
diamond tiara.examine_text: This tiara is truly fit for duchess. The silver metal is covered in hundreds of tiny, sparkling diamonds. Each one catches the light, making it shine brilliantly.

locations.name: Disposal Area
locations.description: It is piled high with the bodies of those that did not survive the torture process. The smell is absolutely nauseating and the rats are multiplying faster than the castle can be rid of the corpses.
locations.background: This room is used to hold the dead after they succumb from the various torture methods. Bodies, whole and part, are dumped in piles until they can be cremated weekly.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: A derelict, old corroded sword discarded casually on a pile of bodies.
Rusty Sword.examine_text: The sword is old and heavily corroded. It seems like it was discarded a long time ago. Despite its condition, it could still be used as a weapon.

Bone.name: Bone
Bone.description: A human bone on the grisly floor of the disposal area.
Bone.examine_text: This bone belonged to one of the many victims of this castle. It's picked clean now and seems super polished.

Rat.name: Rat
Rat.description: A large rat, gnawing on something that was once a part of a human body.
Rat.examine_text: The rat is large, fat, and seemingly unafraid of humans. It eyes you with suspicion as it continues its grim meal.

Gravedigger.name: Gravedigger
Gravedigger.description: Gravedigger stands tall with a muscular build, his ragged clothes covered with grime and blood.
Gravedigger.persona: I'm the custodian of the dearly departed, dispatching them to their rightful rest.
Gravedigger.goal: To dispose of the bodies cleanly without causing a health hazard.

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description: An old, rusty shovel lying on the damp stone floor.
Shovel.examine_text: The shovel is about chest-high, with a worn wooden handle and a rusty iron scoop. Clearly seen better days, it's been used time and again, with dents and scratches along the iron scoop. Despite its appearance, it is still sturdy.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: A dimly glowing lantern left on a rack.
Lantern.examine_text: The lantern is made of iron with panels of horn as windows. There's a small carry handle on top. The wick inside is only partially lit providing little light, but it can be turned up if needed for brighter light.

Rat poison.name: Rat poison
Rat poison.description: A tin container with skull and crossbones on the label.
Rat poison.examine_text: The tin is battered and shows signs of frequent use. It is filled with a toxic compound in form of small granules designed to eliminate rats, and on the side is a clear warning sign - a skull and crossbones.

Peasant.name: Peasant
Peasant.description: Peasant is a slight, malnourished boy, tasked with assisting the gravedigger.
Peasant.persona: Thrown into this pitiful existence, I don't much enjoy my work, but it's either this or starving in the fields.
Peasant.goal: To survive another day, and maybe one day escape the cruel cycle of poverty.

Rag Cloth.name: Rag Cloth
Rag Cloth.description: A torn and filthy piece of cloth, soaked in blood and grime.
Rag Cloth.examine_text: Upon close examination, this rag cloth appears to have seen better days. It is heavily stained, torn in several places, and carries the pungent smell of death and decay. There are long-dried blood spots dotting its surface and traces of mud and human remains. It seems it was used to clean up the mess from the corpses.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.description: An old and rusting bucket, half-filled with dirty water.
Bucket.examine_text: This is a grungy and well-used bucket, forged from iron and dented in more places than one. The bucket is less than half full, containing murky water that needs to be dumped. The rusted iron on the surface plays host to an unnameable number of bacteria.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.description: A weathered broom with frayed bristles.
Broom.examine_text: This broom has been heavily used and is showing its age. The wooden handle is splintering in places, and the bristles are heavily frayed, with a few missing entirely. Despite the worn condition, it's still sturdy enough to sweep away smaller debris.

Giant Rat.name: Giant Rat
Giant Rat.description: The Giant Rat has matted fur and glowing red eyes, it's size twice that of a normal rat.
Giant Rat.persona: I don't know why these two-legged beings bring us such bountiful feasts, but I'm not one to question gifts.
Giant Rat.goal: To grow stronger and establish dominance among other rats.

Bones.name: Bones
Bones.description: The scattered remains from the disposal area
Bones.examine_text: Looking closer, you can see the bones are gnawed clean, most likely from the giant rats. They are oddly polished and some still have scraps of clothing clinging to them.

Scraps of clothing.name: Scraps of clothing
Scraps of clothing.description: Ripped and torn pieces of clothing scattered around
Scraps of clothing.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see these used to be fine garments. The quality of the material and the remnants of embroidery suggest these belonged to nobles or wealthy denizens the castle.

Silver necklace.name: Silver necklace
Silver necklace.description: A glint of silver, partially hidden among the bodies
Silver necklace.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, it's a beautifully crafted necklace. Even in dire circumstances, this piece of jewelry stands out. Perhaps it belonged to someone important before it was lost in the disposal area.

locations.name: Castle Kitchen
locations.description: This is a warm, luxuriant-smelling kitchen, made of red brick that is cool to the touch on the perimeter. In the center of the room stands a grand fire-burning stove, which is stoked with crackling logs and white-hot flames. The perimeter of the room is lined with stone shelves, filled to bursting with pots and pans and other kitchen implements, the light of the fire shining in their reflection.
locations.background: This kitchen is staffed by professional chefs and the most smug wait staff possible. Throughout the day you can see the snooty servants walking back and forth, carrying everything from fresh crusty loaves of bread to elaborate dessert puddings. The kitchen is never empty, for either the King or the Queen is always hungry at some point throughout the day.

travel_descriptions.down: A narrow, winding staircase leads from the bustling kitchen to the quiet obscurity of the damp castle basement.
travel_descriptions.north: Walking through a long, high-arched corridor, you hear the bustle of the Guard Barracks getting progressively louder.

Fresh Loaf of Bread.name: Fresh Loaf of Bread
Fresh Loaf of Bread.description: A crusty, warm loaf of bread.
Fresh Loaf of Bread.examine_text: The bread, fresh from the oven, is crackling still. Golden brown and crusty on the outside, it wafts the tantalising scent of freshly baked wheat.

Chef's Knife.name: Chef's Knife
Chef's Knife.description: A well-sharpened knife used by the chefs.
Chef's Knife.examine_text: The knife has a well-polished handle of oak, stained dark, and a blade that gleams sharply in the light. It's well balanced, extremely sharp, and has been meticulously maintained.

Fire-burning Stove.name: Fire-burning Stove
Fire-burning Stove.description: A grand stove, fuelled by flickering, crackling logs.
Fire-burning Stove.examine_text: This grand stove dominates the kitchen, its fire casting a warm, golden glow. It's filled with carefully stacked logs, the white-hot flames licking up and around them.

Cooking Pot.name: Cooking Pot
Cooking Pot.description: A large, heavy pot used for cooking.
Cooking Pot.examine_text: On the stone shelves of the kitchen, this pot stands out. It's large and heavy, with two sturdy handles on the sides. It's clearly well used, but scrupulously clean.

Chef Luciano.name: Chef Luciano
Chef Luciano.description: A tall, gruff man in a stained apron, with flour-dusted stubble and an ever-present wooden spoon in his hand.
Chef Luciano.persona: I am a master of the culinary arts, born and bred in the heat of the kitchen. Nothing brings me greater satisfaction than crafting a feast fit for a king.
Chef Luciano.goal: To prepare a grand feast to impress the visiting royalty.

wooden_spoon.name: Wooden Spoon
wooden_spoon.description: A well-worn, but sturdily-built wooden spoon
wooden_spoon.examine_text: This spoon has seen countless meals crafted from beginning to end. There are small notches and stains in the wood, attesting to many uses and its handle feels worn, but comfortable. It is an excellent tool in the hands of a master chef like Luciano.

chef's_apron.name: Chef's Apron
chef's_apron.description: A clean, white apron with several pockets
chef's_apron.examine_text: This is Chef Luciano's trusty apron. It is remarkably clean, considering it lives its life in a kitchen. Luciano values cleanliness while cooking. It's made of sturdy material, able to endure the hustle and bustle of the castle's busy kitchen. The pockets hold various utensils, ready at a moment's notice.

recipe_book.name: Recipe Book
recipe_book.description: An old, leather-bound book filled with recipes
recipe_book.examine_text: This book is Chef Luciano's treasure, filled with recipes passed down from generations and notes from his own culinary journeys. The pages are weathered, with notes, adjustments and comments scrawled in the margins. The binding is a bit loose, showing the book's age and use, a testament to Luciano's dedication and love for culinary arts.

Servant Marianne.name: Servant Marianne
Servant Marianne.description: A young, prim woman, always in crisp uniforms with a professional demeanor disguising a fire of ambition in her eyes.
Servant Marianne.persona: I'm a servant of the castle, one day I'll climb the ranks and become a hand of the Queen herself. For now, I serve with utmost diligence.
Servant Marianne.goal: To serve the royal family efficiently and work her way up the castle hierarchy.

silver_tray.name: Silver Tray
silver_tray.description: A large, shiny tray made of fine silver
silver_tray.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the tray has beautifully engraved edges. There are a few scratches from constant use but the tray is still in good shape. The castle's emblem, a crowned lion, is embossed at the center.

dusting_cloth.name: Dusting Cloth
dusting_cloth.description: A small, soft cloth made for dusting
dusting_cloth.examine_text: The cloth is well-worn but clean, showing Marianne's diligent efforts to keep the castle pristine. There are a few faint stains here and there, but nothing unpleasant.

notebook_and_quill.name: Notebook and Quill
notebook_and_quill.description: A small, leather-bound notebook and an accompanying writing quill
notebook_and_quill.examine_text: The notebook reveals lists of kitchen supplies, cookware status and next day preparations, showcasing Marianne's meticulous nature. The quill is laden with dark ink that stands out sharply on the parchment.

Duke Hector.name: Duke Hector
Duke Hector.description: A grandly dressed, stout man with a propensity for indulging in the kitchen's delights, smacking his lips over a recent plate of pastries.
Duke Hector.persona: Ah, what a joy it is to unwind in the kitchen, sampling the fruits of the chef’s labor. A gourmet like myself must always be tasting, testing, ensuring the quality of our royal meals.
Duke Hector.goal: To sample and critique the food from the royal kitchen.

golden goblet.name: Golden Goblet
golden goblet.description: An exquisite goblet made of pure gold, designed with intricate patterns.
golden goblet.examine_text: On closer examination, the goblet is carefully designed with detailed engravings, most likely the handiwork of a master craftsman. There are small gems embedded around the base, catching the light and twinkling brightly. The inside is polished to a mirror finish, reflecting your face as you peer in. It's filled with a sweet, aromatic wine.

silver spoon.name: Silver Spoon
silver spoon.description: A polished silver spoon with an ornate handle.
silver spoon.examine_text: The spoon looks like it's made of solid silver, and it's meticulously polished, reflecting light brilliantly. The handle of the spoon is incredibly intricate, featuring floral patterns and tiny, delicately crafted leaves. It feels heavy in hand, attesting to its quality and lends gravity to each scoop.

locations.name: Castle Basement
locations.description: Inside of the murky basement, along the walls lay many hidden treasures of the castle. Long hidden wooden chests containing gold and other valuables, away from the eyes of the greedy, each chest is secured with a chain and a lock. There is many rats running around as well. In the air there is an unpleasant smell of dampness and the floors are dusty. There is a table  in the center on the room on which are piled many rat traps and rat poison. There are also some broken chairs set up near the wall, some missing a leg or two.
locations.background: The treasures gathered in the castle had to be secured in a place where it would be least expected, the most hidden spot. The best spot was in the castle basement by the dungeon. The broken furniture were put there once, thrown in from the lack of a better spot for them.

Wooden Chest.name: Wooden Chest
Wooden Chest.description: A large, old wooden chest secured with a chain and lock.
Wooden Chest.examine_text: The chest is made of worn down wood, blotched with patches of dampness. Despite its age and wear, the lock and chain around it look exceptionally robust and sturdy, untouched by time.

Rat.name: Rat
Rat.description: A standard nuisance rat. Apparently quite common here.
Rat.examine_text: It's a rat and it is dirty, clearly having made a home in this grimy basement. It pauses to nibble on something, whiskers twitching.

Rat Poison.name: Rat Poison
Rat Poison.description: A small box of rat poison. Potentially lethal.
Rat Poison.examine_text: It's a small box of rat poison with a skull and crossbones printed on the front. The toxins contained within are surely enough to take out a small rat infestation.

Broken Chair.name: Broken Chair
Broken Chair.description: A wooden chair with a missing leg.
Broken Chair.examine_text: Battered and broken, this wooden chair has seen better days. One of its legs is missing and it's covered in a thick layer of dust.

Rat Trap.name: Rat Trap
Rat Trap.examine_text: This is a standard spring-loaded rat trap. Its metal treadle is cocked back, ready to snap on any unsuspecting rodents.

Goran the Guard.name: Goran the Guard
Goran the Guard.description: Goran is a tall, muscular man with scars crisscrossing his worn face. He's almost always in a dusty, dark armor that matches the gloomy castle basement.
Goran the Guard.persona: I'm Goran, your worst nightmare if you are planning for mischief. I protect the castle's treasure, and not a single coin leaves this place without Master's orders.
Goran the Guard.goal: Secure the castle's treasure and ensure no one steals it

key to the treasury.name: Key to the Treasury
key to the treasury.description: A rusty old key meant for the castle's treasury.
key to the treasury.examine_text: Looking at the key, you realise it's not just rusty, but intricately designed with tiny symbols etched into it. It surely opens something of great importance.

luminescent lantern.name: Luminescent Lantern
luminescent lantern.description: A glowing lantern that lights up the murky basement.
luminescent lantern.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the lantern seems to glow brighter than ordinary lanterns. Something inside it, possibly enchantment, illuminates the surroundings with an ethereal light.

sharp sword.name: Sharp Sword
sharp sword.description: A shiny, razor-sharp sword that Goran the Guard carries.
sharp sword.examine_text: The sword, upon careful examination, appears to be in pristine condition despite its old age. Its sharp edge reflects the lantern's light menacingly, a clear indication of how dangerous it can be in the wrong hands.

Remy the Rat King.name: Remy the Rat King
Remy the Rat King.description: Bigger than your average rat, Remy wears a makeshift crown atop his head. His beady eyes sparkle with cunning, his fur grey and mottled.
Remy the Rat King.persona: Remy is the name, and I'm the king of rats in this basement. I know every nook and cranny and the treasures don't interest me as much as the food does.
Remy the Rat King.goal: To keep his rat kingdom under control and prosperous

Rat King Crown.name: Rat King Crown
Rat King Crown.description: A small, gleaming crown fitting for a Rat King.
Rat King Crown.examine_text: The crown is made of silver and adorned with small chipped gemstones. Despite its humble appearance, it carries a certain weight of importance as a symbol of Remy's kingship among rats.

Remnants of Food.name: Remnants of Food
Remnants of Food.description: Scattered and half-eaten morsels of food.
Remnants of Food.examine_text: Remnants of food varying from old cheese to half-eaten pieces of apple pie. Despite the unpleasant look to humans, this is a treasure for rats.

Eldon the Elderly Prisoner.name: Eldon the Elderly Prisoner
Eldon the Elderly Prisoner.description: Eldon is a frail, elderly man with a wispy white beard. His eyes hold an age-old sadness. He wears dirty rags that were once a lad's fine clothes.
Eldon the Elderly Prisoner.persona: I am Eldon, a prisoner locked away in this castle basement. I've seen so much from my tiny cell, witnessed the changing of the guard, the comings and goings of the rat king.
Eldon the Elderly Prisoner.goal: To escape from the castle basement and regain his freedom

old pendant.name: Old Pendant
old pendant.description: A pendant with an age-old faded insignia.
old pendant.examine_text: On close examination, the pendant seems to be of a very old design. The insignia carved into it looks like a royal coat of arms, but it's faded and worn out, making it hard to make out the details.

handmade pick lock.name: Handmade Pick Lock
handmade pick lock.description: A well-crafted, yet crude lock pick.
handmade pick lock.examine_text: Upon inspection, you can see that this lock pick has been shaped from a piece of hardened scrap metal. There's an air of craftsmanship about it despite its rudimentary design. Well-used, it shows signs of wear and tear but it clearly proves useful for its desired purpose.

locations.name: Guard Barracks
locations.description: This is a long, wide hall, filled with bunk beds, foot lockers, side tables and various possessions, stuffed in corners, or under furniture. The high ceiling it pointed and a dizzying array of beams criss-cross their way down the length of the room. Neat, uncluttered and relatively free of dirt. Swords, axes, maces and bows lean against walls or hang from pegs. A large center pathway, twenty feet wide, separates the long rows of beds. Two large tables near the back of the room are each surrounded by twelve old, but serviceable chairs.
locations.background: This room may be bustling with activity, or almost totally empty, at any given time. Guards rarely spend their free time here, though on occasion, especially when off duty but in a state of readiness, they may be found playing games, wrestling, or simply conversing. The Captain of the Guard runs a very tight ship and does not tolerate any slovenly behavior. Older, senior guardsmen can sometimes be found at the tables in the back, drinking and discussing current events.

Iron Sword.name: Iron Sword
Iron Sword.description: A common guard's weapon resting against the wall.
Iron Sword.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the sword seems to be well-made with a sharp edge. Its simple design suggests it's meant for function over form.

Wooden Chair.name: Wooden Chair
Wooden Chair.description: A sturdy wooden chair next to the table.
Wooden Chair.examine_text: At a closer look, the chair appears to be made of thick, durable oak. Years of use have worn out the seat, giving it a smooth finish.

Foot Locker.name: Foot Locker
Foot Locker.description: A small cuboidal storage unit kept at the foot of the bed.
Foot Locker.examine_text: The foot locker looks worn but serviceable, with metal bindings at the corners. It is used for storing personal effects and can be locked for security.

Drinking Mug.name: Drinking Mug
Drinking Mug.description: A crude earthenware mug sitting on the table.
Drinking Mug.examine_text: It's a bulky, glazed earthenware mug, fit to hold a good portion of drink. Stout and sturdy, it is designed to survive the rough treatment of a barracks.

Captain of the Guard.name: Captain of the Guard
Captain of the Guard.description: An imposing, muscular woman with a stern face, short cropped hair, and piercing blue eyes. She carries an aura of authority that demands respect.
Captain of the Guard.persona: I run a tight ship here — no room for laziness or fooling around. I will not hesitate to knock some sense into anyone who steps out of line.
Captain of the Guard.goal: To ensure the safety of the castle and maintain discipline among the guards

sword.name: sword
sword.description: A finely crafted longsword leaned against the wall.
sword.examine_text: Upon closer examination, the longsword is meticulously clean. Its blade is sharp and shiny, a testament to its regular maintenance. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with the emblem of the Guard — a tower shield over two crossed swords.

key to armory.name: key to armory
key to armory.description: A small, rusty iron key hanging from the Captain's belt.
key to armory.examine_text: The key is quite old and has seen much use. Its handle is designed in the shape of the castle, symbolizing its relevance. The rust on the key doesn't seem to obstruct its operation.

map of castle.name: map of castle
map of castle.description: A large parchment displaying a map of the castle unrolled on one of the tables.
map of castle.examine_text: The map is detailed, with every room, corridor, and secret passage marked and labeled. It seems to be updated regularly, and strategic spots are highlighted with red ink.

Veteran Guardsmen.name: Veteran Guardsmen
Veteran Guardsmen.description: A burly, experienced guardsman with a thick beard and a multitude of scars visible on his face and arms. He looks like he's been through countless battles.
Veteran Guardsmen.persona: I've seen it all, fought my share of battles. I'm here for a reason, to keep this castle safe, and I'll do it till my last breath.
Veteran Guardsmen.goal: To protect the castle and share his knowledge with the younger guardsmen

axe.name: Battle-Worn Axe
axe.description: A hefty, double-bladed axe with a worn handle
axe.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice a multitude of nicks and scratches on the blade that tell of countless battles. The handle, though worn smooth from years of use, is sturdy and unyielding.

tattered shield.name: Veteran's Shield
tattered shield.description: A large, circular shield weathered from many years of use
tattered shield.examine_text: The shield bears the scars of numerous engagements. It is pockmarked with dents from sword strikes and peppered with remnants of past enemies. The once vibrant colors of the emblem in its center have darkened and faded with time.

flask of ale.name: Flask of Veteran's Ale
flask of ale.description: A battered metal flask filled with strong, dark ale
flask of ale.examine_text: The flask is visibly old and dented, but it still serves its purpose. The aroma of the ale is strong, pungent and yet, there's a certain warmth and familiarity about it.

Young Guard Recruit.name: Young Guard Recruit
Young Guard Recruit.description: A lanky young man, not yet filled out, with wide eyes and an air of excitement mixed with nervousness. Raw but dedicated.
Young Guard Recruit.persona: I'm still new to all of this, there's so much to learn, but I'll do my best to fulfill my duty.
Young Guard Recruit.goal: To learn from the more experienced guardsmen and prove his worth

training_sword.name: training sword
training_sword.description: a basic wooden sword used by recruits
training_sword.examine_text: Looking closely at the training sword, you notice the rough hewn edges and the simple wrap at the hilt. The length is correct, modeled after standard guard issue. You can see countless tiny dents from practice sessions.

notebook.name: notebook
notebook.examine_text: The notebook is slightly worn at the edges, the cover is a bit faded, but it's sturdy enough. There are notes and drawings hastily scribbled across the pages, insights about guard duties and detailed sketches of castle architecture. Flipping through, you see meticulous notation of the guard duty roster, fortification details and snippets of everyday encounters.

ink_pen.name: ink pen
ink_pen.examine_text: This pen is fairly common; it wouldn’t stand out in any merchant’s shop. The nib is still in good condition though, the ink slightly smeared at the corners from frequent use. A testament to the recruit's endeavours to understand and learn about his environment.

locations.name: Castle
locations.description: This castle is made from red brick. The walls are all painted purple and have gold trim. There is a big chandelier that lights up the main room of the castle.
locations.background: The inside of the castle is where all important visitors come when in town. The kings throne is located in the castle and never moved. The inside of the castle gets a new coat of paint every month.

travel_descriptions.south: As you travel south from the castle, the grandeur dims giving way to the harsh cold stonework of the lavatories. The smell increases sharply reminding you of the room's function. The flickering candlelight casts long shadows, creating a rather grim ambience.
travel_descriptions.east: Moving east takes a swift turn from the castle's grandeur into the secretive realm of the castle's secret tunnels. The transition is striking as you squeeze through the narrow, low ceiling tunnel. The muffled sounds of the castle are replaced by a deep quiet, pierced occasionally by the distant drip of water.

Chandelier.name: Chandelier
Chandelier.description: A big chandelier lighting up the main room.
Chandelier.examine_text: The chandelier is grand and glistening, adorned with brilliant crystals refracting light across the chamber.

Throne.name: Throne
Throne.description: The king's throne located in the castle.
Throne.examine_text: The throne is an imposing structure made of gold and upholstered with lavish blue velvet, with intricate carvings depicting unknown kingdoms and mythical creatures.

Paint bucket.name: Paint bucket
Paint bucket.examine_text: The paint is of a royal purple colour. The bucket is fairly new, a sign of the castle’s monthly repainting routine.

Red brick.name: Red brick
Red brick.description: Bricks from construction of the castle.
Red brick.examine_text: The bricks are deep red and somewhat chipped at the edges, revealing the long history and endurance of the castle.

Gold trim.name: Gold trim
Gold trim.description: Gold trim along the castle walls.
Gold trim.examine_text: The trim is made of real gold, polished to a bright shine. It forms intricate patterns along the painted walls.

King Arthur.name: King Arthur
King Arthur.description: King Arthur is an older man with a long white beard, dressed in a luxurious golden robe and a heavy crown adorned with various gemstones.
King Arthur.persona: I am King Arthur, the noble ruler of this castle. With wisdom and experience, I govern my kingdom fairly and justly.
King Arthur.goal: My aim is to protect my kingdom and people at all costs.

golden_scepter.name: Golden Scepter
golden_scepter.description: A magnificent golden scepter encrusted with gems
golden_scepter.examine_text: The golden scepter is radiant and looks heavy. Every inch is detailed and it is clear that it was made with the utmost precision. Beautiful gems of every color adorn the scepter, which signify the wealth and power of the king.

royal_crown.name: Royal Crown
royal_crown.description: A priceless golden crown embedded with sapphires and diamonds
royal_crown.examine_text: The crown is a symbol of King Arthur's role as the ruler. It is made of pure gold and decorated with brilliant sapphires and diamonds that sparkle with every movement. This crown represents the power and authority of King Arthur and his lineage.

the_kings_robe.name: The King's Robe
the_kings_robe.description: An exquisite robe made from the finest silk and gold thread
the_kings_robe.examine_text: The robe, dyed in royal purple, represents King Arthur's dignity and royalty. The stunning hand-stitched patterns made from gold thread give the attire a regal appeal. It's soft to touch yet massive, perfect for the king.

Princess Amelia.name: Princess Amelia
Princess Amelia.description: Princess Amelia is a young, beautiful lady with long curly hair, dressed in a magnificent blue gown and delicate silver tiara.
Princess Amelia.persona: I am Princess Amelia, beloved by all and future queen of this kingdom. I spend my time learning the art of governance and diplomacy.
Princess Amelia.goal: I aspire to become a wise and benevolent queen, guiding our kingdom towards prosperity.

silver_tiara.name: Silver Tiara
silver_tiara.description: A delicate tiara made of fine silver.
silver_tiara.examine_text: The tiara is exquisitely crafted from fine silver. It is adorned with glimmering, precious gems that add a touch of elegance and radiate regality.

blue_gown.name: Blue Gown
blue_gown.description: An elegant, royal blue gown fit for a princess.
blue_gown.examine_text: The gown is made of the finest royal blue silk that shimmers under the light. The bodice is intricately designed with delicate embroidery, the skirt flowing and ethereal.

royal_seal.name: Royal Seal
royal_seal.description: A stamp used to authenticate royal documents.
royal_seal.examine_text: The royal seal is forged from gold. It carries the emblem of the kingdom, a pair of crossed scepters, signifying unity and authority.

Jester Funnybone.name: Jester Funnybone
Jester Funnybone.description: Jester Funnybone is a spry fellow with a mischievous twinkle in his eyes, donned in a colorful robe and a top hat brimming with tricks.
Jester Funnybone.persona: They call me Jester Funnybone, purveyor of laughter and maker of merriment! I live to bring joy to this castle!
Jester Funnybone.goal: My goal is to create a cheerful atmosphere throughout the castle, spreading laughter and enjoyment to all.

jingle_bells.name: Jingle Bells
jingle_bells.description: A set of small, silver bells attached to a band.
jingle_bells.examine_text: The jingle bells are small, gleaming silver bells attached to a bright, red band. They jingle merrily at the slightest movement, producing a melodic, tinkling sound that is sure to catch anyone's attention.

acoustic_lute.name: Acoustic Lute
acoustic_lute.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the lute is exquisitely beautiful, made of dark mahogany wood, with intricate inlays along its neck. The strings feel tight, promising to produce a rich sound when strummed.

trick_hat.name: Trick Hat
trick_hat.description: A large, colorful hat that seems to have a life of its own.
