trick_hat.examine_text: The trick hat is bright in colour, made with different patches of fabric. It seems to shift and move on its own, extending and retracting in odd ways. You realise that it might be a part of Jester Funnybone's set of trick items.

locations.name: Lavoratory
locations.description: The lavatory contains a long trough for which the knights can use for urination. Crude toilets are also included for defecation. The design is all stone walls with candles, and no privacy walls.
locations.background: The room is not very pleasant since there is no ventilation to the outside. The smell can become rancid, but this is somewhat curbed by the cleaning performed by the servants. Servants will come and scoop out the troughs and toilets into wheelbarrows three times per day and wheel the waste to a nearby creek. Once a night, they will scrub the insides, as well, to help get rid of leftover waste.

Candle.name: Candle
Candle.description: A small wax candle, flickering dimly.
Candle.examine_text: This simple candle illuminates the room with a warm, soft glow. It's been left here to make the space less dark, more comforting in its own way.

Toilet Scrubber.name: Toilet Scrubber
Toilet Scrubber.description: A sturdy, long-handled brush with coarse bristles.
Toilet Scrubber.examine_text: It's definitely been used for the grueling task of cleaning the communal toilets, yet appears to be in a surprisingly good state. Must be well taken care of.

Stone Trough.name: Stone Trough
Stone Trough.examine_text: The trough looks incredibly solid and heavy, fitting for this castle. It shows the wear of constant use but surprisingly doesn’t seem too weathered.

Crude Toilet.name: Crude Toilet
Crude Toilet.description: A simple hole in the ground, it's function all too apparent.
Crude Toilet.examine_text: It's just a hole carved into the stone floor, far from the modern toilets you're accustomed to. Despite this, it appears to be cleaned regularly and is faintly less gross than you'd guess.

Sir Gallant.name: Sir Gallant
Sir Gallant.description: A tall, muscular knight with a well-groomed beard, wearing shiny full body armor. His helmet is under his arm exposing his sweaty forehead.
Sir Gallant.persona: I am always prepared for a battle, no matter the hour. You will always find my armor as shiny as the moonlight and my sword as sharp as a razor.
Sir Gallant.goal: To valiantly defend the castle from all forms of threat.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: Sir Gallant’s trusty sword remains in a scabbard worn at his side.
Sword.examine_text: The sword is made of pure steel, reflecting the glimmering flames from nearby candles. Crisp edges reveal its razor sharpness, and intricate patterns etched close to the hilt pronounce its distinctiveness. It is a symbol of status, pride, and power.

Helmet.name: Helmet
Helmet.description: A shiny steel helmet rests next to the trough.
Helmet.examine_text: Expertly crafted, the helmet shines brilliantly as the centerpiece of Sir Gallant’s armour. Its sturdy design and exquisitely polished surface not only protects the wearer but also intimidates foes. Decorative elms stand atop, signifying the valor and gallantry associated with Sir Gallant.

Crusader Ring.name: Crusader Ring
Crusader Ring.description: Sir Gallant's Crusader Ring is perched on a small stone ledge.
Crusader Ring.examine_text: The Crusader Ring glistens in candlelight, its inlaid jewels refracting an array of colours. It symbolizes dedication to the holy wars undertaken by the knights of the realm. An engraved Latin inscription runs the inside circumference of the ring, detailing a prayer for strength and serenity.

Maid Gretel.name: Maid Gretel
Maid Gretel.description: A small, delicate woman with a plain face. Her clothes are mostly rags and carry a strong smell of human waste.
Maid Gretel.persona: I'm here to keep the lavatory clean. People do not see my worth but this is  an important job.
Maid Gretel.goal: To keep the lavatory clean for the comfort of the castle occupants.

Bucket.name: Bucket
Bucket.examine_text: You see a wooden bucket. It's rather large and looks sturdy. The bucket has seen its fair share of use as evidenced by the numerous stains, some of which look quite old. Some initials, 'M.G.', are hastily carved at the bottom.

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.examine_text: This broom is made from a long wooden handle, at the end of which is a bundle of straw tied together. The broom is well-worn, suggesting it has been used quite extensively. The letters 'M.G.' are burnt into the wooden handle.

Rag.name: Rag
Rag.examine_text: This rag is smudged with various colors and there are frayed spots where the cloth is worn thin. The rag appears heavily used, but it seems to have been recently used, implying it is used often. A small, embroidered 'M.G.' can be seen on one of the edges.

Knight Rupert.name: Knight Rupert
Knight Rupert.description: A middle-aged, burly knight with an unruly beard. He is seen without his upper body armor, revealing a scarred body underneath.
Knight Rupert.persona: War does not scare me, but the thought of not being ready does. Hence, you will find me preparing for the next battle in the most unexpected places.
Knight Rupert.goal: Prepare for the upcoming war which might be our last.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: It is a sturdy, sharp, double-edged long blade.
Sword.examine_text: Knight Rupert's sword is a long, double-edged blade made of metal. It is worn from use, but clearly well cared for.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: It is a large, round shield with a lion emblem.
Shield.examine_text: Knight Rupert's shield is large and round, made of sturdy oaken wood and enforced with iron bands. There is a lion emblem embossed on its front, a symbol of courage and power.

Amulet.name: Amulet
Amulet.description: It is a brass amulet with a red gemstone.
Amulet.examine_text: Knight Rupert's amulet is an intricately crafted piece of jewelry, made of polished brass, housing a single glittering red gemstone. It is said to provide protection.

locations.name: Secret Tunnel
locations.description: this secret tunnel is like a vein to the castle.  It leads to many other rooms within the castle.  This includes passage to the dungeon, the throne room, the kings chambers, and a secret exit to the outside.  You must be careful because the tunnel is small to maintain its secrecy.  There are 5 different rooms to the castle that can be accessed through this room. This also proves as a good escape route as enemies with large armor will not be able to fit through.
locations.background: These tunnels were created in secret because there was a large group within the kings council wanted to overthrow him.  The king caught wind of this and had tunnels built without any one knowing but immediate and trusted family members.  Over time the kings regained order amount his people and the tunnels are more well known.  Now they are used as a method of escape in case of invasion.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A small handheld torch that is secured on the wall
Torch.examine_text: A useful tool to navigate through the tunnels, it is flickering dimly casting an eery light down the tunnel. The flame dances on its pitch-soaked wrapping.

Kings Crest.name: Kings Crest
Kings Crest.description: The crest of the king, a symbol of his power and rule
Kings Crest.examine_text: The crest is intricately designed, displaying a dragon wrapping around a sword. The dragon's eyes are embedded with rubies, creating a mesmerising depth to the crest.

Old Parchment.name: Old Parchment
Old Parchment.description: A parchment with markings that can decipher the layout of the secret tunnels
Old Parchment.examine_text: The parchment is old and crumbled, with lines indicating pathways through the tunnel. One path shows a secret exit that leads outside of the castle. It's written in a secretive code, known only by king's council members.

King's Guard.name: King's Guard
King's Guard.description: A burly man clad in the royal emblem of the castle, his armor shining under the dim light of the tunnel.
King's Guard.persona: I am the chosen protector of the king. My resolve is as unyielding as the steel of my sword.
King's Guard.goal: To ensure the king's safety and guard the secret tunnels within the castle.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.examine_text: On examining, you see a polished steel sword with the royal emblem engraved on its hilt. This looks like it's been well used but is still sharp.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.examine_text: Upon examining, this is the king's guard exclusive shield. The design on it represents the royal family. It's made from leather and steel. It's a little heavy but provides excellent protection.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.examine_text: On closer observation, it's a primitive torch made of resinous wood. It lights up the dark tunnels of the castle. It's well-used but still in good shape. The flame flickers, casting shadows on the stone walls.

The King's Daughter.name: The King's Daughter
The King's Daughter.description: A young woman with golden curls and brilliant blue eyes, wearing a dress studded with precious jewels.
The King's Daughter.persona: I am the princess, daughter of the king. I yearn for freedom and adventure beyond these stone walls.
The King's Daughter.goal: To explore the world beyond the castle walls.

Gold Locket.name: Gold Locket
Gold Locket.description: A small delicate locket forged from pure gold.
Gold Locket.examine_text: The locket, probably an heirloom of the royal family, looks extremely old yet precious. A small royal emblem is engraved on the front, while the inside holds a mini portrait of the king, The King's Daughter's father.

Silk Handkerchief.name: Silk Handkerchief
Silk Handkerchief.description: A soft, light-weight handkerchief made of pure silk.
Silk Handkerchief.examine_text: The handkerchief, despite its use, feels like cobwebs against your skin. It is beautifully embroidered with the royal emblem and The King's Daughter's initials.

A book of castle's secrets.name: A book of castle's secrets
A book of castle's secrets.description: An ancient, dust-covered book, bearing the secrets of the castle.
A book of castle's secrets.examine_text: It's an old book filled with faded, archaic scripture, detailing the secret locations and hidden treasures of the castle, as well as the intricate design of the secret tunnels. It's deemed as contraband and thus, handled with utmost care.

The Trickster Jester.name: The Trickster Jester
The Trickster Jester.description: A colorful figure with a mischievous smile and sparkling eyes, juggling illuminated balls in the dim light.
The Trickster Jester.persona: I am the castle's jester. I love tricks, laughter, and causing a little bit of chaos every now and then.
The Trickster Jester.goal: To have fun, make others laugh, and find new material for his jests.

Juggling Balls.name: Juggling Balls
Juggling Balls.description: A set of shinning and colorful juggling balls.
Juggling Balls.examine_text: These juggling balls are brightly colored, light and perfectly sized for a jester's hand. They seem to be well used, but they still have their shine. It's clear that a lot of jokes and laughter have been caused by these tiny items.

Harmonica.name: Harmonica
Harmonica.description: A small, hand held musical instrument.
Harmonica.examine_text: This is a delicate, metallic harmonica. Its surface is slightly worn from numerous performances. It has a light, shiny silver color, and when examined closely, you can see the signs of countless tunes played on this instrument.

Pocket Watch.name: Pocket Watch
Pocket Watch.examine_text: This pocket watch is breathtaking, with an intricate design and a gold-plated exterior. The watch's face is old and scratched but still easily readable. It seems to keep time perfectly and hasn't lost its audible tick-tock sound. This was clearly a possession of somebody who understood the importance of time.

locations.name: The Kitchens
locations.description: The kitchens are a busy, hot place. They are filled with kitchen staff rushing around to prepare the main meals for the king's family and residing nobles. Tonight they are preparing two deer the king and his nobles caught while hunting, as well as some rabbit from a few days ago and seasoned vegetables. There are multiple fires around the kitchen to cook the animals and boil the vegetables, and combined with the heat of all the people the room is stifling. While the main kitchen workers are middle aged women who stay at one station, there are also younger children running around taking ingredients from one place to another. People are shouting instructions and gossip to one another constantly, so it is very hard to hear anything, but the atmosphere is very cheerful.
locations.background: This room has always been the kitchen for the king's family. The kitchen workers take pride in serving delicious food to the king, his family, and whatever guests they may have. In fact, when there are guests, the workers make sure the food is especially delicious. They also have an ulterior motive to make sure the food is amazing - they are allowed the eat the leftovers after the evening's feast is finished.

travel_descriptions.north: Exiting the kitchens, you pass through the bustling serving area where footmen are loading up silver trays of food. You then enter the pet chamber, a sudden calm after the chaotic hustle of the kitchens.
travel_descriptions.down: You leave the hearty smells of the kitchens behind as you descend a narrow, winding staircase, the walls damp with underground chill, until the dungeon, with its lurking dread, unveils itself.

Cauldron.name: Cauldron
Cauldron.description: A large, black iron cauldron filled with boiling vegetable soup.
Cauldron.examine_text: The cauldron is enormous and suspended over a roaring fire. It's full of deliciously smelling soup with chunky boiled vegetables and rabbit meat. The savory scent of freshly cooked rabbit and mixed herbs wafts from the simmering broth.

Kitchen Knife.name: Kitchen Knife
Kitchen Knife.description: A knife with a sharp, shiny iron blade.
Kitchen Knife.examine_text: The knife is strong and sharp, excellent for cutting meat or vegetables. It's handle is crafted from hickory and bears slight wear, showing of its frequent use.

Pot.name: Pot
Pot.description: A large pot, filled with simmering stew.
Pot.examine_text: The pot is filled with simmering meat and vegetable stew slowly cooking on an open flame. It emanates an aroma of a fine blend of cooked rabbit meat and choicest vegetables seasoned with herbs.

Apron.name: Apron
Apron.description: A soiled white apron used by the kitchen staff.
Apron.examine_text: The apron is well worn, stained with a years of spills, splashes and fingerprints of ingredients. It still carries the aroma of countless meals prepared.

Head Chef Bernard.name: Head Chef Bernard
Head Chef Bernard.description: A giant of a man, Bernard is not conventionally attractive with his plump figure and spotty face. However, his twinkling blue eyes and jovial smile can warm any heart. His tunic is stained with various bits of food and sauces.
Head Chef Bernard.persona: I've spent many a day in this hot, bustling kitchen, and I wouldn't have it any other way. I'm a bit of a gossiper too - can't miss out on a juicy bit of castle news! Now, where did I put that ladle...
Head Chef Bernard.goal: I must ensure that tonight's feast is the most delicious yet for the King and his guests.

ladle.name: ladle
ladle.description: A long-handled spoon with a deep bowl, used for serving soup, stew, or sauce.
ladle.examine_text: The ladle is made from a hardy copper, although its surface has lost much of its youthful shine due to the extensive use. The 'Crown and Castle', the insignia of the royal chef, is finely engraved at the base of the handle. The bowl of the ladle is deep with a small dent on the side.

spice pouch.name: spice pouch
spice pouch.description: A small sack filled with various spices.
spice pouch.examine_text: The small, time-worn leather pouch is emblazoned with an emblem of intertwined herbs. Its sturdy leather drawstring keeps it securely closed. A robust scent of mixed spices – black pepper, cardamon, fennel seeds and so many more – fills your nose as you draw nearer.

wine flask.name: wine flask
wine flask.description: A flask filled with the castle's finest vintage.
wine flask.examine_text: The flask is of a fine glass, sealed with a topped cork to keep the wine fresh. It is filled with red wine of a deep, dark shade, the liquid catches the light and reflects it in hues of blood red. The flask is embellished with the royal seal, representing its superior grade.

Sous Chef Alice.name: Sous Chef Alice
Sous Chef Alice.description: With her brown hair pulled back in a messy bun and glasses perched precariously on her nose, Alice is the epitome of hard-working. Her apron is smudged with flour and she rarely looks up from her workstation.
Sous Chef Alice.persona: There's nothing like the smell of fresh bread and the satisfaction of a meal well prepared. Now if only I could locate our dish boy Ronnie...
Sous Chef Alice.goal: I need to prepare the bread for tonight's feast and ensure it's baked just right.

baguette.name: Fresh Baguette
baguette.examine_text: This baguette is still warm from the oven and slightly brown on the top. The smell of the bread wafts around as you hold it, calming your senses and making your mouth water.

sharpened knife.name: Sharpened Knife
sharpened knife.description: A carefully maintained, very sharp kitchen knife.
sharpened knife.examine_text: This well-balanced knife has a shiny, polished wooden handle and a gleaming blade so sharp it could cut through just about anything with ease. The blade reflects the firelight, flickering with every twist you give it.

copper pot.name: Copper Pot
copper pot.examine_text: This copper pot is covered in the signs of frequent use. Its insides are blackened from decades of different meals. The copper gives it a nice, rustic look.

Kitchen boy Ronnie.name: Kitchen boy Ronnie
Kitchen boy Ronnie.description: Ronnie is a mousy boy, no older than thirteen, with freckles all over his face. He's always got a spoon hanging from his mouth and is never without his tray of herbs and spices.
Kitchen boy Ronnie.persona: Almost drowned in the soup pot once, I did. But I love it here, amidst the chaos and the smells. Just hope Chef Bernard doesn't notice I misplaced his ladle.
Kitchen boy Ronnie.goal: I'm supposed to give Chef Bernard his ladle without him noticing it got misplaced, I have to find it first.

spice tray.name: spice tray
spice tray.description: An assortment of various spices used for cooking.
spice tray.examine_text: The tray is filled with small jars. Each jar contains a different spice - from common ones like salt and pepper to exotic spices from the East. The smell is intoxicating.

spoon.name: spoon
spoon.examine_text: It's a simple wooden spoon, worn out from extensive use. It still serves its purpose well.

ladle.name: ladle
ladle.examine_text: This well-used ladle is big and hefty. It's often used by Chef Bernard to serve soup or stews.

locations.name: Pet Chamber
locations.description: You see dozens of tiny luxurious cages where the menagerie is kept.  Instead of metal bars, the cages have bars of clearest crystal, and within are every sort of animal that walks, crawls, flaps or slithers.
locations.background: All of the rarest and most beautiful animals are sent here as tribute, buy they are sad and need to be petted and played with. Unfortunately you can't reach in to touch any of them.

Cage Key.name: Cage Key
Cage Key.description: A small, ornate silver key presumably for one of the pet cages.
Cage Key.examine_text: The silver key is engraved with intricate designs, suggesting it might be used for the cages in this room. A tiny image of a bird is etched into one side.

Crystal Cage.name: Crystal Cage
Crystal Cage.description: An ornate cage made entirely of crystal bars.
Crystal Cage.examine_text: The cage's clean, clear-crystal bars exhibit a lonely beauty, as if yearning for interaction.

Feather Toy.name: Feather Toy
Feather Toy.description: Colourful, engaging toy made of feathers intended for pet amusement.
Feather Toy.examine_text: The toy is made of bright feathers tied to a string. It looks like something the pets in this room would enjoy playing with.

Pet Food.name: Pet Food
Pet Food.description: A small sealed bag containing premium pet food.
Pet Food.examine_text: The bag is filled with pet food, colored in various shapes and sizes. It looks and smells top-quality, perfect for these royal pets.

Carey the Caretaker.name: Carey the Caretaker
Carey the Caretaker.description: An older man wearing a faded uniform and a perpetual look of concern. His hands are rough and worn from long years of work.
Carey the Caretaker.persona: I've been here taking care of these lil' critters for years. They miss their freedom, I can see it in their eyes.
Carey the Caretaker.goal: To take the best care of these animals and make them as comfortable as possible.

Cage Keys.name: Cage Keys
Cage Keys.description: A large rusted keyring holding several keys of different sizes.
Cage Keys.examine_text: Upon a closer look at the keys, you can see they all differ in size, shape and color. Each key corresponds to a specific cage in the pet chamber. The keys are rusted and old, reflecting their many years of use opening and closing the various cages.

Animal Food.name: Animal Food
Animal Food.description: Baskets of various animal foods prepared by Carey.
Animal Food.examine_text: Looking into the basket, you can see it separated into compartments. Each compartment contains different types of food, from shiny fish for the water creatures, blooming fruits for the flyers, and crunchy leaves for the crawlers. You can tell the food is fresh and expertly selected.

Feather Duster.name: Feather Duster
Feather Duster.description: A long-handled duster with soft feathers at the end.
Feather Duster.examine_text: The feather duster is long, allowing it to reach into the corners of the tallest cages. The feathers at the end are soft but firm enough to dust off the cages of the pets. It may have been in use for some time, but it appears to be well cared for.

Lucy the Lady's Maid.name: Lucy the Lady's Maid
Lucy the Lady's Maid.description: A young woman of gentle demeanor in a fine silk dress, carries a tiny birdcage containing a golden canary.
Lucy the Lady's Maid.persona: I serve the Lady of the castle. Besides her, these creatures are my only company.
Lucy the Lady's Maid.goal: To entertain the Lady of the castle and keep her company.

Golden birdcage.name: Golden birdcage
Golden birdcage.description: A sparkling golden birdcage large enough to house a parrot or small bird.
Golden birdcage.examine_text: The cage emanates a golden glow and inside there is a soft bed made of soft cushiony materials. It is meticulously crafted and is adorned with intricate patterns depicting various bird species. It's both functional and remarkably artistic.

Small brush.name: Small brush
Small brush.description: A small soft-bristled brush perfect for grooming little creatures.
Small brush.examine_text: The brush is gentle to the touch with soft bristles and a sleek wooden handle. Upon closer examination, it becomes evident that the craftsmanship is of high quality. It looks well used, loved even, indicating Lucy's utmost care for the menagerie.

Half-eaten bread.name: Half-eaten bread
Half-eaten bread.description: A slightly stale piece of bread, half-eaten.
Half-eaten bread.examine_text: The bread is slightly hard and stale, no longer fresh. Lucy must have been part-way through eating it as she worked. With a glance, we can tell it's from the castle's bakery, which Lucy is known to favor. The crumbs scattered around suggest it might have been nibbled at by some far smaller creatures. She sure is generous even in her eating habits.

Grag the Ogre Guard.name: Grag the Ogre Guard
Grag the Ogre Guard.description: A hulking beast with tusks protruding from his lower lip, he stands guard in front of the cages. He carries a large club with embedded crystals.
Grag the Ogre Guard.persona: Me Grag. Me keep critters safe. You no touch or Grag hit!
Grag the Ogre Guard.goal: To guard the cages and keep anyone from disturbing the animals.

Crystal-Embedded Club.name: Crystal-Embedded Club
Crystal-Embedded Club.description: A large club carried by Grag, embedded with sparkling crystals
Crystal-Embedded Club.examine_text: The club is about the length of your arm and has a heavy feel to it. You can see it's crudely hewn yet reinforced with crystal shards that glint menacingly in the light. Grag must use it to ward off any unwanted guests from the pet chamber.

Shiny Trinket.name: Shiny Trinket
Shiny Trinket.description: A shiny, mysterious trinket hung around Grag's neck
Shiny Trinket.examine_text: The trinket is a small shiny object, seemingly made of metal combined with a crystal shard. It refracts the light around it in mesmerizing, colourful patterns. You can't tell its purpose, but it looks valuable.

Empty Flask.name: Empty Flask
Empty Flask.description: An empty flask that sits beside Grag
Empty Flask.examine_text: The flask is made of thick glass, large enough to hold a decent amount of liquid. It has a tight cork stopper to prevent any spills. Currently, it's empty. Maybe Grag uses it to hydrate the animals or himself.

locations.name: Dungeon
locations.description: Lit only by scattered torches, The dungeon lies far underneath the castle.  Bandits and Thieves who find themselves there are met with cold stone walls and floors, with chains and bars restricting movement.  Guards patrol the corridors, keeping an eye out for any escape attempt or misdeed.  The only comforts afforded in the Dungeon are the piles of hay for sleeping.
locations.background: Any criminal who commits an act of thievery or injustice against the kingdom finds themselves locked away in the dungeon.  Far from prying eyes, the guards are able to enact a special form of justice and rehabilitation to ensure the kingdom stays safe and protected.  Some say the most dastardly of  criminal will spend the rest of their lives there, while certain rumors can be told of a secret tunnel leading to freedom for any foolish enough to find themselves there.

Iron Chains.name: Iron Chains
Iron Chains.description: Cold and rusty iron chains hanging from the cell walls.
Iron Chains.examine_text: The heavy chains are made of thick iron links, their dull gleam lit dimly by torchlight. They're hung sturdily from the stone walls, a reminder of the grim reality of this place.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A burning torch shedding some light in the gloomy dungeon.
Torch.examine_text: The torch is simple - made of a heavy wooden handle wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. The flames flicker, casting long dancing shadows on the dreary stone walls.

Hay pile.name: Hay pile
Hay pile.description: A messy pile of hay for sleeping.
Hay pile.examine_text: The hay is dry and prickly, scattered haphazardly in the cell's corner. It's hardly comfortable, but it's better than cold stone.

Guard Gamon.name: Guard Gamon
Guard Gamon.description: Guard Gamon is a burly figure patrolling the dungeon. His eyes, barely visible beneath his helmet, survey the prisoners sternly. He’s always armed with a forbidding iron mace.
Guard Gamon.persona: You can't fool me. I've seen all the tricks of the trade. I keep an eye on everything around here, and trust me, it's better if you just behave and serve your time. Escape is impossible.
Guard Gamon.goal: To maintain order and security in the dungeon.

Iron Mace.name: Iron Mace
Iron Mace.description: A sturdy weapon used by the guards.
Iron Mace.examine_text: It's a hefty instrument of justice, made from cold black iron. The handle is wrapped in worn leather, showing signs of many swings. Its rounded head holds several pointed spikes that ensures even the toughest of criminals think twice before causing trouble.

Torch.name: Torch
Torch.description: A source of light in the dark dungeon.
Torch.examine_text: The torch is made of a rough wooden stick, at the end of which a cloth soaked in combustible material is wrapped tightly. It flickers continuously, casting moving shadows on the dungeon walls.

Keys to the Cells.name: Keys to the Cells
Keys to the Cells.description: A big keyring holding several iron keys of varying size.
Keys to the Cells.examine_text: Guard Gamon carries them at all times. Each key, worn from use, unlocks a different cell in the dungeon, a potent symbol of authority in this grim place. Lose these, and the order of the dungeon could quickly descend into chaos.

Thief Gellan.name: Thief Gellan
Thief Gellan.description: Dubbed Thief Gellan, he is a wiry man with a scruffy beard and quick eyes. He wears ragged clothes and a sly grin, despite his predicament.
Thief Gellan.persona: Aye, they've got me locked up for now, but not for long. Gotta get back to what I do best, pinching from the rich! They don't need half of what they got anyway.
Thief Gellan.goal: To escape the dungeon and return to his life of thievery.

Rusty Dagger.name: Rusty Dagger
Rusty Dagger.description: A tarnished blade that’s seen better days.
Rusty Dagger.examine_text: The dagger is made of simple iron, old and rusting with wear. It has a roughly hewn, wooden hilt that is meant to improve the grip, but it seems too flimsy for any proper use. The blade is dull from neglect, but in a pinch, it could be a decent weapon.

Locket.name: Locket
Locket.description: A small, golden locket with a picture inside.
Locket.examine_text: The locket is round and made of gold, it opens to show a picture of a beautiful woman. The image is faded but she looks happy and loved. There is a worn inscription on the back, ‘always with you’. This locket obviously holds a lot of sentimental value.

Mage Seraphina.name: Mage Seraphina
Mage Seraphina.description: Mage Seraphina, a prisoner for her forbidden magic practices, is thin and pale but her eyes blaze with defiance. She exudes an eerie aura and often mutters enchantments under her breath.
Mage Seraphina.persona: The so-called 'law' that confines me is nothing but oppression. Magic isn't evil; it's just misunderstood. Soon, I will be free, and I'll show the world the true beauty of magic.
Mage Seraphina.goal: To break free from the dungeon and prove that her magic is not dangerous.

Scroll of Spells.name: Scroll of Spells
Scroll of Spells.description: A parchment scroll filled with various magic spells.
Scroll of Spells.examine_text: Upon a closer look, you can see that the parchment is aged, its edges slightly worn. The spells written in elegant handwritings range from basic incantations to high-level sorceries. They are scripted in a language only understood by seasoned magicians. The scroll seems to have a faint magical aura around it.

Crystal Amulet.name: Crystal Amulet
Crystal Amulet.description: A luminous amulet made from a rare magical crystal.
Crystal Amulet.examine_text: The amulet has a teardrop-shaped crystal that glows with a soothing magical energy. Silver chains encase the crystal, decorated with intricate magical symbols. The crystal appears to pulsate with a rhythm as if it's alive and absorbing magical energy.

locations.name: Castle Armory
locations.description: Swords and armor line the wall of the grand armory. No rust is to be found on any of the weapons. The armorer's forge bellows smoke and fire, day and night, as the king's army is getting fitted out for it's next campaign.
locations.background: The armory was founded some 2 centuries ago. It is the biggest armory in the land and has the best armorer to boot. Thousands of swords and armor pieces are made there each day in preparation of the bloodiest campaign predicted.

travel_descriptions.west: You leave the bustling armory, making your way through large stone archways towards the dining hall. As you walk, the clanging of blacksmith hammers diminish, replaced by the distant sound of bards' songs and the smell of delicious food wafting from the dining hall.

Ancient Sword.name: Ancity Sword
Ancient Sword.description: A finely forged steel sword that probably belongs to a high-ranking knight.
Ancient Sword.examine_text: The sword is well-balanced crafted intricately with elven symbols scroll worked into the hilt.

Rusty Helmet.name: Rusty Helmet
Rusty Helmet.description: This old, rusty helmet has clearly seen better days.
Rusty Helmet.examine_text: The helmet has a large dent on one side, and rust has formed around the edges.

Armorer's Forge.name: Armorer's Forge
Armorer's Forge.description: The forge filled with fire looks ominous.
Armorer's Forge.examine_text: The forge burns brightly in the corner, surrounded by all the tools of the armorer's trade.

Plate Armor.name: Plate Armor
Plate Armor.description: A full set of plate armor, gleaming brightly.
Plate Armor.examine_text: Crafted from hardened and polished steel, this suit of armor offers excellent protection.

Master Blacksmith Grom.name: Master Blacksmith Grom
Master Blacksmith Grom.description: Grom is a mountain of a man with soot-stained skin and hands as hard as the iron he forges. He’s usually clad in a heavy, burnt apron and goggles.
Master Blacksmith Grom.persona: I'm Grom, the castle’s principal blacksmith. I craft the finest shields, armors, and swords with my experienced, roughened hands. I honor each strike of the hammer on metal.
Master Blacksmith Grom.goal: To craft the finest weapons and armors capable of withstanding any enemy blow.

Hammer.name: Hammer
Hammer.examine_text: The hammer has a long ash handle, polished from years of use. The head of the hammer is steel, scarred from countless hours of work at the forge. It seems perfectly balanced and the grip is worn comfortably where countless hammer blows have been struck.

Tongs.name: Tongs
Tongs.examine_text: The tongs are solid iron, tempered in fire and oil. They are hooked and grooved at one end to hold hot steel securely, while the other end forms a rounded hand grip. They are strong yet flexible - an indispensable tool for any blacksmith.

Forge Gloves.name: Forge Gloves
Forge Gloves.examine_text: These gloves are made from heavy-duty leather, designed to protect the wearer from the intense heat of the forge. Over the years, they've developed a patina from the soot and sparks that shower from the forge. They are sturdy, well-maintained and look as though they would fit Master Blacksmith Grom perfectly.

Squire Pippin.name: Squire Pippin
Squire Pippin.description: Pippin is a slight, nimble young man with sandy hair and eyes full of curiosity. He's always seen running errands around the armory, carrying messages, and tidying things up.
Squire Pippin.persona: I’m a squire, Pippin. Working under Master Grom is tough, but I learn a lot about armors and weapons. Plus, it beats shoveling out the stables.
Squire Pippin.goal: To one day craft a blade of my own, worthy of a king.

Picaroon.name: Picaroon
Picaroon.description: A thin, long, well-made sword. Used by the fastest fighters.
Picaroon.examine_text: Looking closely, you see the sharp blade tenderly cared for, not a sign of rust to be seen. The handle is made of leather, providing easy grip. A small insignia of a seagull, the emblem of the kingdom, is imprinted on the base of the blade.

Wax Tablet.name: Wax Tablet
Wax Tablet.description: A small wax tablet, used for writing down notes.
Wax Tablet.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the wax tablet is smooth, waiting for any piece of information to be engraved onto it. It's surrounded by a thin wooden frame which protects it from any accidental damage.

Captain Ryker.name: Captain Ryker
Captain Ryker.description: Captain Ryker, a grizzled veteran, sports an eye patch and a scar that runs down from it. His arms are always crossed over his chest and his gaze is analyzing.
Captain Ryker.persona: I'm Captain Ryker; I lead, I command, and I do not back down. Here at the armory, I ensure every blade is sharp, every armor is sturdy.
Captain Ryker.goal: To ensure every soldier in the king's army is well-equipped and prepared for the upcoming campaign.

Longsword.name: Longsword
Longsword.description: A gleaming longsword with a sharply honed edge.
Longsword.examine_text: This is Captain Ryker's longsword, polished to a gleam and razor-sharp. The hilt is wrapped in well-worn leather that almost molds to your grip, it's sign of frequent use. The blade gleams metallic blue in the torch light, an evidence of it's fine mingling of steel.

Iron Shield.name: Iron Shield
Iron Shield.description: A sturdy iron shield emblazoned with the castle's crest.
Iron Shield.examine_text: This shield belong to Captain Ryker. The iron surface is cool to the touch and you can see the castle's crest emblazoned proudly in the middle: a flying griffon on a field of blue. The back of the shield has a solid grip and a sling for wearing on the arm. There are marks of countless blows, but each ding and dent has been polished out, making the shield shine like new.

List of equipment.name: List of equipment
List of equipment.description: A list of equipment necessary for the upcoming campaign.
List of equipment.examine_text: The list drawn up by Captain Ryker is meticulous. The paper is worn at the edges from constant handling, and the ink has smeared a bit in places, but it's clear that every piece is accounted for. The list is long and it includes every kind of weapon, shield, and armor needed for the upcoming war, plus many strange items that only a seasoned warrior would know to bring.

locations.name: Dining Hall
locations.description: The dining room holds a gleaming, gilded wooden table that can seat 100! There are gilded mirrors on the walls, and hundreds of candles, which are lit every night. There is a large handmade rug on the floor and tapestries lining the walls depicting past royalty.
locations.background: The dining room is used for grand occasions big and small. The king eats there every night. There are festivities while they eat. They serve ten courses every night!

travel_descriptions.south: Heading south towards the kitchen, the scent of cooked meals and roasted meat fills the air. The echoed clatter of pans, knives and dishes signal the flurry of activity in preparation for the night's feast.
travel_descriptions.east: Traveling east to the armory, one must tread along dimly-lit corridors filled with the musty scent of old wood and iron. The distant whirring of sharpening stones resonates, hinting at the soldiers' diligent upkeep of their weaponry.
travel_descriptions.up: As one ascends to the room at the top of the tower, the air grows noticeably quieter, with only the faint, rhythmic footfalls on the spiral staircase piercing the serene silence. The higher you ascend, the more panoramic the view of the realm through the windows becomes.
travel_descriptions.north: Heading north towards the privy room, one passes a myriad of lesser-used rooms and hallways. The path is not a favorite amongst guests, but necessary nonetheless. The flickering torchlight casts an almost eerie glow over the less-traveled route.
travel_descriptions.west: Walking west towards the castle exit, one must navigate through the more busy areas of the castle. The constant hum of servant chatter and rustling of garments fill the air as they bustle to and fro, carrying out their duties. As the large doors come into sight, one can feel the mixed scents of the castle's interior and the impending freshness of the outdoors.

connections.up: The Room At The Top Of The Tower

Gilded Table.name: Gilded Table
Gilded Table.description: A large, gleaming gilded table that can seat 100 people.
Gilded Table.examine_text: The table is constructed of sturdy oak and beautifully gilded with intricate designs and patterns. Despite its size, it is a masterpiece of craftsmanship.

Gilded Mirror.name: Gilded Mirror
Gilded Mirror.description: A large, ornate mirror adorned with gilt edging.
Gilded Mirror.examine_text: The reflection in the mirror is crystal clear. The gold frame is detailed with intricate craftsmanship and glows softly in the candlelight.

Handmade Rug.name: Handmade Rug
Handmade Rug.description: A large, plush rug adorning the floor of the dining hall.
Handmade Rug.examine_text: This rug is made from the softest wool and intricately dyed with vibrant colors in a complex pattern. The craftsmanship that went into this piece is truly admirable.

Tapestries.name: Tapestries
Tapestries.description: Large, exquisite tapestries depicting past royalty.
Tapestries.examine_text: Each tapestry is massive, reaching from the ceiling to the floor. The images woven into each piece depict courageous deeds and momentous events in the castle's history.

King Percival.name: King Percival
King Percival.description: A robust and jovial man in his early fifties, adorned in lavish royal attire.
King Percival.persona: I am King Percival, the ruler of this vast kingdom. My laugh is loud, and my stories, full of life. I command respect and give it in return.
King Percival.goal: To ensure the prosperity and peace of my kingdom amidst political turmoils.

golden_goblet.name: Golden Goblet
golden_goblet.description: A gleaming golden goblet encrusted with jewels.
golden_goblet.examine_text: This is no mere drinking vessel - King Percival's personal goblet is a work of art, a testament to the wealth and splendor of his kingdom. Adorned with sapphires, rubies and diamonds, it sparkles in the candlelight. The wine inside seems to taste sweeter, the water clearer when drunk from this.

book_of_lore.name: Book of Lore
book_of_lore.description: A hefty, ancient book filled with tales and knowledge of the kingdom's past.
book_of_lore.examine_text: The book is bound in leather, its pages yellowed with age. Touching it, you can feel the coarse texture of the parchment, smell the musty scent of times long gone. King Percival reads from this every night, each story a vibrant painting of the past. The tales not only entertain, but also guide him on the path of wisdom.

royal_scepter.name: Royal Scepter
royal_scepter.description: King Percival's royal scepter, a symbol of his authority.
royal_scepter.examine_text: King Percival's scepter is forged from gold, the emblem of a lion roaring at the top. It is a demonstration of his power and a symbol of his noble lineage. Whenever he holds it, his subjects bow in deference, acknowledging his undisputed rule.

Queen Matilda.name: Queen Matilda
Queen Matilda.description: Queen Matilda is a wise and beautiful woman who always wears elegant gowns adorned with precious stones.
Queen Matilda.persona: As the queen, I am always a picture of grace, my presence demanding dignity and reverence. While my voice is soft-spoken, it bears the force of authority and wisdom.
Queen Matilda.goal: To guide the king and our subjects towards decisions that ensure safety and growth for our kingdom.

golden crown.name: Golden Crown
golden crown.description: A beautiful, ornate, golden crown embedded with precious gems.
golden crown.examine_text: The crown is made of pure, gleaming gold, studded with diamonds, rubies, and emeralds. Its intricate design bespeaks a high level of craftsmanship and elegance.

locket with a secret compartment.name: Locket with a Secret Compartment
locket with a secret compartment.description: A small, gold locket containing a hidden compartment.
locket with a secret compartment.examine_text: The locket has intricate filigree work around the edges with a small emerald in its centre. It opens up to reveal a secret compartment, which can hold a small keepsake or a slip of paper.

elaborate silk fan.name: Elaborate Silk Fan
elaborate silk fan.description: A fan made of fine silk with an intricate floral design, adorned with small gems.
elaborate silk fan.examine_text: The fan is made of high-quality, soft silk which extends from a small, ornate handle. The fan is painted with delicate flowers and adorned with small, glittering gems.

Squire James.name: Squire James
Squire James.description: A spry youngster with sharp eyes, always in dusty garments, often seen hovering with a bucket and cloth ready to clean up any accidents at the table.
Squire James.persona: I’m James, the king’s squire. I am always all over the place, eager to help and always in search of more knowledge.
Squire James.goal: My dream is to become a knight and prove my worth to the king and queen.

cleaning_cloth.name: Cleaning Cloth
cleaning_cloth.description: A small, well-worn cloth for cleaning.
cleaning_cloth.examine_text: This cloth is made of sturdy fabric, with many stains showing the evidence of its frequent use. Squire James uses it regularly to clean up after the king's meals and keep the dining hall spotless.

bucket.name: Bucket
bucket.examine_text: This is a large and sturdy bucket made of iron. Squire James uses it to carry water for cleaning purposes.

book_of_etiquette.name: Book of Etiquette
book_of_etiquette.description: A thick book filled with rules and traditions of court life.
book_of_etiquette.examine_text: This is a hefty volume, worn from use. It's filled with fine print and detailed illustrations. Squire James consults it often to expand his knowledge and ensure that he's performing his duties correctly.
